College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: If u want to go to a disciplined college and want to indulge in some serious studies with great expertise teachers, then this is the college you are looking for.Overall great college for placement and industry exposure.The only issue with some students could be a less of timepass and attendance is of great concern here

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I completed my final year in Electronics Engineering from DMCE this year. This college is good in terms of infrastructure and other facilities. All faculties are good, well qualified, supportive and helpful at any hour of  time.Along with academics, our college also provides opportunities to the students to manifest their technical skills and talents through various events such as Tech Fests, Inter-collegiate and National level Project Competitions and also International Conference of Paper Publications and also cultural gatherings where students display their hidden talents in sports, dance, music, etc.Many IT companies and few core companies do come for placements. Extra seminars and training programmes for an industrial exposure, is also arranged at times for students.Overall, it was a very good experience being a student of this college.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Hi friends, I am studying in this college and one thing which makes my college to be one of the good colleges of Maharashtra is that exposure to industrial sector. My college has good faculties where they are updating us with the current technologies but exposure to Industrial sector is poor that is we are not able to much understand the need of electrical engineering in the field of the industrial sector. And we know that the more we are experienced the more perfect skills and knowledge do we possess. Other than that everthing in my college is amazing with the student crowd to the faculties. The only thing of my college has to be improved is that exposure to industrial sector.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Our college is best known to do enjoyment. Enjoyment refers to have parties, play football in the ground, and have camps and many more things too. Normal studies of the engineering takes place normally of 4 to 5 hours seriously. Other time we enjoy our life thoroughly whether it is in the college or outside the college or in the home. I do not have any peculiar aim or ardent passionate desire to achieve it, only thing is that I want to live the simple and pleasant life with an average income and enjoy my life happily.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Good college with great placement.it has no ground for sports.canteen is not up to the mark.crowd is good and comfortable to be with.faculty is okay and helpful.the college provides a good amount of facilities.industrial visit is there every year.campus is okay

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college has got a new building but it should have WiFi service available.Guest Lectures of industry experts must be more frequent.College placements were controlled by a single faculty member and not all students got placed. This can be improved by including a student body solely responsible for placements along-side the faculty.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I got admission in 2011, it is the good college.It's has got a library which is big enough. Infrastructure is good . still, an old stepped classroom was much good. College got a gym which is always close. The teaching staff is good, a nontechnical staff is little bad. Labs are dedicated. But  needs to upgrade. Software labs are good.  Fees are high enough. In 2011was was an 82000per year. Fees are higher than others

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The main advantage is the location of this college.Very close to thane.Infrastructure, placements, and the crowd are also very good.The faculty is average but you can manage your academics.Most of the time you enjoy your college life on grounds only.Affordable fees.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The infrastructure of the college was good.It could have been better as at my time in 2014 construction of the new building was in progress.Students should be encouraged to participate in opting external projects, guest lectures should be organised,summer internship program should be conducted. College life was awesome apart from mandatory attendance part. Placements of the college were good, college should try to inculcate more work environment into the college.College faculty was good but again could have been better in terms of using different teaching method rather than following conventional one.Fees of the college were economical.overall college's ambience was good.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College infrastructure is the only thing which deserves 4 stars. Not at all good placements. Expensive fees. Worst internal marking. No technical fest from last year onwords. Sports and cultural days are conducted together. Gym is only for seeing and not open for students. Non teaching faculty is very poor. Most importantly, Too much fees and no good placements.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Datta Meghe College of Engineering (DMCE) is located quite conveniently close to Airoli railway station on the trans-harbour route. The campus is just about 5-6 minutes away from the railway station and it's not a very bad walk either.This is where Datta Meghe College of Engineering (DMCE) takes a hitting somewhat. As of now, it doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t really have anything like a Ã¢â‚¬ËœcampusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just a building. This is why some students go all the way to Airoli. The placements, in general, are pretty good, with companies like Infosys and Patni taking students in big numbers. The Civil Engineering department has an excellent placement record of 100%. Chemical and Mechanical Engineering departments have below average placements. Datta Meghe College of Engineering (DMCE) faces a problem very similar to most colleges located in village-like areas- village crowd. About 40% of the crowd comes from villages. Most students say itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s better than the general Airoli crowd Datta Meghe College of Engineering host their cultural fest Milestone in the months of Jan or Feb, and the technical fest (having the original name Technitude) in the month of March.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: In our college, some faculty members are experienced while most of them are freshers. The college has an average teaching staff, canteen service is poor, and mobiles are banned on the campus. Classrooms are good, still sometimes, there is a ventilation problem & sometimes ceiling fans fall in the classrooms.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It's very good college if staff and results are considered!Even though the campus is not a point to discuss on but surely the massive 13-floor building structure is influence. The campus selection seems average and deserving students find their career indeed!

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College life sucks, placements are good, an old faculty is good but new one sucks, the best canteen in the world, Of course, I am speaking sarcastically. management doesn't care about it, Recently started college days but not up to the mark, I would never refer anyone this college.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Teaching here is good. But space provided isn't sufficient.  No playground no proper common room.  Teachers are cooperative I would recommend this college for people only for courses like civil engineering. This college is basically known for civil engineering.    InfrastructureAcademicsCampus Lif

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Stupid Crowd. Never go to this College if You are going for Crowd. But overall good faculty.The problem is Management quota where they ask a huge amount of money and give admission to students who are not deserving. Plus No Campus. The Labs are not good.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: You can't say that this is a bad College. This College provides you good faculty but still it doesn't provide the students the whole package. I mean there's no campus in the college. I guess it is the main drawback that when you enter in the college you just see a building. Except this thing, you can really enjoy. I mean I m enjoying it. If u have got even a little friends you can make really good memories.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is easily accessible. A 5 min walk from Airoli station. Railway commuters would find it manageable. There is hardly  any campus area but the infrastructure is good enough according to my limited experience of various engineering colleges.The best part about the college is having a nice blend of both young and experienced faculty which is probably among the most important features.I would not recommend this college if you have a profound interest in sports. There is no such thing as a playground in our campus. When it comes to placement and training the college does a good job and civil department of the college is well known for producing top university rankers for years now.The college does not have a hostel either so accommodation could be an issue.Technical fest, cultural fest 'Milestone', Sportszilla are some of the events that take place and are enjoyable, to say the least.The college locality isn't exactly a great place to hangout.  With the cheerful crowd that you will meet here, you are bound to make some friends for life.It's definitely a great college considering the cutoff criteria of other good colleges like space and VJTI.I definitely would recommend DMCE to all my friends.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Thew Life in this college is bit boring. No place near the college where you can chill out. The College staff not so friendly. Average teaching experience teachers. No campus where you can roam. A Great infrastructure and for students addicted to outside food will love this college especially the non-vegetarians. The College very much near from Airoli station. Placements are quite not good. very few well-reputed companies visit the college. Overall I'll say an average College. Not a 3rd class one but not the 1st class one also.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Our college is sufficient & better than few other Engineering colleges.There's still a Room for improvement just like every place in our Country.It is a good college, nice crowd & good teachers.Placements for IT & Computer are Good as far as I know & even other Branches get placed in IT.Overall a Good College. :)

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: If placement and faculty are your concern then Datta Meghe is a decent place for both. The crowd is mixed involving both the smart and the dull(thanks to reservation system). The library and laboratories have some outdated books and instruments respectively but so is our syllabus. Overall Datta Meghe is not at all a bad place to me.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Chemical and Mechanical Engineering departments have below average placements, though. The Chemical department, in particular, has really underwhelming placements. Overall placements are about 50%. Major companies visiting campus: Infosys, L&T infotech, Wipro, IBM, TCS

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: New Building of Datta meghe college has quite good infrastructure with nice environments... so that you may feel cool in summer without fans too.... quite airy environment with badminton court at the center on second floor...Nice New Infrastructure.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: the new building has been constructed and it is probably one of the best infra in Mumbai engineering colleges. This college is the next best college for CIVIL after the autonomous institutes. the Fests do lack the frills, but are descent enough. Make an informed choice.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I guess I can describe the college a little better now after studying here for like 2 months, after Banerjee has taken over; they're trying to be the NEXT Father Angel's. Majority of the crowd is not worth the description, but there are some really good students too! the seniors simply rock!! A few teachers are a little Bad, while some can't teach at all!

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: not a bad decision to choose dis college if u r entering any engg college. but don't expect luxury ,ull have live with wat it has, to give u. faculty is quite good so u can learn something in these 4 years good. in short. college...good placements....excellent faculty.....but pathetic crowd....absolute disgrace.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: the crowd is also not bad, the teachers r extremely co-operative, placements r excellent, attendance rules r lax, academics r great, overall its a very good n reputed college....i wud say ' Go for iTTT !!! placements are not 100 percent but  Nowadays, even IITs  don't have 100% placements.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Attendance matters only when you've a female professor and when you're in F.E. otherwise very much helpful. Canteen was worst but our fee hike has made new canteen for new students. No parking space. No playgrounds. Only place to hang around is Hotel Priyanka and Mamta (most of you come to know once you take admission). If somehow you go to college for inquiry or admission reason, boys, please look for a professor in Comps department.. She is Awesome!! :)

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Festivals and tech fest are pretty much fun(You should be involved though)Placements are up to the mark provided you qualify.In short its a good coll., for sure you will have fun, make the greatest friends, as you embark on the mammoth journey of Engg.All the best!

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The placements in general are pretty good, with companies like Infosys and Patni taking students in big numbers. The Civil Engineering department has an excellent placement record of 100%. Not a bad college, not bad placements, but if youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re going for the crowd, donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t go to DMCE.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: DMCE is a great college. Absolutely LAX in EVERYTHING! Faculty is extremely co-operative (exceptions prove the rule!)Very liniment as far as attendance and assignments are concerned. About the crowd, unless you are from one of those up-tight and inflexible dude from a high class family in South Mumbai who makes friends ONLY with equals, you should not have any problem here. All in all a very fun loving and pleasant crowd.Old building infrastructure and labs might not be very good ( IT labs are pathetic!) but the leniency in Attendance, assignments and TW marks more than make up for it.There are not very known hangouts in airoli but you can always go to Thane or Mulund or the not-so-far Vashi for doing tp !Canteen is now relocated to the basement of the new building but its still not THAT good !I would suggest you to come here if you are a laid back, and chilled out fellow. Pretty nice college !

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There are three problems (3 C's) mentioned above:-1.Campus.2.Canteen.3.Crowd.The changes;-1.Campus- Yeah campus still remains an issue as there is only the building...but there are a couple of grounds just behind the college which can be used for cricket, football etc2.Canteen:- The canteen has changed completely..much wider and better..nothing to complain.3.Crowd:- Due to excellent placements in Civil and Comps dept. majority of the students are from Mumbai side!

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Now, we can say it has become one of the ambitious college for students especially for those who lives near thane, or vashi because time taken to reach the college is very less compared to other colleges. The teaching staff is very honest, knowledgeable and positive by their attitude (especially experienced staff). Not only profs are supportive but also seniors.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: good college from the academic point of view. some teachers are disappointing but most are very cooperative and approachable. class rooms are spacious and comfortable. the library is a real asset. ample books and just the right ambiance to read. crowd is fun loving and easy going. attendance is not very strict but better be safe with 70-75 %.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There are hangout places like CCD & Dominos a little far... but in Airoli only! And the college building is big enough... we have badminton court on 2nd floor & 1st floor is full library... canteen has improved a lot... no hazards in it... one of the best college for civil.. if you get 110-140 then you will surely get this college depending on branch!

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Nice college. Good placement, good library, good staff and supportive seniors... the new building is excellent its campus is bigger in terms of floors rather than acres... it is the tallest engineering college in Mumbai. No restrictions here in Datta Meghe... very good college...Enjoy your life :p

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Very nice college. Location is also good. Canteen needs some improvement ASAP. Teaching staffs are cooperative and overall very good college. Awesome college all teachers are too co-operated. I like my college... DMCE Rocks.. :) ONLY THING is  Canteen should be more better.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Good college from academic point of view but will not entertain you for sports. Teaching staff is good (specially experienced staff), co-operative. No campus at all it is only a tall building. Canteen is worst. Crowd isn't too good or too bad. 75% attendance is compulsory placements are good enough. Overall point of view it is a good college

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Hostel is not available for this collage.faculty alway changed within 2,3 months.placements are good.Play Ground is also not available for students.labrotary equipments are not in running conditions.students teachers communication is very good.co-operate the all students.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: 95% of teachers don't have knowledge.............If u r interested in learning then don't go for it.If u want to live ur college life then awesome place....Only civil dept. is somehow good....Mechanical is far closer to worst....No playground....

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Full fun in college life.Friendly atmosphere Between Faculty and students...

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is very much near from airoli railway station about 10 minutes, for mechanical it is one of the better college, faculty is also experienced, conducting lot of events like technical events, sports , cultural........placement is about 60%............

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The faculty and management were the best. They train students very well and also help during placements.Made good friends and teachers were very helpful.very good experience during my whole tenure of engineering.The infrastructure was awesome and nice facilities.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: advantagesnice college, wonderful staff very , nice campus, very good in practicals, nice computer lab , attendance advantage Datta Meghe College encourages students from all faith backgrounds to find their God-designed potential for leadership, scholarship and service. At Union, students develop spiritual and professional gifts; find professors who care for and respect the individual; and seize opportunities to create, learn and connect.   PlacementsAcademicsCampus LifeIndustry Exposur

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Our college infrastructure is good.but the quality of faculty can be improved and should be focus on practical rather than theoryPlacement is goods but can be improved further. Faculties are friendly and they solve our problem. Enjoyed college life not only studies but also tech fest

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: While being here,in my college i never felt lonely or sad. Friends here are not only my colleagues but also teachers. Canteen is bit wierd but with friends everything is very happening. Sports facilities are quite good,infact we have our own ground. I am a proud Dmce'ite.

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: "Dmce has good faculty but poor canteen and sports facility. The tech fest of the college is awesome with exciting prices to be won"

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: "The biggest disappointment is the college location as it is in the middle of nowhere in a place called 'Airoli'. The college reputation however makes up for the location as it is arguably the best college in navi Mumbai .The faculty is average to say the least,its top notch for civil engineering and abysmal for electrical engineering.The placement are a saving grace though and the % of graduates placed in campus interview is growing every year."

College Name: Datta Meghe College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: If your aim is to just focus on studies and want to do masters soon after B.E. then this college will suit you. If you are looking for placements soon after your engineering then pls don't go.The placements are not good at all. Only IT students get placed for a salary range of 2 lakhs to 3.2 lakhs. If you are from etrx,chemical or mech then its too difficult to find job as only IT companies visit. The infrastructure is good if you are not an athletic person. The teaching staff is very good. The HOD and teachers are really helpful.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Decent college wasn't talked about much when i joined, i was kinda hesitant on joining.The crowd is decent mostly Gujjus ,seniors help out a lot i learnt website making and Photoshop from my seniors.Some Teachers are really good and helpful and those are the new young teachers who have been students before and know what students have to go through, some teachers are you're regular teacher type, don't have to spell it out now do i? Infrastructure has been improving since i joined. The student committees are the heart of the college who bring out the change thats needed if you're there don't hesitate to join one.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is good. Very few students gets placed. Faculty doesn't have great knowledge about the subjects. Hostel facility is available only for out station students. Hardly any practical exposure is available. Low level of industry exposure. Overall just an average college

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Only a few really good professors. They just run after us for attendance (in spite of such bad teaching). Internal marks are also given on basis of attendance. We just have to run after profs during submissions. Placements are good as we can get placed at vidyavihar.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Since it's college life, so it was great because of bunking,gathering in the canteen, fests, and the rest obvious fun. But there is no good college campus to hang out, not good premises (like ideal college imagination). The faculty is average like any other college. Campus Recruitment should be improvised. More and better companies should be called for hiring.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College life is good.. infrastructure has improved a lot since my pass out. Placement is also good, needs to bring more core companies especially for electronics and telecom branch.. faculty can also improve. Need to bring some more qualified, more skilled and people with good communication to improve the quality of education and academics

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: At first the college infrastructure looks simple and college looks simple too but we all know that we should not judge a book by its cover. There is a very warm vibe that comes when you enter the college , every person in the college (faculty, HODs, students etc) all creates a positive aura which helps to enhance the overall learning of one mind and soul. All the teachers and seniors are well mannered and very helpful

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: K. J. Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Sion opens a plethora of opportunities to grab on to and gain knowledge and experience before entering the practical world. I am a student of Second Year Information Technology Engineering. Department of Information Technology majorly focuses on innovation and student projects. There is an Institution Innovation Council (IIC) under MHRDs Innovation Cell that promotes innovation. Several expert lectures on state-of-the-art technologies, workshops, etc. are organized in the department that help you keep updated with the cutting edge inventions in IT. Students are given ample opportunities to strengthen their skills in areas of their interest. I have been grateful to the department for having shown the faith and confidence in me and allowing to explore new horizons while participating in different competitions. The head of IT department and all faculties of IT Department are very helpful and promote the spread of knowledge to every student here. Their college has several committees, societies, and associations on campus, encouraging students to participate in different activities. There are two main festivals in the college, first is Surge the cultural festival and second is Renaissance which is a Tech festival. Several opportunities for the scholarship are available. Assignments and Projects form an important part of the daily routine here and are not simply writing long. Assignments include innovative developments and help you learn a lot. Each student is encouraged by the respective faculty to work on good projects, make timely submission of assignments and provide appropriate output. Any difficulty faced is addressed by the faculties instantly. The results are very good and placements are also good enough for the deserving. I believe the college truly focuses on student growth and has a vision to provide excellent performers to the industry.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has a vast campus and has clean and peaceful surroundings. I am a student of IT department and I must say that it provides best education to the students. The department helps in the overall development of the students.There are various technical committees and student bodies in the college which help the students to improve their skills. The infrastructure of college is well developed. Specifically, the IT Department has a new infrastructure, a building named Riturang with all new labs and very pleasant place to study. The college also conducts technical and culture fest every year. College also focuses on the extra curricular activities. There is a football turf, open gymnasium,canteen,library, computer labs and various other labs dedicated to each field.The faculties of IT Department are also very helpful towards the students. In short, the college helps in the complete growth of a student.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is excellent with 24 hours of wifi in the institute areas. There are well-equipped classrooms with projectors and a library having a wide range of books ranging from references, novels, competitive exams and many more. Faculty: Our faculty members are good enough. They have prompt knowledge and appropriate qualifications to teach their subjects. Also, they have vivid knowledge of other subjects as well. But some of the teachers are very adamant and aggressive. So students can't talk to them comfortably. The student to faculty ratio is very good. The lab assistants are also quite good. Other: The college has good tie-ups with the industry. Regular industrial visits are also organized here. The sports fest named Score and cultural fest named Surge is great. There is also a technical fest named Renaissance. The campus crowd is good. Scholarships are also provided to academically weaker students as well as toppers. Placements : Placements in our college were very good because our placement team trained us right before placements which greatly helped us in facing interviews.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: K.J. Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology is located in Sion, a neighborhood of Mumbai. From a student’s point of view, factors such as college location, traveling distance plays an important role in the overall educational activity. KJSIEIT College is nearer to the central railway station and also surrounded by abundant bus stops near the college vicinity. It is also very well connected to the highways. So, one can travel with private/government vehicles. This not only makes traveling easy for the students but also helps them to perform day-to-day activities without stress and time loss. The infrastructure of our college has various facilities like state of the art computer labs, a diversified library with books containing the knowledge of various fields. Emphasis is also given for the development of innovative ideas amongst the students. This is achieved by a good initiative taken by the college in the form of an incubation center viz. Riiddl Lab where meticulously the faculty nurtures the thoughts among the students by constant interaction and group discussion. The faculty members are not only experienced but also very kind and friendly. They help the students in solving academic problems whenever needed. The faculty understands that in addition to technical skills, extra-curricular activities also play an important role in order to develop skills like leadership, management, organizing, communication, etc. So, the faculty also supports and encourages us to participate in sports and extracurricular activities with the help of which students get to develop mental as well as physical state. They have many technical committees and clubs for students to join of their interest some of them are IEEE , IET , IETE, IEI , CSI , ACS , ROBOCON , INFINITE LOOP, etc. KJSIEIT provides various opportunities to grow by conducting various guest lectures and seminars on modern technology.KJSIEIT conducts technical as well as cultural fest every year so that the balance between entertainment and study remains constant. After even semester college conducts and official industrial visit in which students gain practical knowledge of the things they have been studying which is very helpful to them in future.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: KJSIEIT has a huge campus with 2 buildings, 2 big grounds, 1 park, and an astroturf. The Institute is accredited with grade ’A’ by NAAC and also three programs namely Computer engineering, Electronics Engineering, and Electronics & Telecommunication engineering are accredited by NBA. Apart from these three programs, Information Technology engineering is another good program offered by KJSIEIT. I being a student of IT engineering personally recommend you guys to opt for IT engineering in KJSIEIT as it has various benefits over other programs like there is a separate building with new infrastructure and latest machines, project guides here help you to turn your ideas into reality, main focus here is innovation, over the year many seminars and hands-on workshops are arranged for students based on their interest. Seminar Hall and Auditorium here are very spacious and fully air-conditioned, not only this but all the labs here are fully air-conditioned too. The library contains all the books a student may need during his entire engineering studies. As a Technical Institute, one of the main requirement for a student is continuous net access, once admission is confirmed a student gets access to the high-speed wifi and also gets an email id with somaiya domain which has various advantages like unlimited drive storage, IEEE reference papers, etc Computer engineering, Information Technology Engineering, Electronics Engineering, and Electronics & Telecommunication engineering are the programs provided by this Institute. All the staff in this Institute be it teaching or non-teaching are very cooperative and always ready to help. Extra lectures are conducted for students who face difficulties in academics. Labs are kept open after college hours for the students who want to work and use the machines. Institute focuses on the overall development of a student, so students here are encouraged to enroll themselves in various activities and committees. Campus placements here are good,

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Institute for students to prepare them for all kind of interviews. In-house internships are also offered which helps freshers to boost their experience. There are around 39 technical and non-technical committees in the Institute some of them are CSI, IEEE, NLI, ISTE, etc. KJSIEIT was awarded as the Best Institute by CSI MUMBAI TECH NEXT INDIA in the year 2018. The principal of KJSIEIT was awarded as the BEST Principal by CSI MUMBAI TECH NEXT INDIA in the year 2018. One of the biggest job fairs of Mumbai was organized by IEEE in KJSIEIT. For those who love social work and want to do something for the country, there is also an NSS team that organizes more than 25+ events, each of them having some social cause. Some of the main events are the blood donation camp and cleanliness drive. Students’ Council is the most active student body of the Institute they are not only responsible for organizing the Sports and Cultural fest, but they also act as the bridge between students and the staff. The Robocon team of KJSIEIT was ranked 3rd All Over India in ABU ROBOCON 2017-18. The NEW LEAP INITIATIVE team (NLI) of KJSIEIT were winners of the "Touch The Jovian Moon Contest" organized by LPSC ISRO. There are also cultural activity teams like a dance team, fashion show team, dramebaaz team, etc. Who have won several competitions all over India. Facilities for various indoor and outdoor sports are provided by the college.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has a very big and hygienic campus. It has many activities within it like cultural forums, fest, Exhibitions, etc. It has a very playground where you showcase your sports activities. It also has a startup school which is RIIDL where you can present your unique ideas and get help for them. The college's fees too high than the average. The admission process is very simple, it's all online based that you have to just fill the form for a particular course and then just wait for the merit list to come. If there is your name on it then you have to go to college with the required documents and submit it. I preferred this college because none other was available at that time and luckily with the juju quota I got admission to it.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It is a great college that mainly contributes to the growth and overall development of the students in all aspects. I enjoyed my experience here and would highly recommend it to others.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Starting from entrance it's ok not that good.Basically there are four fields Electronics, electronics and telecommunication, computer, information technology.According to your interest you choose your best one. Exam structure is totally depends on Mumbai university. Mumbai university is one of the most popular in India.Fee structure is expensive according to me.You will get much knowledge from seniors as they will guide you properly. Now discussing about admission process u can do it from online as u need to fill the form of whichever college u want and then the result will display online as per your criteria of marks. Now reason of preferring this college over others is that I got less marks in Cet.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Kjsieit is accredited with grade A by NAAC and one of the best institutes for engineering under Mumbai university. The college has good placements. The college is with full of discipline and has all the facilities for the students.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Good infrastructure, good reviews about this college is a major reason I have never seen any bad review about this college, good placement is also a key factor for selecting this college which is almost 100 % for IT department especially, KJSiEIT is accredited by NAAC with 'A' category.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: As in I did not have any factors that could make me feel that I'll learn in this college only but the factors that made the institute to add in the form were like the institute comes under Somaiya trust and it's well reputed as all of us know and had heard about the college as well so that's why I included it in the form.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has excellent faculty which not only teaches the syllabus portion but also helps in extra curriculum activities. I was a DSE student so my admission procedure was different. The placement record is excellent which is one of the plus points in choosing this college.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: In my college eligibility criteria required for admission was based on CET marks and above in the HSC examination. In the enrollment process, you should have all the legal documents shown in the list of documents provided by the college, If you're not selected in the CAP rounds because Somaiya holds the second phase of admission also, so there is no need to worry.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It has brilliant teachers and one of the best college in Mumbai of engineering and offcourse the area was brilliant and also my seniors suggested me to join this college and it has experienced teacher and also has great committe like IEEE CSI and many more

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is good. Management is also pretty good.College is growing bigger and bigger as the years are passing. Hope to see good improvements. :)

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is good has good ambience but the best part is placement here we get many companies as part for getting placed

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Fees of 1st year for 2017-18 batch was 1.31 LPA and from 2nd year onwards it was 1.33LPA everything including tuition fees, cultural fees, exam fees and most importantly railway fee contentment are included in it. College is walking distance of 3 mins from Chunabhatti and 10 mins from Sion.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Somaiya college is well known college in Mumbai region and having good academic reputation, also various sorts facilities are available. Also it has hostel facilities which is important for outside students. These reasons made me choose K. J. Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology for my graduation.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall this college is a proper balance of studies, extra-curricular activities

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Placements are very good. Accenture is the mass recruiter and many other renowned companies visit the campus. If you have a decent pointer, placement won't be an issue.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: KJSIEIT has a great infrastructure very well maintained with all lab equipment computers labs, all latest software updated, 24/7 wifi connectivity, E-Classrooms, Sports Ground, Turf, Canteen, Excellent Library, 2 Lifts, and many more facilities and keeps on updating as and when needed. It is close to my house, also the travelling time isn't too much like from the station as well it is like 10 mins walking from chunabhatti and from sion it takes 15 mins walking. this college fits well into my budget and has all the facilities any high-end college would have.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: We don't get to choose Institute within a list of many institutions we get allotted through system we get to fill the form of all names of institutions in priority manner and we can choose which institutions to give priority

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The overall college experience is very good. The teachers in the Electronics department are really good. They are very kind and helpful.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It is a very good college for engineering. The campus is quite huge. College crowd is good. The admission process was quite easy and didn't face any trouble while admission. All the staff members were really supportive, guided and helped throughout.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is very good as it focuses on both the academic and overall development of students. I would highly recommend this college to others.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Very good infrastructure, with 11v11 football ground, turf, wifi facility in the whole campus and ac equipped labs. Admission starts into the month of august through MHCET result and college have Gujarati quota. Placements are very decent for IT/COMPS and good infrastructure with the luminous crowd and teaching staff. Quora and collegedunia helped me a lot while choosing this college.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The main focus is Innovation, many seminars and workshops, Spacious infrastructure, Knowledged, and Qualified Teachers.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The admission process was very smooth, the dates for cap round were provided on time. The reason for preferring this college. The campus environment is very active. All the teaching and non-teaching staff is supportive.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the better colleges in Mumbai, it offers a wide range of facilities and opportunities. It had a wide campus and sports facilities. The college library had a large number of books.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The best thing about K. J. Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology is that it provides the best education and supports innovative ideas of the students. I would recommend you to take admission as it will provide you with the opportunity to grow, learn and also college provides best internships and placements activities to which it provides 100 % placements.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is really good for IT They have a wide and open infrastructure. Well equipped labs for hands-on Experience.great faculty and lab assistant. There are various committees in the college for uplifting the students in every aspect. There are always seminars and workshops conducted to keep updated with recent trends and requirements in the industry. It provides a great competitive environment for students to excel in various fields. we have a platform provided by IIC MHRD and Ridell to nurture the startups. There are various startups founded in the past years in this college. The admission process was quite smooth and cooperative.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Myself Ritesh Sandbhor student of KJSIEIT IT Department Final year. It is a very good campus and a big campus. It has a cheerful environment which I think is important for learning. To get here is very easy and convenient from Chunabatti 10 minutes walking or from Sion 20 minutes walking Rickshaw from both stations are available and reasonable fare. KJSIEIT has two big grounds and many small grounds we can also visit Somaiya Vidyavihar campus for playing on that grounds. Placement is what that attracted me dream company like Musigma, Reliance Jio, etc comes for recruitments. There are Ac labs and a perfect Infrastructure for IT department.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Extraordinary and higher qualified teachers and they are always by your side to get you into a good path towards your future. The faculty members of the IT Department are not only experienced and cordial but also are very supportive. All the faculties in the department encourage us to take part in the different activities and events taking place around the nation.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Placement is good to compare to most of the other colleges of the same level. The placement faculty is very hardworking and helpful too. They make you do campus credentials course which will help you crack any of your interviews easily. Some of the companies that visit us regularly TCS, ACCENTURE, INFOSYS, VODAFONE, BYZUSS, MUSIGMA.The average package is of 3.5 to 5 lakhs and the highest of 2020 is 8L

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Quality of education, the way the college has gained name, the faculty who showed kind gesture, the way they make students study and score good marks in their exam, the college makes an effort for the students to achieve and reach to great heights

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It has good infrastructure and good classroom and campus, the admission process is very simple and completes in a very convenient way, this college has better placements and provides in house internship.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It has a very good record of campus placements with many companies such as TCS, Reliance Jio, LTI, etc coming for recruitment.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is located amidst a clean and green environment making it a peaceful place to study. The infrastructure includes facilities like the multiple computer labs, open canteen, game room etc, the faculties are highly experienced and cordial. The college arranges varying industry level internships for students to get real-time exposure.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Generally known as KJSIEIT or KJ Somaiya Sion, it is situated in Sion and is quite close to Sion & Chunabhatti station. The college campus is huge and houses Medical College, Physiotherapy College, Somaiya hospital, and KJSIEIT. KJSIEIT has facilities like Open Gym, Football Turf, Library, Free Wifi, canteen, BCR & GCR (game room), etc. Highly educated teachers who make student Industry ready and participate in projects and competitions.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall a very good college, main point is that it focuses on innovation, staff helps you convert your ideas into reality

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I am currently a third-year IT student here. This reverent institute is a part of the Somaiya Trust which is very well respected for its quality education and philanthropic activities. The admission process is fairly easy with the college people always there to provide assistance. The fees are also pretty low when compared to other colleges, 1,50,000 per year. They provide us with industry internships every year.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: In terms of placements, students get an average salary of 3.5 lakhs to 10 lakhs per annum and companies like Mu-sigma, Accenture, Infosys, TCS, LTI recruit students. They have a huge campus with big ground and turf. The faculties are also very helpful and supportive making it a good option to select this college. The admission is done on the basis of entrance exams and they have Gujrati Minority Quota as well.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Somaiya is a brand in itself. Being a private university, it gives exposure to multiple fields which helps one to discover its potentials other than the regular curriculum of exams. Though the fees are a bit high than other colleges, Somaiya is worth it if you yourself have that craze of doing something great.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Our college faculty,staff and all the other members are very helpful and supportive. Our college management is very much good

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: there are no good or bad remarks as such, overall it is nice.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is very near to all the transport and it is situated in the centre of Mumbai city so travelling is very easy. The admission process usually starts in July and ends in mid-August.

College Name: KJ Somaiya Institute of Engineering and Information Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: All kinds of sports equipment are provided to students who represent KJSIEIT in different competitions. Round the year there are 3 college festivals celebrated in KJSIEIT: Renaissance: Renaissance is the technical festival which is celebrated during the odd semester. There are various technical competitions organized by several committees in this fest. So the participants get a chance to apply their technical knowledge to win prizes. Score: Score is the annual sports festival of KJSIEIT is celebrated during even semester just before Surge, it is one of the biggest sports festivals of Mumbai with a footfall of more than 6000. 3. Surge: Surge, the cultural festival of KJSIEIT, with professional shows, events and over 5000 people attending, has grown to be a never-to-miss opportunity in the cultural calendar of Mumbai. It gives students a chance to showcase their talent in various cultural activities.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Somaiya has one of the best campuses in Mumbai. From sports to education to entertainment to food you have everything under one roof. Also the facilities @kjsce are amazing. With the best of professors to an amazing placement it the college of everybody's dream. Also there are various places in and around college to hangout. The various committees at college give you exposure to all the experience needed in the industry.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College life is amazing,good crowd though 50% Gujarati but all in all good college life.infrastructure is also good all the facilities are provided by the college. Something can be done on the faculty front.to summarise I would say I great place to be in.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: This college offers the best campus possible. the infrastructure of the building is spot on. hostel facility is also decent. the faculty is also good. the hostel facility provided is a downfall, not extremely poor but requires some scope of improvement. the industry exposure is pretty good with a lot of industrial visits taking place throughout the year. real time projects are also a big plus point of the college. the college offers decent placement package. will recommend this college to all the aspiring engineers

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: My experience at my BE was really awesome since I was in one of the best colleges.It provided the best infrastructures a student would ever want.It provided the required amenities like the projector in the class to display presentations and notes through computers,WiFi,Ethernet cables ,A library which had books as well as e-books that we could access from our home.The best part of it was that they provided all kinds of extracurricular activities like sports,tech fest,festivals etc which made our life fun filling.They provided a lot of placements.Companies like L&T, Delloite,Zycus,Accenture,Infosys etc visited our college and recruited a lot of students from the Campus .Only the thing, I personally feel the college should improvise upon is the exposure to the industry.Thers should be more industrial visits to more companies like Microsoft, Intel,Siemens etc.I received placement offers but I did not go for it because i wanted to pursue my masters.I was never a hostelite so cant say anything much about it.Each professor was exceptional.The student crowd was huge.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College Life @KJSCE is peaceful If you don't mess with the faculty. There is an amazing campus with a lot of facilities but If you crave for chicken Somaiya is DEFINITELY not your spot. You will find half of Gujarat in here, so yeah it's more of "eat sleep the planned repeat" ! Placements are decent and you could call it an average degree life.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The faculty student approach and understanding is hardly 1% teachers do their job as if students are being paid . Other activities like some council for robotics and electronics is not at the threshold level. Writing an experiment is just for the sake of submission ,no teacher tells its significance .

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Campus is huge and infra is great as compared to govt colleges. Some faculty are good, especially for Mechanical Engineering, they even help you publish papers.The campus has mixed crowd due to all kinds of colleges in the same campus. Near to railway station, hence easy to commute.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Too good infrastructure and facilities along with quality learning and being an autonomous college easy studies  helps a lot to study for other preparations like GRE GATE etc Faculties are also too helpful and friendly. The Security systems are awesome and friendly.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: KJ Somaiya college of engineering is best autonomous colleges in Mumbai. It ranks under top 5 engineering colleges in Mumbai. Its infra is the best part..it also provide extracurricular activities, its placement cell is excellent..also the cultural, sports n technical fest bring enjoyment.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: KJ Somaiya is one of the oldest & finest Educational Institute of Mumbai. It has very big campus with Athletic Track, football ground,Tennis Court, Volleyball ground, Badminton Court, Research Laboratories & lot of eating Joints. Faculty is highly experienced & Professional. Placement is 100% with lot of big names coming to college for placements like L&T.Accenture etc

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Good college with very friendly and supportive faculty. Great infrastructure and huge campus. Companies during placements are the best one could get. KJSCE has 2 canteens with cheap and delicious food and 4 other canteens on the campus. Tech fest is celebrated with great participation and lots of fun.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Its a good engineering college. Personally, I feel a student should join this college for a better future with various activities and enhance of knowledge. All teachers are also helpful.strict checking of papers.proper infrastructure and classrooms.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: A nice campus with lots of place to hangout. An innovation centre in college where anyone can turn his idea into reality . Good faculty in some branch. Placements are better than most of the colleges in Mumbai . Must be on top choices for colleges in Mumbai.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Best college for engineering apart from studies lots pf extra life time experience u ll l get here, lot to say so inshort if there is any competition for best enthusiastic college give it to mine , and nithing to say much this shount be compulsory 250 chars im .. campus canteen pd environment all r so good go for ti

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: It was a great experience to be part of this college. Awesome people with awesome ideas and helping teaching faculty helps you grow as a thorough professional in your desired field. Exrra curricular activities are more than enough than enough with hell lot of events & fests.Also the infrastructure is huge & spacious

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: It was such an amazing experience, from exams to assignment, from teasing people with their crush to blushing when being teased, from canteen to khau gali, from friendship to bestest friendship, from Mumbai to North industrial visit every bit of college was a wonderful journey that can never be forgotten. Made some awesome friends and they friends for life now :)

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: the management is little soft on defaulters. Assignment punishments are given if attendance is below 60 % (at least in the 1st  year) but most copy (nothing new) and escape the punishment. The college has never made any harsh decision by not allowing students to sit for the exam or asked for a fine uptill now :)

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The canteen is pretty good. Food is delicious and the rates are also reasonable. The canteen space is less, so you will find it jam-packed most of the times. People from other junior colleges are found more in the canteen than the engineering crowd. Food items of all types are available.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Students take admission here because of the placements. Placements at KJ Somaiya College of Engineering (KJSCE) are good and have a track record of placing at least 70% students. Comps and IT being at the top. 95% of the companies are software based companies. Though the average salary is same as any other engineering college that is 2, 50,000/-pa, the highest salary was 9.5 Lakh.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall a vry nice college. Must go coz u get to interact al type of pepole..and moreover d campus is very refreshing n neways no1s dependent on profs nowadays..so have  time of your  life at KJ..!!Excellent placement cell. ....Maximum package goes to 9.5 L. p.a. ....while avg. is 3.5 L. p.a. In 2012 March 92% placement were recorded in CS & EXTC. ....Google and Microsoft also visited last year......

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: I am an ex-ETRX-KJ. Never joined any coaching classes. Was a university ranker in the final year. Final year project made me win a national fellowship and based on that project I was invited to DLR, Germany (German Aerospace Centre) for an internship after I cleared an assignment (could not copy in this one ;) )...Of course did not attend all my classes in college either and not every prof is a gem (some are plain duds), most of them are not great, but the facilities and the help that you get from the college is tremendous. Some of the senior ETRX faculty is awesome.There is a reason why KJ placements are good...

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: finally laboratory equipments are changed !all modern machines are available (atleast electronics branch). and new bldg. 6th floor is done !no more rink football. faculty is an issue but there are few good teachers as well. Teaching is OK actually but some teachers are excellent. I'd say best college after VJTI.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: I gotta say it's a really great college... best infrastructure. .. top class placements... flamboyant campus life and crowd.... so many extra-curricula r activities.. teachers were also good.. labs and canteen awesome. Best college in mumbai. Even the faculty is good.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: KJ Somaiya Engg college is improving at a brisk pace in terms of placements,infr astructure,inte rnship and crowd..many more to list down.The BEST College to join after VJTI and SPIT in Mumbai. Go for it and take the best out of you to be a huge success in future.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The level of education and facilities provided at this institute have improved over the years. In the four years that I've spent over here, I found this college to be one of the top most engineering colleges in Mumbai. Excellent infrastructure. Very good placement and industrial exposure. Very good hostel facilities. Awesome events celebrated here. In short best college life.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College is located at the heart of Mumbai. Location of college is very good. To start with faculties are moderate to good as you can expect from most of the Indian Colleges. Infrastructure of college is very good. Labs are very well setup. College cafeteria serves good food. Hostel facilities are above average. College has all the sports facility that you can ask for. Overall development of a student. Campus placement are good, with college recording 100% placement for almost 5-6 years now.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Good faculty, good crowd, one of the best campuses in Mumbai, awesome canteen and the best 4 years of my life! Met some of the very best people in my life here and have had memorable experiences here. Professors are helpful and the events in this college are awesome with lots to learn from and also enjoy. Garba night, Abhiyantriki, Symphony and many other events take place all round the year here.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The crowd is good enough from nerds to fun people. The canteen is pretty good. Food is delicious and the rates are also reasonable. The canteen space is less, so you will find it jam-packed most of the times. Placements at KJ Somaiya are good and have a sound track record. The teaching department has never been promising and the campus is quite huge. The infrastructure is pretty average and pretty nice cricket and football ground. Overall a good college for placement and crowd. Wont regret, esp gujjus

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College was very well in function before autonomous. After this "autonomy", headache is x1000 times. Trouble to everyone including staff. Although autonomous, fees are way higher than otherautonomous colleges. Somaiya is only for rich people now. Unnecessary and time wasting procedure for simple things. Improper management causing it all.  Regarding placement, 50% IT companies, 45% Marketing and remaining 5% inclued core and pizza marketing etc.company which has no logic for engineers. Why you giving your student marketing when you have done engineering? If some 12th passed reading this and are excited about somaiya life,i will simply say make sure your pocket is healthy all time. Yes rest things go well e.g.bunking,masti, copying  n all etc. But dont expect great things in return and you have to give your hard input if you want to make your career and if you are clever.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: As the title says, it was indeed the best Journey of my life. You'll get a lot of exposure in whichever field you want, be it academics, cultural activities, sports etc. The campus is the best part about this college. It's very huge and really well maintained and there are lots of place to hang out. All the canteens are good with lots of varieties. Mechanical department is these coolest among others in terms of faculty, supervisors etc.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college faculty has been helpful all the time. But the facilities provided by the institute were not at its best. They were good enough though. The learning enthusiasm among other students and faculty in the campus becomes the building stone for successful graduation study for a student.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: This college has a balance among studies, co-curricular and extra curricular activities. Lectures are given importance as well as projects related to that concepts. The college has good infrastructure for sports and extra curricular activities. Also, there are many new cultural and curriculum activities coming up and expanding. Also, the college has turned autonomous last year and looks pretty good to be one of the top engineering colleges in India.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: My experience at KJSCE was undoubtedly the best phase of my life, considering the huge campus with n number of spots to while away your time, the people here and the way too much casual attitude of the college which really helped us to enjoy our college life! Coming to the   teaching part, the faculty needs to improve and also the pattern of teaching needs an obvious  change. Placement wise, it needs to improve.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the better colleges that comes under the Mumbai university (it was under MU for 3 of my 4 academic years). Autonomy took away a lot of charm from the college (for most people!). The college life was still good, but the exam pattern changed and as a result our scores dropped tremendously(the worst affected were students of electronics department)! Like in any other college, faculty is a mix of good and average. The infrastructure is there but implementation is not up to the mark! However, the placements of this college are good.The college life and campus are excellent.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The Somaiya Vidyavihar campus is very captivating. Full size athletic tracks enclosing a professional full size football ground. Facilities for every major sport. Huge open spaces - be it classrooms, labs, common areas, etc. No A/C though :( Decent crowd diversity with a healthy amount of gujjus as this is a Gujarati minority college. College life is good. Annual college festivals are good and getting better year-by-year. Lots of places to hang around both inside the campus or outside. Attendance won't be an issue unless you're critically low (happy bunking!). The new autonomous system includes a GPA grading structure, so every exam is important. This is good as regular studies help in the long run and of course for the final semesters. Teachers are above average but it ultimately depends on you. The amount of interest and willingness you exhibit is directly proportional to your growth both academically and otherwise. Placements are above average. This is one of the best colleges to do Mechanical Engineering from. Other fields include Comps, I.T., Electronics and EXTC. All of them are decent too. Also enquire or keep an eye out for international student exchange. Yes, international! You can get an opportunity to study for a semester (or more) at some of the premium unversities in USA (or other countries too). Generally, notices are uploaded on college website but asking around won't hurt. Library is decent enough. Two hostel options available - Polytechnic and MBA hostels. Polytechnic would be your regular hostel, MBA being modern and on the expensive side. All in all, KJSCE is one of the best colleges to spend the productive years of your life and graduate from. All the best!

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Its d excellent college for d better future and for cool college life also...... We can learn many more things other than studies lyk sports, creativity, cultural activities, communication skills etc. Thanks for giving me a chance to present my review....

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: "Canteen sports facilities and infrastructure are very goodFaculties are not very good "

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college's infrastructure is satisfactory. There are many and exiting extra curricular activities held in the college. The campus has playgrounds for almost every sport.the placement and internships provided is best in whole mumbai.the workshops are well maintained with every sorts of machines and facilities,also the workshop faculty are too skilled.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: KJSCE is a place where you relish the campus beauty.Along with that, there are a good infrastructure and facilities for students in all respects. Faculties are helpful. Stringent 75% attendance. Placements are very good for all branches especially for computers, extc and mechanical with an average package of 3-5 L per annum. Overall its a good place for engineering.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: "The college is spread across three stations because of its vast campus. The infrastructure is quite cool but there's a long useless walk everyone needs to do to reach the main building.Placements are cool enough, better than most of the colleges on Mumbai.There are in all 4 canteens in the whole campuswithout counting the Maggi house and the messes.The food is the best anyone can get.The library is quite helpful, just that it isnt air conditioned.The faculies are good enough.There area no. of grounds in the campus along with an athletic track, a football field, a bassketball court, indoor games club,etc."

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college Infrastructure is quite good . large no of decent and good companies visit over here for placements .canteen is just excellent but faculty is average

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: When you enter the Somaiya gate, a large and beautiful campus awaits you. The Somaiya Campus is one of the largest in Mumbai, which is quite a luxury. There are two huge and airy buildings for engineering which are complete with good laboratories and a big library. The college offers good internships to the students during the vacations along with great placements. There are two hostels in the campus with good mess facilities. This autonomous college having a reservation for Gujarati minority has an enthusiastic and friendly "Kem Cho" crowd. The energy of the students is quite visible in the technical fest of the college Abhiyantriki, where ISRO had an exhibition last year, the cultural fest - Symphony and the National level sports fest- Skream. Along with all the cultural activities, the college has excellent sports facilities as well. The Athletic track, basketball court, tennis court, football ground, indoor badminton court, volleyball court are some of the facilities available. The academic part of the college is excellent, with highly qualified professors and helpful lab attendants. The college houses many Mega projects like Robocon, Baja SAE and Formula Student where the students bring laurels to the college.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: KJSCE offers engineering courses in all prime fields like Computer, Electronics and Mechanical. The huge campus provides various facilities that are usually wished for in the joyous 4-year college experience. The sports arena includes football, table tennis, basketball, jogging track, and almost everything else. Academics is covered by the 5 floors of libraries which are overflowing with new books every month. Also, it lends books to the students per semester at extremely low prices. The teaching staff needs a little improvement which would make it the perfect college of Mumbai, overpowering DJ Sanghvi, TSEC etc. The fests of KJSCE are no surprise as they are very popular throughout the city and several colleges participate in Symphony, Maker Mela and Skream. The best of all is the crowd. All kinds of people from various backgrounds study here so it's a friendly atmosphere all around. The placements of KJS are very reliable and almost all the students secure good starting packages at great companies.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering is best known for the sports activities and also it is one of the disciple colleges of the Mumbai. In our college there is less Innovation and research due to improper faculties and infrastructure. Our college publish its weekly magazine where its motto is to bring out the hidden talents and their ideas that is sharing of knowledge and this leads to the sharpening our skills. But this is not enough, more exposure to the industrial sector, Attending conference and workshops and many more things leads to gain experience and also sharpen their skills at the faster rate. Other than that there are so many sports activities organized in our college and also they brought laurels and achievements in our college. Formula SAE is the famous racing competition where our colleagues design and make the formula racing car and participate in this competition. Moreover we all are also the part of the SKREAM. There is famous cultural activity that is Symphony is the inter-collegiate cultural festival of KJSCE. Those friends who love and their passion are in sports then they must join this college.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Campus is really cool so are the placements (if your aggregate is good). Profs (ETRX, my branch) are learned and experienced while some of them are useless. Labs are totally well equipped and infra is really good. The downside is its autonomous. attendance is not the issue here. The most amazing thing of KJSCE is it always gives us new thing every time.. fab place with different people but still feels amazing to be here. the placement is almost 90% but for b.tech only in case of m.tech u dnt get much opportunity This college is mostly popular because I think the students here are given freedom to do extra-curriculur activies so much like robotics, blood donation camps, competitions, etc . Whenever you will come to the campus you will find something going on. There are n-number of events here throughout the year. If you get admission here don't have any second thoughts, just take it study, enjoy, get placed and not to forget memories with friends.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The infrastructure of the college is very good. We have well-equipped laboratories to conduct practicals. It's just that some machines are way old and need replacement. Some practical exposure on the subject taught will be beneficial for the students as theoretical life is a bit different from practical life. The people in my college are very friendly and helpful, they are very sharp minded which makes you enjoy their company. Placement for the Mechanical branch is a bit old school. The college needs to invite more Core Companies to provide satisfactory jobs to Mechanical Engineers. The mess food in the college is very hygienic and tasty and the facilities provided are good. The professors have good knowledge about the subject, they just need to learn to deliver that knowledge to the students properly.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Good college life. Lecture have knowledge but do not known how to explain. All event in college are good and interesting. Heard all good things form others. But not as worth as the fees paid. Good placement of average UpTo 3.5 lakhs. Got to learn many things from different type of people

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: First of all it is automomous college affiliated by Mumbai University which differentiate it from other colleges. Student get good amount of vacation time both in summer and winter vacation. Semester exams are not stretched for span of 1 month like other MU universities. Faculties are not great though except mechanical branch.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Being a college located in Mumbai, it exposes you to the many facets of life just like the city of Mumbai does. It not only teaches a student the academic area of engineering but it also moulds the students to face the various aspects of life.
