Along with a great infrastructure, it also provides the required facilities for to students to enjoy the multi-cultural aspect of Mumbai.A great corporate exposure through guest lectures and industrial visits moulds the students and makes them ready for the corporate life. If you want to become an engineer with a dynamic development in overall personality, this is the place to be in.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Good college Experienced faculty Best infrastructure Placement record is very good. Many renowned companies, MNCs, dream companies, mass recruiting companies visit the campus. Good food across all the 4 canteens. The faculty is strict in terms of giving marks in the internals.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Somaiya has a huge campus with amazing facilities. Ghatkopar station and vidya vihar station is easily accessible from the campus. It has a huge football ground, cricket ground, football turf, indoor games like carom, table tennis, chess etc. KJ Somaiya College of Engineering has an experienced and a very good faculty. Library is huge and has a good collection of books. It has a very good canteen. The hostel is very good with air conditioned rooms.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The Somaiya campus is spread across 77 acres. The faculty experienced and supportive. It has well-equipped labs and great supporting staff. It has now become autonomous and has more control over academics. The college has a huge campus.the food available at canteen is also reasonable. Library has a huge collection of books. It has a maggi house which provides panini...and there are cultural events held by Somaiya.it has various international committees.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: KJSCE is very good college at every aspect.. As our college got autonomy placements is one of the strong plus points ..plus infrastructure and faculty are also good....while the problem resides only on the fees ...The amount of fees they charge is tremendous. ...If this is kept aside.....overall the college is awesome.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has great infrastructure , Autonomous Benefits (More importance to practical knowledge less important to theory) , there is Good placement, Vast campus, Awesome faculty ,Great Gujarati crowd, two vast buildings, five-floor library, Interdisciplinary courses, audit course available .

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the best fun and learn engineering colleges. The faculty is well experienced and friendly, industry placements are good. The college encourages various extra curricular activities. Many places to hangout as the campus is huge. Has one of the best football grounds.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: this college has just fame.there is nothing called as engineering. this college is actully stop for reserved people. the faculty teaching here is very poor in teaching . the hostels are very bad in condition. the just complete their syllabus and set the papers as they have teached iit level syllabi.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: This college is good in the sense, it has good courses, reputation, teachers and placements. Toppers come to this university and its the best after IITB in Mumbai. If one has to come to Mumbai and study then he/she can come to VJTI but on their reliability for accomodation. Do not expect good Hostels here. Plus the area is also nt that good and Campus also is not that huge.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: My college is a vast campus.This college one of the best technical college in mumbai and it is been graded " AAAA" by Careers 360 in 2016. The college encourages the everyone to undertake lots of research and industrial competitions.It mainly focuses in advanced technology and Robotics too.There are lot of social and cultural activities undertaking in the college.OPPURTUNITIES are lot in this college,not only in automation sector but in automobile too.It has received ranked 3rd worldwide and 5th in the Design Report at the Future Flight Design Competition, Turkey in May 2015, represented by Team Vayuputras.Debates,Literary arts and Entrepreneurship is also at apex.Not only that there are so many cultural festivals,and talking about its campus - It is very good and one of the huge campus.But I think the infrastructure of theÂ  campus should be improved.Other than that the college is amazing andÂ  thus offerings the best OPPORTUNITIES to the studentd and in return the hardÂ  efforts and determination of my collegues are bringing out the laurels and achievements for the college.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: vjti is best for placements., studying and most importantly it is popular for its faculty. here teachers main aim is not limited to dissemination of 'information' but also to ensure the (emotional, social and moral) formation of a student. self empowered teacher is capable of improving not only the quality of education but also the quality of education. college life is enjoyable along with studies.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Awesome college life here at VJTI. I have been in this college for almost 2 years now. Never got a feeling of being an outsider. Always felt that I was at home. The canteen of this college, the football ground, the cricket ground, the hostels, all feel like my home, infact better than home.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: VJTI is all about studies. U have to study hard. Events are not so cool. But placements are at the top. Students are well deserved and hardworking. 9 to 5 college schedule is hectic sometimes but lectures are worth. Great mob of students. Professors are awesome. Sports are good. Basketball is fun in VJTI.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute(VJTI) is a very prestigious college situated in the heart of Mumbai. It has lived up to its legacy by setting high benchmarks in both education and placement. The faculty is student friendly and approachable.They are very experienced teachers but there are many contractual faculty members as well. The campus is clean and it is a good environment for learning. The industry exposure and placement statistics are excellent with over 200 companies visiting the campus for recruitment. The student crowd is good since VJTI is an elite institution, comparable to the IITs and NITs. The affordability of this college is also fine with scholarships provided for category students. The only problem is the old infrastructure. It needs more maintenance and cleanliness. The hostels are old and need proper renovations to be done and facilities like WiFi should be provided. Also hostel rooms aren't available for all students, they are allotted on merit basis during admissions. That's why many students have to stay outside the campus, which is not very convenient. Hostels are located inside the campus which is very convenient for hostel students. Extra curricular activities are encouraged-from technology to cultural and sports, there is something for everyone. Overall it is very satisfying college experience and studying at VJTI.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: VJTI is one of the oldest and the best engineering colleges in india. With 100% placements the college is ranked 2 in Maharashtra. The faculty is good and the environment here is very competitive. It also has hostel facilities. Along with academics other activities are also carried out. Especially the technical fest called Technovanza is a thing to boast about. Among others Technovanza is compared with the IIT Bombay techfest. Overall the college is very good. One can have a very bright future once graduated from here.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Vjti college ,one of the best college among the Maharashtra . When i got admission here i was very scared about studies cause i have herd that engineering is very hard ( it is ) but as the days passes i adjusted with it the faculty i got in first year was best and understandin . Saying about vjti is quite difficult because these experience is just fabulous nd u have to feel it by yourself . Vjti is the very big college in infrastructure nd very good also . The best thing about vjti which i like the most is its Library very large and easy to access . The canteen of the college is also quite impressive . Once you got admission in vjti you will experience the value of engineering and a engineer . It's not the part of the syllabus but with the invironment with get matur and confident . VJTI gives 100? placement guarantee so don't worry about future just go and work hard you will definitely get to succeed. Thanks you

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: I really enjoyed collage life a lot, infrastructure not as expected, some faculties are need to be change, placements are great, quantity of books must increase, hostel focus on basic needs, somewhere faculties do whatever they want to do is really bad experience.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: As the college is one of the old college in our country,it's a best institute for engineering. You will be able to learn much more than only engineering. All you want is here like for robotic we have "SOCITY OF ROBOTICS AND AUTOMATION" also for entrepreneurship qualities there is Ecell and lot more. Also the faculties are good.

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Great college for learning experience and college life, good exposure and better faculty for teaching, One of the oldest colleges for learning textile Engg. Almost all student getting placement in industry after completion of the course, good location surrounded by renowned college ie, Khalsa college, UCT ( university of chemical technology )

College Name: KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: If you want to get your favourite branch in vjti then you have to put yourself on top .only reserved category people can get their favourite branch on a pinch of marks. except for two or three teachers ,the faculty in the college is very bad in their subject.the student of M.Tech teach the B.Tech student.and some of them just do it for completing syllabus. the canteen is very poor in variety. but prices of various dishes are not very high. the hostel is like booth Bangala of a horror movie. the librarian treats students like street dogs. hence it is my advice to don't join VJTI. now the SPIT is emerging college and best to join for engineering. please don't fall in the rumour of people that you will get good placement in VJTI. it is in your hand to have good experience in SPIT or to have a disappointment like me in VJTI.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Review is applicable only for VJTI Mechanical Department (I am not the right person to talk about other departments)College faculty is OK, you will do well if you like self study (If so you will love the big room where no one is allowed to make noise). College placements are good. More than 90% students get placed and avg package is around 5 LPA. Mechanical engineer students are allowed to appear for placement rounds of almost all types of company (Core, IT, Civil etc). Academic pressure is not much and you will get enough time to do things you like. And here you will meet brilliant minds, they will be great source of your learning and they will become  part of your extended family. After four years when you walk outside VJTI main gate you will have enough to lead your bright life ahead.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: The college has a legacy and is one of the best colleges in Maharashtra. Mechanical and civil engineering from VJTI is recognized well. most professors in the department are good and experienced. Mechanical engineering has a lot of student organizations that participate in a national competition like robotics, go kart , off road and formula car manufacturing and racing competition. The mechanical department has exposure to BARC, TIFR, and other good research organizations. The cultural fest and technical fest of VJTI is grand . Students can get good managerial, technical as well as cultural exposure based on their interest. Many of The top companies visit VJTI for placement .It is a government college, hence the fees is the minimum compared to most other colleges.VJTI is one of the sorts after a choice of the best minds in Maharashtra, thus the crowd is good.Good canteen, decent hostel huge campus, decent library are other positives.Lab equipment are old. Plus, being a government college, it has some limitations but the positives outweigh these negatives.Overall a good college to study from which is recognized worldwide.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Life at VJTI is super balanced. You get to learn 'real' engineering as well as you get to enjoy at college events. Faculty at VJTI is extremely knowledgeable and always ready to help besides academic purposes. The college has 100% capability to place students in prestigious organizations. Though the hostel needs some up gradation, still I would say life at a hostel is ecstatic.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: It is heritage college with equally heritage machines to learn from. The faculty is below average some are really good but some are really really below average. Annual college events are on the verge of extinct. They are simply using their brand name to get all the exposure. Thanks to the student who have put in their efforts to keep the annual activities alive. BETWEEN I M STILL TO RECEIVE MY DEGREE FROM THE COLLEGE they don't put it on hold  I m putting a yes in recommendation hope you experience any change

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: College life was awesomeFaculty is poorInfrastructure is improving so no issues with thatPlacement is deteriorating - the cause is poor faculty and obsolete syllabusAffordability - It's affordableHostel - I really don't have any idea since I am a localityCrowd - it's a mixture but overall it's goodIndustrial exposure - it's very poor since we are not taken for any industrial visits.However there are good internship opportunities. That's a plus.Student activities - Many societies and very creative ideas. Students really work hard through financial support from college end is not much. I haven't had any as such bad experiences, expect for the faculty part. Senior professors are very knowledgeable but most of them have retired. The new generation of professors is very bad. They can barely speak proper English and don't know the subject matter either. Syllabus is not taught completely. Lectures are taken for the sake of taking and favoritism is practiced by most professors. Research work is not inculcated amongst students. It's a simple rat race in which assignments and tests are given with one simple purpose of getting maximum marks. Not all professors are bad. So it's totally luck dependant. If u get the good Prof u are lucky. Lab facilities are a little outdated but I have seen improvement after passing out. Many new types of equipment have been bought. And efforts are being taken for the same. Plus the institute is over 125yrs old and thus has a very influential effect on your overall profile. If only the syllabus is improvised and professors are chosen correctly maybe it can regain it's overall rank.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Overall experience has been really good.  You will enjoy it only if you step outside and participate in various activities. Faculty of Mechanical Department is really better. You need to approach a professor to know more about the subject.  Placement has never been an issue if you are in VJTI many companies from Technical and NonTechnical background come for the placement. If you are in computers, WOW.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: College life is awesome with a great crowd around. Infrastructure wise college is decent enough. Enough space compared to other mu colleges. Few profs are also very helpful but the quality is deteriorating because of few others. The extra curricular wise college has many clubs and all are very helpful.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Best place to stay - MatungaGood competition among top elite crowd from the state; Very good learning; People from different backgrounds I have met a lot of people in this college, many of us got placed in the top most companies as well and everyone was happy with the placement. Also, the placement officer and the admin people are really good when it comes to helping students regarding placements.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: VJTI is a place where the crowd you meet is highly ambitious which motivates you as well! Placements are really cool when compared with other state level universities .The  infrastructure obviously needs improvement but still better than other state universities

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Best crowd, Competitive talented people. Opportunity to ideate .Helped me grow as an individual . Helped me raise the bar of competition . Changed my perspective towards academics. Plenty of scope for practical work experience and lot to learn. Great for placements, looks good on paper. Has a very rich legacy , known to produce some of the great technical leaders, entrepreneurs .

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: College placements were really awesome. Helped me land a great job Students here are the top notch, hence everyone feels motivated to learn and grow. Student bodies like SRA for robotics, SAE for Mech guys are really great.  The fests and the committees that organize them are great.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: VJTI has good lab facilities for every department. It has many student groups deals with corporate exposure. VJTI arranges sports activities, fun activities, various subject's symposiums and what not to encourage and develop skills. Hostels are well equipped with WIFI and good mess.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: It is one of the sought after colleges in Maharashtra which attracts the best student crowd in the country. The classrooms are large and equipped with modern teaching aids like projectors. The hostel facility is decent and the mess is kept in a good condition and serves a variety of food. However, student activities in the campus are relatively less when it comes to committees and club activities on the campus. The annual technical festivals such as Technovanza(|Technical festival), Pratibimb (Cultural) and Enthusiasts (Sports) provide a wide exposure to the talents of the students. The quality professors in the campus, the students can take challenges and compete with the best minds in the country. Regarding placements, computer science and IT  dominates in the campus.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: VJTI is top government college of Maharashtra. Even today one can see the old infrastructure of the campus which needs to be improved.A variety of profile based industries visited the campus for placement but not for the textile.The student from all of the Maharashtra found here.Being a government college no is of affordability.But for textile think twice before joining it.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Best in class, an autonomous college that has in store everything a kid needs to explore, the best one time experience in engineering. Approachable faculty, calculated academics, a heavy punch of extra curricular for overall growth of students, special mentoring in career channelizing subject to personal interests, and alot more. Most affordable and highest ROI offering programme is here at VJTI. Highly recommended.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: For M. Tech EPS class room we had window A.C. But it needs regular maintenance.Ladies wash room is there but needs more in number.In machines lab, we had a great experience but it needs maintenance like the wall color, enough lighting.The industrial visit should be organised.My co operative class mates and professors made my  college life  enjoyable.I was a have sponsored student so placement was not applicable to me but it was good.I haven't used the hostel facility.Prof. **** is the exceptional professor in VJTI because she makes contacts with students for ever she remains in touch with the students after the completion of the studies. And ready to help at any time.Student crowed in VJTI is good because they get selected from merit list.Excellent faculties good learning   atmosphere industry oriented syllabus excellent  High voltage lab sponsored by SILENCE.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Nowadays many engineering colleges are there in Mumbai but VJTI is best and government college.There are all fields like computer, mechanical and civil is available. My friend is studying in VJTI college he told that it is so big and beautiful college.Students from all over India come to this college. All professors and staffs are very good and experienced. The canteen is also very good and beautiful.The fees of this college are also very low as compared to other colleges in Mumbai. The facilities they provide to students is very nice.The placement is also very nice and many companies come here to take interview of students. To get admission is difficult because students are more and seats are limited.So best and reputed college for those students who want to do engineering.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: College with 100 percent placement. Placement in the fourth year of engineering is very good, College has a record of 99 percent placement except for the textile and production. this college is paradise for computer engineering student. The company that comes here for recruitment are all international firms like google, Microsoft, lnt, BOA, credit suisse, morgan Stanley offering very good package comparable to that in IIT's.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Friends, Got a lot of friends and good faculty. Infrastructure is old. But it is good. I have loved this college life with my friends. Every time after lectures sitting beside canteen and chitchatting. In exam times group study. This is so nice.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: My college is an autonomous college and we all know all "autonomous" colleges are best. Here all cultural, technical and sports fests are good. The teaching staff is average.Overall it's a good college.The infrastructure of college is bad because it was built before 128 years.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: A very good college in the means of placement and discipline. Infrastructure needs to renew.Hostel provision  for girls is not sufficient. Faculty is just awesome at their job and know well how to handle each situation. Lab are standardised students have been given a right of freedom and a wide range of technical field development has been provided,  crowd in this college is very cool.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: One of the oldest colleges in Asia. Good placements. Big Campus. Good Academics. Old Infrastructure. Good festivals. Very long vacations (helpful for internships). Highly recommended. Equivalent to/better than most NITs. Best in Mumbai after IIT Bombay.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: The college is really great. Infrastructure is mediocre. But it is autonomous, and also it has great placements. It is a 128 year old college. It is rare to see such a big campus area in a costly area in the heart of Mumbai, in Dadar. Also, it has a great prestige in Maharashtra.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Just awesome than other colleges in Maharashtra. Awesome staff, Festivals. Seniors are the best as helping hands. Proximity to railway stations. Scholarship section is just helpful. Canteen is much better than other college canteens. Two grounds, One for cricket and other for football are present.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: One of the best colleges made during the British rule and still standing strong, tackling the challenges faced by the old infrastructure. Forged tons of highly intellectual people in the world, contributing to the country's development.I am completely enjoying the best years of my life in this institute.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: VJTI is not just a college, but a complete university on its own. At VJTI students gain an invaluable and sound theoretical background of core subjects as the syllabus is designed keeping in mind the requirements of the industryWhile the building may look old, it still has some of the best labs, the hostels are average, typical government style.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: VJTI is the fifth oldest engineering institute in India, situated in Mumbai. With its strong alumni base and best civil engineering, department across India , it retains its tag of the supreme in engineering faculty. The professors here are highly professional and hold Ph.D. in their respective departments.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: VJTI. The best engineering college in Mumbai after IIT. It's my first year at the college and it has been quite well so far Though the infrastructure may not be really good But the teaching faculty and the crowd are good Also there's a wide exposure to co circulars because of various committees like E-cell, SRA and fests like technovanza, pratibimb (Impact MMA) and enthusia. College life is pretty fun you, learn and even enjoy. Overall the college is really good.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: The campus of VJTI is huge, one might even get lost initially. Lots of open space, a cricket and a football field, tennis courts and basketball court are available for recreational activities. However the buildings being old, the classrooms and the labs are not places youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll enjoy being in.Hostel facilities are available but are pretty old and obsolete. Twin or triple sharing rooms are usually not clean.Departments like Information Technology and Mechanical have excellent teachers. There is a lot of room for research work in these departments. Above average teaching in other branches, but you cannot expect more from professors of a government engineering institute. However, the importance of professors is much more here because of its autonomous nature. Many times the questions asked in the final exams are straight from the professorsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ notes. Many experienced faculties have retired in the recent past and the new appointees do not match them in knowledge, qualifications or experience. However, they make up for all these with their enthusiasm and friendly nature.Placements at VJTI are certainly top notch. The college has consistently maintained the cent percent streak for most of the department. The name of the institute and its legacy are enough to get excellent placements, perhaps the best in Mumbai after IIT-B. Multinational companies like Microsoft (16 lpa), Google (19.95 lpa), Goldman Sachs, Oracle, Morgan Stanely, Yahoo and Deloitte also place a few students sometimes.VJTI canteen is certainly not bad for a government college.The food is damn cheap and tasty, too. Ragada Samosa (Rs. 20), Fried Rice (Rs. 35) and Samosa Pav (Rs. 10) are the hot favourites. Non-vegetarians also wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t regret.The crowd at VJTI is sad; rather, nerdy would be more appropriate. Students get engrossed when it comes to technical festivals, be it their own college fest or any other, and this happens all round the year.Technovanza is the technical festival of VJTI. Pratibimb is the cultural festival and Enthusia is the sports festival. Many other fests organized by hostel folks are held all-round the year.All the Fests take place usually in the month of December.The SOCIETY OF ROBOTICS N AUTOMATION Is damn too good.They have participated in various international competitions too e.g: Robocop 2014 and represented India.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Infrastructure is excellent, free wifi, vast library accommodated with many books, 4 computer lab, cheap and good quality food by college canteen........Many social groups like SRA(technological group), Pratibimb (Cultural group) and enthusiasts (sports group).

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Starting from college infra,  it as old as british monarchy in INDIA. Though structural department of VJTI has started investing its funds in improving the conditions of college. To be  truthful, you will hardly find any faculty speaking fluent and grammatically correct English. God knows who recruits the faculty in VJTI. Coming to placements, almost every student in each branch except civil is placed. CIVIL is drought hit with respect to placements. There are very strict rules on promoting sports. You will hardly get funds from college to promote your event in fest.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: This is about production dept of VJTI,Mumbai.professors are really very bad.labs are not well equipped. All the machines are outdated.government is funding the college but I guess college is not able to use it efficientl.this college is recmended only for those who can do studies on their own.do not expect anything from professors if u get admission to VJTI.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Great infrastructure, Great students ( USP of college), good facilities, decent teachers, good background for extra  currics, awesome placements. Good location and exposure. Overall experience was good. Good platform to launch a career.High respect in society

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Vjti!! The best engineering college in Mumbai after IIT!!It's my first year at the college and it has been quite well so farThough the infrastructure may not be really goodBut the teaching faculty and the crowd is goodAlso there's a wide exposure to co circulars because of various committees like E-cell, SRA and fests like technovanza, pratibimb and enthusiaOverall the college is really good

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Vjti provides lot of extra curricular activities to keep you engrossed round the semester. But academics you have to study on your own. Attendance is compulsory. It is the best college in Mumbai and has great reputation all over in Maharashtra. Placements much better than any other colleges in Mumbai. Huge campus, infrastructure is old but has a heritage touch. Brand name and legacy helps for higher education...

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: "best college for comp and IT perspective,but don't come here if you are interested in core branches,faculties are OK but target placement directly ,don't spend much on academics.Hostel facilities are good but seats are limited also lot of corruption and mismanagement while allocation of seats.I will suggest the college if you want job in IT profile with good package."

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: college is not good in infra,placement is good,i hope a better canteen,library is OK,sport facilities is also OK....overall all the faculties were gud

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Faculty of the Civil branch is excellentÃ¢â‚¬Â, says a final year student. Departments like Information Technology and Mechanical have excellent teachers. There is a lot of room for research work in these departments. Above average teaching in other branches, but you cannot expect more from professors of a government engineering institute. However, the importance of professors is much more here because of its autonomous nature. Many times the questions asked in the final exams are straight from the professorsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ notes. Many experienced faculties have retired in the recent past and the new appointees do not match them in knowledge, qualifications or experience. However, they make up for all these with their enthusiasm and friendly nature.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: "Attendance:At VJTI, Civil branch is very strict about attendance. For other branches, it is not much of an issue, on a simple condition that you do not spoil your relations with the professors. Ã¢â‚¬Å“Panga mat lena mere dostÃ¢â‚¬Â says a final year Computers student. However, there are always exceptions and you have to identify those professors and attend their lectures regularly. Canteen:VJTI canteen is certainly not bad for a government college. There are cleanliness issues; often it stinks a bit, but overflowing with students most of the times. Though it is quiet spacious, during lunch break, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to strive hard to find a place. The food is damn cheap and tasty, too. Ragada Samosa (Rs. 20), Fried Rice (Rs. 35) and Samosa Pav (Rs. 10) are the hot favorites. Non-vegetarians also wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t regret."

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: The college has good and properly maintained infrastructure. Library has many books of different taste and has all the books which we require. canteen is hygienic and quality of food is good. college has 100% placements to many good companies. college has good sports facilities for many sports.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Our college popularly known as VJTI is a government institute found in 1887.it has good infrastructure .100% Placements.College has big library and have sufficient sports facilities.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: Known to be Mumbai's best local engineering college, VJTI attracts almost all the state toppers who couldn't get into the IITs and other national institutes. However, once you get in there, you realise its not as good as it is generally perceived by the locals. The infrastructure is pretty bad, with extremely old building. The teachers, too, are just average and nothing great about them. But a plus point of this institute is the laboratory equipment which they generally use(except for CSE of course). The canteen is great but tends to get overcrowded at times. An important factor people keep in mind while joining VJTI is that the placement record is pretty decent and consistent. Almost 100% placement every year. The college has a large football and cricket ground(which are quite good). All in all, I'd suggest that VJTI should be the last option for anyone aiming for a top institute like IITs or BITS.

College Name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, Mumbai  (Also known as: VJTI Mumbai)
Reviews: VJTI as the name says does stand for placement oppurtunities,but many extra activities like SAE,SRA,AERO VJTI, technical fests -Texhnovanza  have too much learn from and in this 4 years personality development is very much sure. Many old faculty from help too much but donn't expect from the new ones.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I still remember the time when i completed my 10+2 and without doubt i wanted to get into good college. But all hardship lead me to DBIT. Initially i felt it was good college not upto the mark but knowledge wise i feel it was great place. Since i didnt opted any coaching class through out my curricullum i felt it wont be possible to clear all the paper without the faculty support. I was able to make lot of friends during my engineering course. And location wise is concerned it was near from vidyavihar station with 10min walking distance also bus and auto facilities are available. As far as infarstructure is concerned it could have better and there was limited time alloted for sport activity. But we have got lot of support while conducting extracurricular activity which is the best part. But in the it is the placement which decide your future and as far as mech branch is concerned i can say there was hardly any core company came for recruitment only few land up in good company luckly i was one of them. But i felt after my graduation completion lot of thing has been change like HOD of mech has became principle of our college. As far as HOD of mech is concern she is a great inspiration for me and i feel in upcoming year placement would be better for mechanical branch also.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is good, excellent crowd, average placements but the activities on campus are amazing. The faculties of computer department are helpful, albeit a little strict. Overall it was an excellent experience of my life. Phoenix mall nearby good hangout place. Lots of good places to eat around the campus. Canteen is okayish very less variety and not a very affordable menu.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Life at DBIT was a mix of challenges, learning and fun. It was a journey which helped me gain knowledge, ascertain passion and develop communication and interpersonal skills. It was a roller coaster ride, as each term passed we faced new challenges in the form of new subjects. Life at DBIT helped me developed bonds with the faculty and colleagues and finally a memory to cherish forever.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has a good campus environment. 2 open grounds give it a grand feel. The library has a wide array of books to refer and borrow but is seldom used by students. Only major complaint would be the computers as they don't regularly function. The fees are also high as compared to other colleges.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Don Bosco Institute of Technology (DBIT) is located at the Don Bosco, Kurla campus in front of the Kohinoor City. The classrooms are roomy and well ventilated. There is ample natural light pouring in courtesy of the large windows. The labs are modern and well equipped. Elements of contemporary design can be seen everywhere. There is a chapel on the ground floor. There is a huge football ground, basketball court and it is concretised. There are provisions for indoor games like carrom and table tennis at Don Bosco Institute of Technology (DBIT). The campus has lush greenery throughout the year. Even the insides of the buildings are spruced up by placing potted plants. Faculty at Don Bosco Institute of Technology (DBIT) is average with mechanical being the best since most of the professors are good. Other departments have one or two excellent professors and one or two are said to be really horrible ones.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Strict discipline and school type college. Full support for your ideas and knowledge. Helpful staff members. Punctuality is main quality of this college. Well experienced teachers .workshop are conducted on major basis A minority is the drawback for many students.should limits or try to reduce this gab.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: it is very proud feeling to say that awesome college for engineering in Mumbai.college infrastructure is good if someone outside person visits college they appreciate after leaving college. Staff were not to much good but yet we get good teaching facility there. One can see people leaving outside Mumbai are provided with hostel not inside the college which may distract. There is always visiting of many foreign peoples inside the college campus. Placement for mechanical engineers was less in earlier days but nowadays placement for them increasing every year. Students of don't bosco are very creative and also very interactive. Various festivals and activities are conducted by students as well as staffs.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Thankfully, my core foundation of values, ethics, work and study culture so on and so forth were made solid when I was in school. If it were not for those days, I would not even be half the man I am today. The mindset of Professors all across the country, specially in government funded/aided academies needs to change. They need to feel responsible of the influence they have on young minds an they need to look beyond the textbook and give students a wholesome experience of education. It isn't always what you remember on the day of the exam that counts, that is secondary or tertiary even. It is about how to make a man out of a boy, how he is supposed to think in the real world and how being a suck-up is not the only way to get to the top.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It was a pleasant experience with lots of learning involved which also included extra curricular activities. Good faculty keeping us up to date with the latest in electronics & telecommunications technology & infrastructure. There are 4 streams in which you can do your engineering which included Computer science, IT, mechanical & electronics & telecommunications engineering. The college is under Mumbai university & is rated as one of the best colleges in Mumbai for engineering. Located on the eastern side of Vidhyavihar railway station , it is close to the station & caters to the need of students all around Mumbai in terms of location. The placements for IT & computers are exceptional but low for mechanical & extc. Along with education it instills discipline in the students & provides a comfortable atmosphere for holistic growth of the student.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Its a decent college with good infrastructure.It has a very good faculty.The course is designed in a much better way and gives practical exposure too.Labs are well equipped with advanced technology instruments.Placements are also good,top notch companies usually recruit a considerable amount of students. Overall its a very good college

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I took admission in this college by seeing NAAC grade. My teacher suggested me that its a good colloge with good faculty members and learning environment. Teacher guide you through cource and mentor you weekly

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Top college Nearby my place Top studies Well maintained campus Every facility is good Sports Events Project display are conducted

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I heard about this college from my seniors and their reviews were good enough. The atmosphere of this college is very good and provoking. All the facilities are good. I have very much interest in CS which lead me to opt for this course.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I got admission only in this college. This is a good college for the ones who are only intended to study. as far as sports is concerned you have football where you can play district level. The college has a good canteen and a football ground with a huge parking lot and a basket ball court. It also has a xerox centre inside the premises.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: DBIT has a fairly big campus as it is part of the DBCL which includes other Don Bosco degree colleges(BMM, BMS, HM, ITI). The campus recruitment figures were good and involved some good companies. The students and the faculties seemed to be decent. One of my cousins had passed out from DBIT and convinced me that it is a good college

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: First, the college is closer to my place. Second the campus is well kempt and clean. The vibe was very positive as soon as I entered. I had some friends already in this college, so was acquainted with the college crowd.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: First factor was the campus. The college has a very large football ground and as well as a proper basketball court. Also it has a very big canteen where hygiene is maintained and its location is such that there are various means of transportation and the college is very near to the railway station.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Everything thing is good except some facility they are very rude I get angry on small small things and I don't like that and there are also a very good faculty member there which always try to understand the situation of the students

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Positives - Top ranked college Best faculty staff Great lab for knowledge gain Full placement guarantee Best sports facilities & tournaments organisations Good infrastructure Negatives - Haven't found any

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I chose this college because it's closer to my place so reduces the travelling time and opted for this course because it much sought after these days. One of the criteria students should consider while taking admissions is the one which reduces travelling time

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The Reachability from my home, good learning and importance of discipline within the campus and outside of it. Also, the importance that is given to speaking/communication skills. The facilities in and around the campus are good.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The overall experience of college is nice. The crowd here is very active in all activities. Lot of competition and groups are there which carry out number of activities throughout the year. Staff is not the best but helpful. Attendance is slightly strict. One need to maintain 75 percent.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: No bad remark against academics but we should get more internet access in the college.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The factors include the distance of the college from my house, a good campus and I knew quite a few people who graduated from here. In case of why I opted for computer science / engineering is I always had a liking towards this field, peer pressure didn't affect this decision as none of my friends have joined a similar course.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: There's no positive or negative remarks I want to give about my college, college is good for resident students & below average family background people can be study here. Overall I just want to tell you is Faculty here are very good & supportive.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Most important thing is that its a Renowned College, has Excellent Faculty, Nice,Big and Green Campus, College promotes other activities as well, seniors are very friendly and Helpful, college is not too far from my home so travelling time is less

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: the biggest consideration was that dbit had 51% catholic minority reservation for all the engineering programs. There are other colleges which have this reservation, but relatively dbit has good campus facilities and well equipped labs. I had been to many other colleges before filling out the forms and i felt this campus was really good. There are a very few engineering colleges in Mumbai which have a ground. During the campus visit i saw, dbit had 3 separate in-campus grounds for respective sports. So this was also a significant driving factor to take admission in this college

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It was closer to my house compared to other colleges. It has good facilities, really good canteen. I took a tour before applying the campus was quite nice consisting of 2 grounds and a separate parking area. Different departments were provided different buildings along with the labs my department (comps) alone had 13 labs. Also I had quite a lot of friends which were already studying here so this was a good option for me.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It is nearer to my home place and includes less travelling from the nearest railway station. Apart from that the college has a very disciplined environment, Good loving teachers and provides exposure to various cultural and technical activities and events. I opted Computer Engineering because I am keen into entering an IT firm once I graduate.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This college was one of the 7-8 colleges which had christian minority. And Don Bosco is the best among those. The reviews I read about the college were good and many of my friends also suggested the college is great. I had few faculty contacts also in the college and their response was also that its a good college with great academics and campus life to enjoy and study at the same time. ALso the main factor was travelling and I wanted the college in a less travel duration and hence came to the conclusion of this college.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the finest college in mumbai. I will refer all students searching for good college in mumbai should consider this.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college infrastructure is very good, plus it's famous for being a sport centric college. The college has three grounds, for students to chill or play during the breaks, and it also provides sports equipments to students. Everything is maintained well, the faculty is amazing, and soft copy of every chapter is available on the college education portal.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Closer from my place so reduces travelling time also it has great job opportunities for students after grad. Lots of projects going on which help students in overall development. Also it has great teaching faculty. It is great in aspect of everything

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Nothing negative about my college it's good place to study and learn things and it's a good college . I got good friends over there and lectures and they all supportive to every students. They are all good.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The best highlights of the college is that there is zero tolerance policy for ragging. There is separate anti ragging committee who take care that no ragging take place in the campus of Don Bosco Institute of Technology.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall, I'd give the college a 7.5/10. It's still a budding college with a lot more to develop on. The infrastructure is constantly being worked on to make it better for the students everyday and the ambience is great. One of the main drawbacks of the college is that's its too damn far, that's all. Like even after you get down at a bmtc bus stop, there's like a kilometer or more of walking to do just to reach class. But eh well, at least it keeps us healthy with all that walking.

College Name: Don Bosco Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College provides good facilities and has good teaching staff.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: No doubt it is one of the best colleges in city. Infrastructure is way too good and ahead in terms of many other colleges. Faculties are friendly and beloved principal sir is a cool person. But sadly it's not what it seems. Placement cell is one of the worst ones i have ever heard. The amount of politics there is ruining students careers. Mind you i am a placed student. The placement cell is headed by a sir who has lots of airs about his so called Connections in industry. He refuses to address to student's concerns. Fine you have a committee at your disposal but some problems can't be handled by them and when students ask you. You are plain rude and not approachable. In the name of 100 percent placement you are forcing students to sit for mass recruitments after which you are not allowed to apply for any further placement drives. The only ones allowed are the ones he wants to or the ones placement committee knows. Students are sitting here with single job offer and not allowed to apply for more even if they want to. And people from placement cell are there with 3 job offers. Politics runs in Placement cell and the one who manages it. The whole placement scenario is a big facade. Half of my friends are unplaced. That half in total is almost 500. Trust me don't sit for mass recruitments. You will get a better job later on.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is grt has good facu,grt placements highly ranked , but CE infrastructure,good teaching,fest The college is housed in a spacious building, part of the huge DY Patil Campus which is home to many other sister institutes. Most of the canteens and faculties are connected internally and there is considerable interaction among people from different faculties. There are close to half a dozen labs (And we mean well maintained ones!). Even though the college is situated in the DY Patil Deemed University campus it is affiliated to University of Mumbai.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: If u really want to enjoy the life this is the best place for u to enjoy your life . If u have been reaaly frustrated in your life due to jee etc then this the best place to chill , grow your extra curricular activities. Well the fests here are a lot of fun . We can also bunk a lot there is no problem of attendance so just chill only for 4 engineering years of your life.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: As i am direct second year student so i have been in contact for less time .but in this time i had been observed the teaching staffs and they were helpful the practicals lab and equipment's were excellent and rait collage motivates the student to participate in competition and provide mentors as well as separate labs.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology (RAIT) is housed in a spacious building, part of the huge DY Patil Campus which is home to many other sister institutes. Most of the canteens and faculties are connected internally and there is considerable interaction among people from different faculties. There are close to half a dozen labs (And we mean well-maintained ones!). Even though the college is situated in the DY Patil Deemed University campus it is affiliated to the University of Mumbai. Records are good and average salary offered was around Rs. 3.25 lac p.a. for the previous year. The major recruiter is Infosys. Great progress has been made in the recent years and students claim that RAIT placements are now at par with the best colleges in Mumbai. RAIT has some really dedicated professors. Over the last few years, the standard of the college has increased tremendously and thus excellent teaching staff has been employed in this college. There are some okay teachers. Communication takes place in English. Teachers are not very strict, but at the same time, they're not into favoritism. That's about it.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure includes a stadium and practice ground. If you are a passionate cricketer then it's an advantage for you. The faculty is average. There are some professors who can help you do some awesome projects if you are enthusiastic about it. Placement is good and if you have an overall first-class and are ready to join software MNCs as there are no core companies that approach for hiring. Hope this helps a bit :)

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college provides great facilities. The infrastructure is huge! The canteen is very affordable and amazing food. College fest is huge. Second most huge fest with national as well as international artists being a part of it.The faculty is fine. Self-study is important. Overall personality development is what you can expect in this college.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is just awesome. The crowd is mostly from Kalyan, Thane, Dombivali. The faculty is too good and friendly. Some subjects have fresh faculties for FE's but they are also superb. Infrastructure is best. Awesome airy classrooms and Good seating arrangement. Nice canteens.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Ramrao Adik Institute Of Technology (RAIT) is a complete and balanced package of each and everything an engineer requires. The world class fully hi-tech infrastructure along with equipped labs is a pride of RAIT. The teaching and non-teaching staff of RAIT impress the toughest "student-critic". The series of annual fests and celebrated festivals makes the entertainment level on top. RAIT'S annual fest is amongst the top 5 festivals in Mumbai. The friendly junior-senior relationship builds the perfect environment for any engineer. Last but not the least, the placements acts just like a cherry on top of a cake in RAIT.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Nice and beautiful campus, good teachers. The teaching is very good. English communication is good and the students have a comfortable learning experience. Very very strict. 75% is an absolute necessity. Defaulters are detained straightaway, even at 74.9% attendance!!you can enjoy at the festival.â€œOur director deserves a good amount of appreciation, and we all love him.â€

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology (RAIT) is housed in a spacious building, part of the huge DY Patil Campus which is home to many other sister institutes. Most of the canteens and faculties are connected internally and there is considerable interaction among people from different faculties. There are close to half a dozen labs (And we mean well maintained ones!). Even though the college is situated in the DY Patil Deemed University campus it is affiliated to University of Mumbai. RAIT has some really dedicated professors. Over the last few years, the standard of the college has increased tremendously and thus excellent teaching staff have been employed in this college.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Its a good college with some decent placements but overall there are by no means this college as good as many others out there but overall its good, canteen is costly, seniors are great, very helpful. Go for this college only if you can't get any better than this.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Guys believe me this is the best college i came across. Its just full of life every time. You can study, enjoy, fulfill your dreams, get your capabilities recognized all at a same place nd at a same time. This college is full of opportunities. Once you come into it i donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t think anybody will want to leave it. Nd ya how can i forget the festivals and techfest. Each and every festival is celebrated here will full joy and happiness. Techfests are really knowledgeable as well as total fun. Let me tell you if you want your overall development this is the place where you have to be.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is awesome and also proud to have a international stadium besides our college. Faculties are very supportive and also most importantly here seniors are also very friendly. We need just a air conditioner classrooms due to humid nature of Navi Mumbai

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: A college with wonderful infrastructure supported with current technologies and a room for culture and traditions,that's all what defines Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology (RAIT). It not only encourages a student to be excellent in academics but also to explore himself by being a part of extracurriculars,sports,cultural celebrations and technical fest's. A powerful cultural ambience and student friendly atmosphere along with well-qualified faculties and best placements makes every RAITIAN proud to be a part of it.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is situated within DY Patil College campus in Nerul and so you get good facilities. Faculty and Industry exposure is okay but the placements are great. Apart from academics you have many other committees to join which gives good exposure and you have a good time as well. Horizon- cultural fest of RAIT was very well known till 2010 or so but now its shine has come down.Within campus you have couple of canteens and just outside college you have good options to eat and drink They don't have hostel facility for boys but you can get private PG and rented flats easily. You have many good places around to chill out.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: RAMRAO ADIK INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY, NERULIt is the best collage i have ever seen..A reputted collage.. in all aspects...Excellent teaching make us best at all the things..Its so much happening collage i must say.. 3-4 huge fests... kalarags extra curriculum activities.. evrything makes us so creative and because of this only we get chance to inprove ourself in various feilds lyke sponsership.. creatibity.. publocity.. co-ordimation... team work and so on..Yesss i would proudly say.. whatever i have inproved uptill now is in RAIT!!

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: "RAIT situated at the heart of sprawling dy patil campus is the best place for an engineer to be.The exposure you get in this college is the best apart from studies their are many things to be learnt in this college.placement is always best especially for comps dept.sports you play for dy patil sports association.canteen is one of the best part of RAIT.and last but not the least is HORIZON the annual cultural festival which has international edm artists performing...and the seniors here are very supportive and helpfulfaculty is average but still some are very experienced ones.."

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College has very nice infrastructure. It gives us good quality of facilities. It has a nice canteen which is very neat and clean where you get everything from lunch to snacks and from coldrinks to good quality of juices.it has good placements. Faculty is very good and helping.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: One must opt for RAIT. The college has a good campus environment and also a talented faculty. Good placement.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Admission is through Mumbai University portal. Good education and opportunities. 90% of students are get job. The teaching staff is good. Really good infrastructure. Very good campus life.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The best thing about RAIT is that the teachers here are great at teaching and are understanding. The campus here is beautiful. Although now everything is online, nothing has changed. Teachers are still the same in teaching. You get plenty of workshops to attend which will help you in a job interview and further in life. The admission process was pretty simple. I got my admission through cap round. They considered my MHCET score. I considered two aspects of college selection- 1) Campus and job opportunities, 2) travelling. Since I didn't know any senior or anyone elder than me who was studying engineering, I referred to various websites. And I mostly visited collegedunia.com as it had very relevant and factual information about the college.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: No negative remarks from my side as my days in this college was very good which built me to this level performance-wise confidence-wise I was not a scholar or a topper still but where I'm now is due to college.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College should provide sports goodies and area/ground to play. Because students need some stress buster in this stressfull day. Also students in our college goes to ground which are not even in our college, finds a ground outside college and play their. Even college official volleyball team practices in ground which is not in college.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Best in every type of field. Best atmosphere and best management including account sections also. Nice way of interactions

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure wise not supportive for students as during our unit test there is no place to study. The faculty is not concerned with teacher they are just thinking of completing the lectures for ensuring their monthly pay.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college campus is really big and at a very good location. The college can be accessed easily by auto or bus. The faculties are average and most of them have a long experience in teaching. The college is well maintained and stays one of the top colleges in Navi Mumbai.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Management is really good. Every is perfect by the side of the management committee.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: If a student want to continue his/her passion side by side of Engineering RAIT is the perfect college to join. RAIT gives much needed exposure to students so that they can excel in their passion. Nothing negaive.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The environment is conducive to overall personality growth of the students.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college doesn't provide high placement for other branch other then computer and information technology. The office staff works their best but sometimes they can be pretty rude. Other then that the college has no complaints

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This college has a good history of continuous academic progression.The first thing that an individual considers before taking an admission into any college is placements; and the college provides a very good opportunity for an individual with decent academic performance as well.The college attracts a good number of companies as compared to the other colleges in Navi Mumbai and Mumbai regions

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Ragging is the big issue in the Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology. And Positive thing is it is very sporty college comparatively all colleges from Mumbai and Navi Mumbai regions. So it is moderately good college.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Our college is very good for those who hope to get good engineering life experience and to get the overall development as engineer.they also helps for the placement and during the college they helps us for our development by giving us internship

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The best college in mumbai in current situation. They have great academic and other skills and the members of the college are very great and the staff is great. The project ideas are very much innovative and every one is welcomed in each and every program

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Positive is everything . Negative is lack of management in the end month of semester. Overall good environment, culture. People are fond of extra curriculum. All events are managed by students themselves.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Everything is just amazing and there nothing negative what I can say about it, it just a whole package for anyone who wishes to do engineering and also wants to be proactive in other fields, if you are good in sports and want a platform, definitely this college will help

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There is no negative remarks for my College but I do want to mention that our College is currently know for its cultural festivals much more than academics. The College should try to focus more on the academic aspects as well.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is very good.Not the best in Mumbai I would say but pretty decent.RAIT is the perfect combination of Fun and Study.It provides the environment for the all round growth of the students.The college is located at the very good place.The D Y Patil campus amazing.The Stadium is also in the Campus itself.

College Name: Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure:Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology (RAIT) is housed in a spacious building, part of the huge DY Patil Campus which is home to many other sister institutes. Most of the canteens and faculties are connected internally and there is considerable interaction among people from different faculties. There are close to half a dozen labs (And we mean well maintained ones!). Even though the college is situated in the DY Patil Deemed University campus it is affiliated to University of Mumbai.Placements:Records are good and average salary offered was around Rs. 3.25 lac p.a. for the previous year. The major recruiter is Infosys. Great progress has been made in the recent years and students claim that RAIT placements are now at par with the best colleges in Mumbai. Faculty:RAIT has some really dedicated professors. Over the last few years, the standard of the college has increased tremendously and thus excellent teaching staff have been employed in this college. There are some okay teachers. Communication takes place in English. Teachers are not very strict; but at the same time they're not into favourtism. That's about it. Crowd:A masala mix of scholars, cyber junkies, diehard headbangers, take-it-easy goers, flunkers, Martians, Gujjus etc. can be found at Ramrao Adik Institute of Technology (RAIT)Life in RAIT begins at 9:00 AM and seems to end at 6:00 PM (People never leave, they seem to fade away. RAIT is never lifeless). People are into Computers, rock music...rock music and computers. Half of RAIT comprises cyber nuts the other half sleep on guitars. Canteen:Strangely enough RAIT canteen (managed by Anna) serves good food at very reasonable rates. Thali, Vada Pav, Masala Dosa are favourites. The ambience has been recently upgraded and now attracts students from every department be it medicine or law and of course engineering. The change has been so drastic that alumni who haven't been to their college for long, can't believe it's the same canteen. Hangouts:The basement is the site of all underground and nefarious activities. It houses the engineering canteen and the medical canteen. (Medical? Well the engineering & medical colleges are in the same building & engineering guys share a special relationship with the medicals) Off campus: Dosa Plaza, Rangoli, CCD, Domino's and the DY Patil stadium. Festivals:"Kalaraag" is RAIT's cultural fest that is purely dedicated to performing arts and English, Hindi and prominently Marathi theatre. HORIZON - the inter-college fest. Niyantran, TECHKNOW, TECHMATE, Whizion are other festivals.   PlacementsAcademicsCampus LifeIndustry Exposur

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: College life in V.E.S.I.T is exciting because of all the festivals and days celebrated through out the year. The college is bit strict about the timings of this festivals but they are very well organized. The placements are good with many companies visiting. We are blessed with an amazing infrastructure and facilities. The students crowd here is very enthusiastic. The labrotaries are well equipped and the faculty is good. They give us industry exposure by arranging Industry Visits.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The infrastructure is very good and spacious. It takes the students to Industry Visits for corporate exposure. The various Festivals like Technical Festival, Cultural Festival, Sports Festival, Music Festival and many more. The Placement record of previous year is at a higher level than many other colleges in Mumbai University. The Faculty of my college is strict and supportive.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college boasts a good infrastructure. Proper practical knowledge provides us a better industry exposure. The college crowd and the various festivals conducted makes our college life enjoyable. I am currently in third year and I am expecting a good lot of companies to come. Since the crowd is cosmopolitan, the experience is unique.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college infrastructure is very good. It provides all the necessary amenities. The premises are clean and hygenic. The faculty here is very nice and helpful. There are special lectures regularly from industry professionals which gives an idea of what is going on in the real market and how is it related to our curriculum. The competition among the peers here encourages to perform better. Overall, it is a good and strict college.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college has good infrastructure I.e. proper equipments are available for all the departments. The labs are well equipped. College canteen has decent food quality at a proper pricing. The college timings are very comfortable and also the faculty supports the children in all extracurricular activities. In all one of the best colleges in Mumbai university.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college has a great infrastructure and sufficient place to host a number of events, activities, seminars, etc. The crowd is encouraging in itself, faculty varies from average to good where some teachers do not have sufficient knowledge and the ability to deal with questions being asked by students and there are some who simply excel in their domain. The college locality is not that great but the campus is huge and breathtaking. It should have more industrial visits or some great industrialists visiting the campus and sharing the latest trends would help to increase industry exposure. All events taking place have time restrictions imposed by higher authorities, which is something a hindrance for a college student. Whether it be the annual Utsav or tech fest, they cannot exceed 5pm, which is not desirable. College does not support startup based placements which are not desirable. Even the startups are a great place to learn and explore opportunities, but the college is against that. Hostel food remained the worst expect a few surprises. Students from different parts of the state take admissions here and so there is decent diversity and it helps students to communicate with people from different walks of life, celebrate different festivals with friends, overall the crowd is great, one gets to learn a lot.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Pros. Good infrastructure, well-equipped facility, some really good professors , PRAXIS (technical festival) is very good opportunity if you are into robotics, cultural festivals is a good platform to showcase artistic talents, hostel is inside college campus Cons. Less industrial exposure, follows outdated syllabus, very less focus on innovation, RCF is right next to the campus, so occasional chemical odors

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college is there since 1985 and relocated to a new campus- HASHU ADVANI MEMORIAL COMPLEX in the year 2000. Although the locality around VESIT is not that good, but once inside the campus its a different world. The infrastructure is awesome with a huge library.Each department has different floors with huge and well-equipped labs. The faculty is very knowledgeable and student-centric. VESIT has great records of 100 % placement in top IT companies. Appealing canteen in terms of food and ambience. A lot of variety in food is available and at reasonable prices. The hostel is good without any issues of ragging. The Mess is excellent. However, there is a scarcity of hot water in some floors.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: I had a great 4 years in this college. This college has given me great friends, my first job, beautiful memories which have made an impression for a lifetime.
