Though the college fests were not carried out on a large scale but they definitely taught us team spirit and organizational skills. The faculty is helpful and placements are pretty good.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Renowned companies are invited for the placements. They have good lab setups so that students can have a real life industry experience (for instrumentation engineering). If you are interested doing something in the field of process engineering this is the best college you can get into.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college begins with Prarambh, that is the fresher's party. The college gives plenty amount of opportunities to showcase your hidden talents. Events like debate, group discussion, story writing etc take place in the VESLIT week of literature. Praxis, the technical fest is famous for its mind-boggling events. The cultural fests like Illusions and Utsav actively participate and celebrated by the students in huge numbers. The faculty of the college makes their best efforts in making sure everyone understands what's being taught in class. The doubts are also cleared from time to time. The society's like Music, Cultural, SoRT etc helps in personality development. One must know how to make influential impressions on the faculty as well as the students of the senior batches. It's a learning centre for those interested in learning.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The faculty is good, excellent placement, the crowd is nice, infrastructure is as per the student need, students are helpful. A lot of cocurricular activities take place. There cultural activities too. 4 To 5 fests are conducted. The college has been going for inter-college fests and fresh face contest. It has won many competitions. I had also taken part in one of the fests and it was an amazing experience.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Referred to one of the best colleges in Mumbai, VESIT fails to live up to the expectations. If you are expecting a Jump Street sort of college or a place where you can bunk, this is NOT the place you are looking for. Labs are well equipped in comparison with other engineer colleges. Teachers do not teach well but are good-natured (few exceptions exist). Attendance is strict (75%) which if you fail to achieve leads to assignments or sometimes even parents are called. The crowd consists of decent people from Mumbai (mostly central) and also a few hostilities. You would rarely find yourself bunking the college for a movie Bunking in VESIT refers to sitting in the canteen or going back home. Placements are decent (around 70%) with average packages of 3 lpa (Accenture being the mass recruiter). Extc and extra students end up picking up IT jobs as core companies pick a max of 3 students and you end up competing with some of the best students you can find in an engineer. Instruct students get core companies quite easily. Canteen is cheap but the quality of food is not good. You would enjoy the time Sphoorti comes up. But that would be one of the very few times you will enjoy being in the college. If you are looking for a "college life" college, go for other options.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: They are more into attendance than teaching some important stuff. People and crowd are really Boring and more into books and marks than into Technical knowledge. Attendance is the real issue here and faculties are very arrogant. Placement is limited to Accenture with max 4 lakh annual package. Shortage of girls people and students are really not cooperative. HODs think that they are the owner of the college. Located near slum areas. 40 rs auto from Kurla and Chembur. Events and fests are not so Energetic and enjoyable. Full of lame and selfish people. No playground.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: College is great! Faculty is brilliant, placement is excellent especially for Instrumentation Engineering. There are various cultural as well as technical festivals held per year. 3-4 technical societies are currently active. Instrumentation Engineering is the best branch here because principle is from Instrumentation faculty only.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Though the locality of VESP is not good but it's really awesome when you enter in the college. But it's very strict. It has a great campus and teachers are also ready to help us. It is best college in Mumbai. Our college has very good placements. The new libraries are very well maintained and equipped. Teachers are also good.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college campus and infrastructure is good. At the start there will be festival and fun.seniors are helping and friendly. Lots of exposure and extra curricular activities.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Infrastructure is very good. A Spacious C shaped building with amphi theatre on 2nd floor for various activities. Library is very large and well maintained. Placements are also top class. Sports is also good and faculty is nice and helping.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: "Though the locality of VESIT is not that good... it is really awesome once you enter the college! Campus is really good.Presently, as an outsider I can say that VESIT is academically as well as games and activity wise an excellent college.Good atmosphere exists and it should be the first choice after SPCE/VJTI (VJTI in fact may loose out in long term)."

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Vesit is a best college for students aspiring for further studies as well as in job perspective as many companies come for recruitment company like Accenture take away more than 50 percent of the crowd.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: If your dreaming of good college and placement then definitely this is not the right place. It was a right place but now due to increase in intake college placement and reputation has gone down still not bad colleges.   PlacementsAcademicsCampus LifeIndustry Exposur

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: It is one of the best college known for engineering in Mumbai.The college has beautiful campus with amazing infrastructure.The college has all the necessary facilities.It also has an amphitheater and seminar halls for students.The college has a great atmosphere.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Central place nice college Nice faculty good campus Teachers are friendly Good campus placement Central mumbai Near localty Travel easy Computer engineering Nice faculty Good teacher Good teacher good teacher good teacher good teacher

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: VESIT is a very prestigious college in Mumbai and with a very nice teaching staff and good campus placements. The ratings of VESIT on many websites is really good and i had friends studying there who talked very highly about the college. And hence i decided to choose VESIT

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college management is really nice and teachers are great.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Very good college with good faculty and with the fees which is affordable by every middle class family and scholarships are also provided to those who are not able to pay the fees and there are many extracurricular activities available for the students to find there interests.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: College management was good. But placement officer who was professor at the college was abusing his power. He used to ban students from placements and college management was aware about that.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: I chose VESIT, because this college is one of the top 10 colleges in Mumbai & I like most about my college is their support, scholarships facilities, extra curricular activities, internships in college itself.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The whole college is very helpful & cooperative including the faculty, the non-teaching staff, senior students, security guards, etc. The college is supportive to students in projects, competition, personally development, etc.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college teaching faculty is average but the management is good and the infrastructure is good

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: No there is no negative remark the placement is good if your an above average student . so its a good college . placement is 100 percent here and more over good companies come here . So if your good in studies its a good college.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Positive point is studies is upto the point and the placements are good. Faculty is good. Negative point is the college is situated near to the chemical factory. You dont have any snacks corner near the college. Also the attendance in the college is strict.If you end up in defaulters be ready to write extra assignments to coverup your attendance.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Placement is quit good but less number of students gets the higher packages some time library staff is to annoying we can issue only 2 books at a time no of printers are less in laboratory temporary staff is not too good at teaching This College is one of the Top 10 colleges under Mumbai university

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: The college is very nice and well disciplined. There is no form of ragging carried out. The students also have a mentor who can guide them if they have any problems. There is also service for emergency medical assistance and fire brigade.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Postive: The college encourages students in lot of extra curricular activities. They also give focus on our academics. If you need the college also provides various scholarships for students in need. Negative: Cares a lot for the students, so sometime it leads to unnecessary strictness

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: College has got good Infrastructure , Teaching faculty is excellent and experienced.Academic is good.Exam structure planned for students is proper.More attention is given on writing work rather than execution work.College doesn't have its own ground.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: One of the best colleges to get admission and study under best of best facilities available in Mumbai. They are also available for the internship program being offered in the college during summer and winter break.

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: Very good faculty, Many companies (quite a few of them being IT-centric) come for recruitment. It's a great place for students who want to learn. If you want to enjoy the other facets of a college life more, another college might do more justice.   PlacementsAcademicsCampus LifeIndustry Exposur

College Name: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology, Chembur
Reviews: All top companies visit this colleges:MicrosoftGoogleJP Morgan ChaseNomura HoldingsDeloitte ConsultingSeimensAccenture Services Pvt LtdTCSWiproLnT infotechGE EnergyMorgan StanleyInfosys Patni computers   PlacementsAcademicsCampus LifeIndustry Exposur

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is very good and has a nice Infrastructure. The facility in canteen should improve. The canteen service takes time as it takes 10 minutes for an order to serve. Some of the faculty are very helpful and friendly. T.C.E.T also provides LAN in almost every class.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I would recommend this institute to everyone who wants to pursue their engineering degree. The college also has facilities for the students who wants to go further for higher education. The infrastructure of T.C.E.T is one of the best and clean. Good for engineering.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has made some changes in the timetable recently. It begins at 8.30 in the morning and goes till 5.30 in the evening. Sometimes it becomes very hectic by the end of the week. Overall this is the best college on the western side and provides everything needed.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Good infrastructure and the college tries to provide everything to students what they need to make their career successful. But implementation of every idea is not that efficient as expected. Sometimes the college takes a lot of expenses from the students.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College should hold on to good faculty. The college changes the faculty very often which must be avoided. Although the college has few experienced faculty. Every week the college conducts SOP for the students which are included in their timetable. Overall the college needs a few improvements.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Excellent college with an amazing infrastructure. The campus is very well maintained by the pro care staff and is timely cleaned. Quality education being the motto of the college and it stands by it. College canteen needs more area of occupancy as it gets crowded during lunch hours.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: A bit strict but fun. Studies and enjoyment are very well balanced by the college. The faculty is very supportive and tries their best to make the students understand the concepts. Teachers make use of presentations, models and videos during the lectures.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: All good definitely. The college has M.c D, Pizza hut, Cinemas and other hangout joints around the college. Some of the faculty are very strict and they need their work to be done on time. Defaulters are asked to write remedial. Hygiene is maintained in the college.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Good college except some of the teaching staff. The college has nice infrastructure. The college staff is very helpful and friendly. LAN connection is available in every room of the college. The college also provides a digital library for the students.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: TCET is the only college where we are not only studying but we are also enjoying. I love the atmosphere of T.C.E.T. The college has a ground with facilities for games like volleyball, football, cricket, basketball etc. There are many hangout joints near the college.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Good infrastructure experienced faculty. The college that provides their students more facilities than other colleges in Mumbai. Quality education and well-mannered teachers make studying in this college very comfortable. Cleanliness is taken of utmost care here.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Students are made to make unnecessary expenses. Otherwise, the efforts put in by the faculty and the management in developing the institute is appreciative. The college has a decent library, but during exams, its gets too crowded. During lunch hours, the canteen is also crowded and canteen ventilation is very poor.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It's currently the one of the best colleges in Mumbai. The college is also been NBA accredited. The campus is very nice and clean. The canteen food is good but could have been better. Some teachers are friendly and the seniors are very helpful. There are many hangout areas around the college.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Practicals are not really up to the mark. Application of studied theory in real life projects is the most ignored part of this college. S.S.L lab teaches the most unused and outdated simulation software. Labs lack datasheets. However apart from the mainstream talks, canteen serves decent food.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has one of the best infrastructures in the western suburbs. A lot of fests are conducted and there is at least 1 fest per month. The college has a huge ground with basketball and volleyball courts. The library is very well maintained and the placements are good.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college provides everything the students need and more for academics as well as extra-curricular activities. Placements are great. An ideal college for graduating from. The college has a great infrastructure and is very well maintained and clean.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Thakur college has provided me with a platform to express my raw talent.Nourish it and sharpen it., that's the primary goal of this college.To be confident and humble. Embark my knowledge. Showcase the others of what one is capable of by providing commendable in and of support. To make a student a complete product because he/she goes into the corporate world.Personally with all my experience , I strongly recommend you this college. Great atmosphere for students to explore something.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Its a great college for students willing to pursue their Engineering Degree. The college has THE BEST infrastructure and an amazing campus. The teachers are quite friendly and helpful. Teachers use ppts, videos to teach. Many hangout joints are also located in and around the college.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Nice place for the people with theoretical knowledge. The balance between practical and lectures is very much needed. A lot of fests are celebrated here. Almost in every week, there is a fest. The DJ during the fests is worth watching. The library is very nice.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college people are very friendly and supportive. The admin department is a bit slow, best place to be during once engineering career. Quality education is the motto of the college. The Teaching staff is very nice and helpful. The campus is best in the western suburbs.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Faculty members are highly experienced which is the best part of this Institute. Very modern college with all the facilities. TMKOC shootings and other serials shootings are done here. TECT also has a huge ground for students. But it's closed in the morning.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Faculties are helpful. Great infrastructure. But need some improvements, there should be another lift available for students and also need some improvements in maintenance of washrooms and all. During my first year, i need to climb 5 floors every day to make up to the class.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College is good except the admin office which works in an undisciplined way. Sometimes the people who are needed are not present on time. The professors in the first year are very strict as compared to the one in the second year. But all in all, its a perfect place for learning.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: TCET has been an amazing place for me to study. A perfectly build infrastructure, well experienced teachers, well-mannered peons. The library is just amazing and has all the books that a student needs during his engineering course. Biographies and other novels are also available in the library.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I feel proud to be a part of TCET. It doesn't always give the things that a student asks for but provides him with the things that he needs. Me being a diploma student faced some issues in the beginning but the teachers are very supportive and guided me through the topics.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the best engineering college in west Mumbai. The college has very experienced and concerned teaching staffs. Although some professors need all their assignments in time or the students are called to the college day after day. TCET EXTC dept. takes the attendance very seriously.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has done its best in balancing the theoretical knowledge of the students. Some teachers use ppts and videos to explain tough topics. But some teachers are very strict and need all the write ups from time to time, Or else the student might get into trouble.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College is an ok type and not up to the mark :(. Especially the staff members of administration office and library staff are very rude. They don't give answers. People there act like a "municipal Sarkari office". Also, during lunch time why they don't allow us to eat in our class? Canteen is always full and we have to sit on staircases and eat.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Great decision to take an admission in this college. It provides everything to the student and an amazingly experienced staff. Well, mannered peons and other non-teaching staff. Classrooms are very clean and there are no broken furniture or whatsoever.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: TCET is a very well renowned college in the western suburbs and it stands by it. The campus is just too amazing. The hygiene and cleanliness are best maintained. The peons are well mannered and supportive too. There are many hangout areas in and out of the college.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It's better than what I expected. The infrastructure and the campus are best in its sense. The cleanliness is well maintained. The Professors are very good and friendly. I'll recommend it to anyone who wants to pursue the engineering degree. Also, it is amongst the top 10 colleges in Mumbai.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Great Experience to have. Best teachers. Best Faculty. Best in almost everything. But the canteen needs a lot of improvements. The food is good but the service is not up to the mark. There are a lot of hangout sites near the college. An enjoyable experience to have.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the high-class infrastructure. Best quality teaching and supportive staff. The teachers give extra lectures on weekends for the students who missed any important topics. TCET also takes regular feedbacks from students and takes it very seriously.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Excellent! This college gives us a huge platform to expand our knowledge and imagination. The Teachers are highly experienced and are very friendly. Some of them are a bit strict. Doubt are solved by the teachers after the college hours too! Very supportive and helpful staff.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Very well managed College, the balance between extracurricular and academics required. The people participating in other activities are not given attendance. This brings the student name in the defaulters list. College needs to make an improvement in this.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is one of the best. studies related faculty are pretty good. cultural activities are also pretty much.The crowd in the college is decent and a mixture of all types. College canteen is also one of the best. Labs are in good condition and equipment are pretty neat.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: TCET is an can be described in just one word - "AWESOME". Everything that is provided to the students is always better than what one expects. Cleanliness, quality education, Best infrastructure makes this one of the BEST colleges on the western side. The staff is also very cooperative.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is good for doing time-pass. There are many places around the college where students mostly hang out. Although the college is best but the canteen service is not good. An order takes 15-20 minutes to get ready. Better go out and eat from there.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: TCET has an abundance of experienced faculty. From peons to the HOD everyone's like a friend. The laboratories are very well maintained and the campus is kept clean up to the mark. The college also takes regular feedbacks from students about almost everything. BEST in the western line.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: TCET=great facilities+great opportunities+great faculties+great infrastructure+supportive staff+great environment. The college lacks nothing. It has everything. During weekends and holidays serial and movie, shootings take place. We get to see actors and actresses then. BEST in the world campus.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Best college in the western suburbs. The college has everything nearby. Movies, Food courts, Bus stop, share auto for the railway. No tension whatsoever. The people here are very supportive and helpful. No complaints about the teaching faculty whatsoever.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Top College, Gave me more than what was expected. But sometimes it seems like something is missing. New staffs need to build up themselves. The old staff is very Experienced. The canteen is a bit crowded and sometimes there is no place to sit. The canteen service is very slow.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The best place for Engineering. Everyone is blended perfectly and supportive. Every room in TCET has LAN port. The teachers are very friendly and helpful. TCET also provides mentors for every student who always stand by us during tough times. Teachers also keep extra lect. for the one who misses lectures.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The infrastructure of the college is worth watching. An amazing campus and the staff takes efforts to make their students get the concepts they are teaching. Some professors share their ppts which are of great help during the Exams. The auditorium is very clean and best.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the best college in my area. It's nearby and the non-teaching staff has a very mature thinking. The coordination between teachers and peons make it easier for students to get what one needs. The festivals of TCET is very famous and shootings of various Hindi serials are done here.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The best college for all kinds of students. The campus, labs, library, ground all is well maintained. The college always has something under renovation or construction. Friends can be made very easily here. If you can make a group then your college life is SET.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This the one of the top colleges in Mumbai and it stands so. The college campus is the best place to roam around. The college has Mc. D, Domino's and 2 Movie theaters nearby. Students always have a get together in these areas. The college needs 70% attendance which it takes strictly during the end Term.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The teachers about whom we heard from our seniors were very helpful. But recently few of the teaching staff have been replaced with new recruits. They do not have a deep knowledge of the subject and don't take efforts to solve the doubts asked by the students.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is very nice and the campus is worth watching. Cleanliness is always maintained and the lab equipment's never run out of stock. The class has a very well maintained furniture and AC's. The stationary always has a rush as there is only one person operating in.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has almost everything that a student requires. Life here is very sorted and the student and teacher rapport is up to the mark. There is good coordination between  students and teachers. The campus is amazing and one of the best in Mumbai.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has a great and amazing campus. One can spend a whole day just roaming in the campus. The college ground always has been a hangout place for cricket lovers. The teaching here lacks personal counselling. The college needs to work a lot on this.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The knowledge of the teaching staff is good but a balance between practical and theoretical knowledge should be maintained. Sometimes it becomes too hectic for the students to gasp the lectures. But the students are allowed to meet the teachers after college so as to ask doubts.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: More than satisfactory. The college is better than what I expected and the campus is just too awesome. The teachers are knowledgeable and helpful. Would recommend it to the one who needs quality education. The objective of providing quality technical education with contemporary global requirements is followed by TCET.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College life is great. The infrastructure is awesome. The campus is too good. The faculty is really experienced and always willing to help and clarify doubts. The canteen has a really good menu. Cleanliness is maintained throughout the campus. Placements are also good. Various pre-placement programmes are undertaken so as to help the majority of students to be placed. Also, a large ground is included in the campus, with a dedicated basketball court, volleyball court, football ground, cricket pitch, etc. Thus overall, it's a really good college which provides all-round development of the students.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology (TCET) celebrates Zephyr (Technical Festival) in odd semesters, Sojourn (Cultural Festival) in even semesters. They also have a Sports Festival. Great atmosphere during the festivals. Students have a gala time. Thakur College of Engineering and Technology (TCET) is very strict in attendance matters. Minimum requirement is 60%. Students lingering around at Thakur Cinema if caught are sent to classrooms forcefully, of course that's only during college hours.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: A mix breed of crowd - fun loving as well as nerds - students blend well though. Entertaining, decent and fun-to-have life. Majority are, however, not much interested in studies though the scene is changing since a few years. Pizza Hut, CCD, Colassa (Hukkah Joint/Chinese Food), Monarch Restaurant, Jumbo King Vada Pav are all close to Thakur College of Engineering & Technology (TCET). Dominos, Nirvana and some excellent hangouts in Kandivali Lokhandwala are also very famous. Thakur Cinema and Kulraj Broadway is the place where you'll find most of the college.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Average faculty. Teachers take the pains to teach and students understand what they are taught as well. The teachers are very helpful. Somehow, the EXTC department students aren't very fond of the teachers and their teaching. They've loads to complain about them. Fortunately, Computers and IT department students have lauding words for their professors.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology (TCET) has excellent Infrastructure. One of the best in town. Huge campus. Infosys, Tech Mahindra, Accenture and Syntel are the major recruiters at Thakur College of Engineering. Average salary must be around Rs. 2.5 lac/year. Placement records over the last few years have been close to 100%.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: An overall development of a student is guaranteed.Be it Academics, Fests & events, Faculties, Placements everything is overall excellent at Thakur.Infrastructure, College Ground & Garden, College Auditorium is something that you will fall in love with.Once you step out of college you will find all the places for hanging out with friends or girlfriend. Be it multiplexes, soda pubs, cake/coffee/ice cream/gift shops, restaurants, gardens, D mart & malls & ya also khaugali..:):):)Also the location of college is good, in a sense easily reachable by all modes of transport available.And one more thing to add you will frequently find TV & Film stars in college for shooting. So a definite place to goo for having entire package.....:):):):)

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: college life is going little good but its too complecated doing engineering . college infrasturcture is awesome. faculties are also good and they are supporting ,good teaching ,and students get chance to participate in several activities. and placement  and scholarship is also available in our college. and the last thing is i dont know about hostel because i never experienced hostel life:)

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College infrastructure is the highlight of this college. Good faculty but too many junior teachers. Labs are excellent. Cultural and other activities are well appreciated and organized by students. Top companies come for placement in the first 2 days.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has great infrastructure and is one of the top 10 colleges in Mumbai.The college has  good teaching faculty .It has a decent placement record .The biggest strength of the college is its infrastructure.It provides decent industry exposure.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The infrastructure of the college is great. The faculty is helpful and tries their best to make the topics clear to the students. The various events in college also give the students certain kind of exposure towards technical as well as non-technical things. Maintain an overall 75% attendance , you'll face less problems in writing a bulk of assignments together.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is situated at Kandivali East. The college has a huge campus and a huge ground to play sports in free time. There is some space outside the canteen and a small garden to sit and have fun with your friends. Talking about the faculties then the faculties are highly qualified and have Great knowledge. The crowd is quite energetic and I really love this college

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Studying IT at Thakur was really fun and engaging , it has a very vibrant atmosphere which helps to do better always. The staff and faculty has always been a support system to students. I being a part had been really helpful with events and seminars which gets conducted to help us develop other skills and industry exposure. Also Thakur College has always given best placements to students.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I had some of the best moments of my life in the college. Attending college and lectures is fun. College has a good infrastructure and all the necessary amenities. The campus environment is cool and pleasant. The faculties are friendly and co-operative. Laboratories are well equipped.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Though on a higher end with respect to course fees, the college provides all the amenities in return that one can expect out of any college. Teachers here are knowledgeable and very friendly. They teach with full zeal and provide every bit if help necessary. The library is  big and spacious and has almost every book required by students.All in all, it was a very good college!

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Its a very good college, good ambience. Teachers take the pains to teach and students understand what they are taught as well. The teachers are very helpful. Excellent canteen. Very roomy but gets completely occupied as it is shared by students of all the faculties. Great food. Has excellent Infrastructure. Entertaining, decent and fun-to-have life.

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: "as per the teaching area college is best and has all well equipped facilities and infrastructure. the main concern for the student is fees of the college.college has the particular area called t & pÃ¯Â¼Ë†training and placementÃ¯Â¼â€°only helping the student to crack the interview of the best industries."

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: "It is the one best institute in Mumbai Best faculty and best teaching experience "

College Name: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: the infrastructure provided by Thakur college is way better than any college in Mumbai and also the placement facilities are average.there is a good scope for sports as Thakur college participate in various college across and outside Mumbai.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: My college is pretty good in many aspects .The infrastructure and lab equipment is very good and well maintained Maine?.the . Practicals and assignments are conducted in a orderly and regular manner. The faculty is good with their content and it's delivery.College life is made fun with numerous events and workshops.,...............................

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: It's a nice college with a great infrastructure. Everything from the classrooms to the canteen to the bathrooms to the seminar hall is just too good. It consists of a mixed crowd. Some of them are studious and some don't really care about what's going on in class. You'll find everything, right from the cool crowd to not so cool crowd. The faculty is also fine but most of the times students sit in class only for attendance. The placements are good too. The canteen provides a great variety of food and it's fun to be there. The area around the college also has great food.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: A graduation college is about experiencing a lot of new things and finding yourself. D J Sanghvi is able to provide you a great platform for this and get in a bit of studying done too. Engineering is a stream most people will not stick to after passing out but DJ Sanghvi will be a good place to explore options. Faculty in the first year is great.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: It is fun and studious at the same time. The faculty is really helpful and encouraging since they are experienced. Extracurricular activities are widespread (like cultural, tech and sports fest). Various student programs are available which help to learn outside from our major degree. Internships are not a part of the curriculum but they should be added.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: DJ is really crowded, the intake of students is too much given their tiny infrastructure and a limited number of classrooms and labs. The competition is fierce especially in Extc, etrx, computers and IT department. Don't ever fall behind. The teachers with high experience are really good. New teachers are okayish. Labs are great, equipment is great. The campus is negligible, you cannot have any activity or fun in the college. Built for studying.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Itâ€™s a great college with a great campus. With natural, greenly environment. Faculty members are also very supportive and well experienced. Food in the mess is good and the hostel is also very good. For placement many big companies come to campus, almost 80-90% students get the confirmed job. Since it is a well-known engineering college in Mumbai as well as run by a well-known trust so you are able to do whatever you want with learning. It also develops your overall personality.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Infra: DJ Sanghvi is good infrastructure wise. If the ACs are there then they should be functional that's all Industry Exp: I don't blame the college but the MU for that. But professor can include and give time to students for innovative projects on cutting edge technologies College Life: DJ can have more festivals Placement related concerns: Professors and students should make collective efforts by encouraging prep for dream companies Hostels: - Student Diversity: Full of Gujjus Affordable: Not affordable

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Great campus and the learning was enormous. The faculty is good but not up to the mark. More emphasis on theoretical knowledge and very less on practical knowledge. The crowd is good and is a little more dominated by Gujaratis'. A little expensive as the fees is too high.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The faculty encourages us to work even harder and created a dynamic environment that could prepare us better for future. I always passionate about learning new things and actively participated in many coding competitions. College like included much more workload and challenging tasks compared to school life and that helped me get the better out of me.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Great infrastructure, wonderful crowd, the faculty is not too great but helpful.Attendance has become a bit strict these days. Canteen is great, vice principal supports students a lot. Most of the student chapters are not good enough. But it's a given that you'll enjoy your 4 years here.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Amazing experience in terms of overall development of yourself. Good faculty and very bright students. This college does not only give you the bookish knowledge and good grades but also concentrates on your other skills like presentation, leadership, extra curricular activities etc.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college infrastructure was over the mark, with facilities for the gymnasium, multiple computer labs, game room as well as specialized labs for different specializations. The canteen facility was below average and there were no hostels. The affordability factor is very low since they charged high fees. The area is also very nice and I would recommend it as one of the best colleges in Mumbai. The industry exposure is low compared to other institutes, but placements were pretty good with a wide range of salary packages. The flagship events Pulse and Parichay were one of the best memories of my college life. Some of the faculty were exceptionally good and the remaining were of average quality. The student crowd was amazing and had a good constitution of middle-income as well as high-income students. The overall experience was really amazing and fruitful from my perspective.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The 4 years at DJ Sanghvi college were truly memorable. From students to faculty, the crowd is simply amazing. From big speckled nerds to sweet eye candies, every1 is sure to find the right companion. The faculty is decently good too. Friendly and have the right skills (there always are exceptions). Education infrastructure is awesome. The labs are good. You have got AC everywhere too. There are several cultural committees too and the cultural and tech fest are decently good too. a great source to gel with your peers, seniors and also the faculty. Placement is decently good too. You are sure to crack urself a job, if you wish to. The canteen is okay, and if u still don't find what u want, just step outside the college and u have the best tasting street food all around. The only major problem is the lack of infrastructure for any sports lovers like myself. And yes the fees too. Too heavy on your parent's pockets.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: I was part of Electronics department and I must say that this department has best lab facilities compare to other colleges. Crowd is superb and diversified. If you want to grow in technical field you will find people who will spend time in labs even after college hours. If you want to grow your overall personality there are many cultural committes who will help you improve it. This college crowd is better than all the colleges in Maharashtra

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: DJ Sanghvi college of engineering is one of the best engineering college in mumbai. Crowd and people over there are best. And mainly the infrastructure and college placements are awesome. Teaching staff also hatsoff. Conducts various techincal activites which helps students for improving their technical knowledge.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Good facilities with awesome infrastructure and really good teaching and non teaching staff. An actual dream college. There might not be a campus to roam around but the other amenities like library, canteen etc pretty well cover up for that part. Lastly, seniors and crowd is really good. That ensures a smooth going four years of degree and proper guidance from seniors as well as other people in the college.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: D.J. Sanghvi is an amazing college. You will find everything you ask from a college except a big campus. But apart from that the infrastructure and teachers are really good. The fest held in this college is also one of it's kind ensuring complete fun and entertainment. You can surely think of D.J. Sanghvi as an apt choice if you are looking for a good engineering college

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: For mechanical engineering, there are no labs right now. But a new blog is under construction so fingers crossed .. teachers are very helpful and if u r good with them then they will be good wid u. The canteen is one of the best you will ever see ... it's fully air conditioned .. sounds bookish but students do spend a lot of time there. However there is no campus I.e. no place to sit and enjoy the day while bunking. You will end up sitting in an empty class or in the gallery if you bunk. Library is decent and an amount of books will seem to be scarce during exam, trick is to keep renewing it after borrowing it a week in advance ... hope this helps.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: This is one of the Best colleges in Mumbai, this college is complete AC and with one of the best Infra in Mumbai. I feel the faculty here is good and take care of every student. The crowd here is majorly Gujju. College Fests are one of the big fests in Mumbai. The college is in lavish area i.e. in Vile Parle, very close to Juhu beach. The college is surrounded by many other colleges like Meethibai, Baghubhai, NMIMS etc. The college is equipped with an awesome canteen that offers hell long list of tasty food. Interiors of the college are well maintained and in some parts you feel like walking to the five-star hotel. Not only canteen but also the street food outside the college is well known in whole Mumbai. The best pass time in college is obviously Juhu beach and roaming around on the streets of Vile Parle. If you want to play pool and try your hand in bowling then Prime mall near to the college is best for you. This is the place where college organizes Counterstrike matches, pool and snooker tournaments. If you want to work out the college has an awesome gym for you equipped with all modern tools. The college has fests Trinity which are the blend of Cultural fest, Sports fest, and Technical fest. You get to learn a lot about the leadership skills from Your seniors during these fests. With big companies offering jaw-dropping packages to grads, it has attracted the attention of many people.Overall it feels awesome to be a part of such a sophisticated institute.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: DJ sanghavi college is one of the best colleges. The infrastructure i.e. fully air conditioned with best of lab facilities. The faculties are also good at teaching, experienced and helpful. DJ sanghavi give a nice atmosphere for a student's development in all ways.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: For all those who thought that life outside IIT is nothing worthwhile, I'd like to redirect them to a building(yes we don't have a campus :( ) just in front of Cooper Hospital,Vile Parle,Mumbai-56 There's where life starts and you'll never regret that you walked through those gates in the first place with that admission paper in your hand. Although I must admit that we have no grounds as such, but the infrastructure is one of the best in Mumbai, with proper air conditioned classrooms, well equipped labs and an amazing canteen. Now coming to the most important aspect of college life (other than friends) , faculty. The faculty is pretty good as well, Now like all colleges you may find some brilliant teachers and some not so brilliant, but the average I have to say is pretty good. Placements , well they're one of the best in Mumbai, with quite a share of core companies as well. Overall I'd like to say that this is an amazing place to nurture your personality and make it big in life. Cheers.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Nice college. Professors are excellent. Only thing this college lacks is a campus!! Canteen has been renovated and it is amazing! Lots of opportunities come along the way. Computers and EXTC are the best fields of study in this college. Overall. It's one of the finest engineering colleges in Mumbai.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Undoubtedly infrastructure of the college is the best, but as well the faculty and the environment is great. From the clerks to the principal everyone is supporting and wishes the best for the students. The placements are great and the college allows to get a good exposure in the outside world. Faculty is helpful and encourages every student to do something out of the box. Superb college life. Any engineering student would expect this.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: A Place with bunch of smart people who are very clear on what they want to do in future.College that focuses mainly on extracurricular activities and less on academics and makes you realize the bigger picture of life.Not very strict on attendance so you can focus on what you want to do (Eg:-Higher studies,sports and extra curriculars). Best infrastructure for an engineering college in Mumbai.Placements on par with the best engineering colleges.Direct Industry exposure is limited.Faculties like every other college (You will find few excellent and helpful faculties and few not that good.Does not have a hostel

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: At this fee and city FMS is a good option to do MBA. It is a MLSU AFFILIATED college, with all basic amenities, good staff and regular classes. Provides specialisation in marketing finance hr and e-commerce

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: As in college does not have ant negative remarks. It has a good environment, satisfied faculty, average staff and a good placement which can be improved a bit. The classrooms are well designed, marbled floor, smart boards and air- conditioned. The library is also air- conditioned with every kind of reference books available. Canteen also air- conditioned quick services, good quality food and hygiene. ID scanners are also installed which made easy to enter the campus.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: I have addressed everythig in the above questions that I guess that this answer wont be required. They might have improved more in the past 2 years or might have undergone some changes, and I hope it will be a good college for students.

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The surrounding area is very silent and there are many attractions around the college in the bearby distance and transportation facilities are very nice. As train station and bus stands are at walking distance for long travelling students

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Positive remark is that every thing is changing digitally such as morining attendance is done by emtering the college which has barcode scamner system and best supporting faculty Online portal to get notes etc Negative point is that the college must improve the training of faculty as per new generation and change the existing syllabus to the modern era

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: It is a good college overall development takes place resides in the heart of Mumbai such as vile Parle and just lacks in only one factor that is outdoor sports other than that it is one of top4 colleges of Mumbai including IIT Bombay

College Name: Dwarkadas J Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is the best in every sector like people, infrastructure, faculty, placements, results, etc. You will probably spend the best days of your life here. Do go for the college if you get admission over here!   PlacementsAcademicsCampus LifeIndustry Exposur

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Terna college has good Infrastructure with mod labs and apple labs along with a well-maintained library to cater your study needs. Experienced professors. Friendly environment for students. Lots of cultural and technical activities are organized every year. Hostels and canteens are well maintained. The only complain I have with this college is below average campus placements. TCS is only the big company that conducted placements, rest are pool campus placements or very small companies.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Terna engineering college lags basic infrastructure such as adequate working computers and printing machines.The entire department depends on upon a single printer assigned to it which is also used by other departments at times.Our college could increase corporate exposure by taking initiatives to be more outgoing and invite other colleges and hold competitions on a state as well as national level and stop focusing just on academics.The college also does not kindle the interest among students to innovate and only favours the students who achieve high scores thus being biased and partial.College life could be more happening if various imminent guests were invited and various competitions could be held which would make Terna famous and be a sought after college.The placements are the lowest point to be mentioned about the college, as they follow the mantra that if a student does not make it into TCS it is the end of his career graph and he is left to fend for himself.Other than TCS, only two or three companies come for campus placements hence leaving a majority of the students unplaced.The college faculty would repeatedly harass students based on presentations and journals sending the students back and forth for correcting petty issues (such as drawing lines, changing an order of questions,etc) thus wasting the students valuable time .The students are friendly but mostly speaking in the local dialect thus creating a language and social barrier.The college is affordable as the fees are quite low.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college provides us the best of campus life it is well equipped with hostel facilities an auditorium playground. It has various committees working inside it for welfare if the students like CSI,IEEE,IETE,WDC,ANTI RAGGING COMMITTEE,ALUMNI COMMITTEE, PLACEMENT CELL. Being a marketing head of alumni committee inside it.Have got a brilliant chance to get exposed to industrial commercial people.it has may cultural events for a fun of students.Overall a great institution to explore ourselves.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: You can easily guess from ratings what kind of college it is. Below average infrastructure and faculty. Pathetic placement. Just imagine wasting your valuable four years for nothing. If you want placement there is only one company. The mother of all. TCS. IF YOU FAIL TO GET INTO TCS THEN IT'S PRETTY MUCH END OF ROAD FOR YOU IN TERMS OF CAMPUS PLACEMENT AT TERNA. So beware. Make your decision wisely.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Fast developing , well planned , superb infrastructure gives this college a very bright future. Dynamic leadership, motivated youth and enterprising teachers make sure that the college is Moving in the right direction and emerging as a leader among all colleges nearby

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Those of us who are college veterans will never forget our freshman year at college. Some of us may like to forget our freshman year, but, in general, it is a time filled with anticipation, some anxiety, and wonderful discoveries. College is a lot different than high school. You may decide to commute from your home to a local campus. Your freshman experience will definitely make an impression on you. Without a doubt, though, the most dramatic freshman year is for those living away from home. What can you expect as you head off into the wonderful world of higher education? The first thing youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll notice is the workload. It will be heavier and more intense than you ever experienced before. The major challenges of college work are the large volume of reading, the short deadlines, and the writing, writing, writing. A related effect that can be brought on by the workload is doubt, frustration, and possibly loneliness. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be away from the comforts and friendships your home provided for you over the previous years.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Faculties- All faculties selected for each department are having good knowledge in their respective field of learning.Infrastructure- It has improved and is still under construction which is a good sign of development.Placement- If you are eligible (good enough) then you will certainly get placement.Canteen- Canteen is good and spacious.Life- Life is enjoyable especially after the first year.Technical and Cultural fest are amazing and enjoyable.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure-The infrastructure has quiet improved from past due to recent construction work. A new reading room is just developed which is quite good.Faculty- Faculty is average. Some of the teachers are good.Placement- Placement is very good. TCS is the major recruiter. If you are eligible for placements you will certainly get placed.Hostel- Hostel is decent  though space is less due to sharing of hostel between the dental college and engineering college.College Life- Decent enough.You have to toil in to get through.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I think the best college for engineering. Teaching faculty is well qualified and they are very helpful. The college has a good infrastructure, placement is also very good, the student crowd is very good. Affordability is awesome. Hostels are also very good.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Terna college is quite a decent college. The placements have improved. The faculty is not so good, but that's the case with most of the colleges. Canteen is good and spacious but still you won't find a seat as it is normally full. The crowd is good and helping. Infrastructure has improved due to recent construction work. Overall a decent college.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: If you are future study aspirant you can opt for it. It has very good study environment, Mixed classes crowd,.. Good for you if you are happy with peaceful life. You will get everything here..! You need to ask for everything and you will get that. No glamour type Fandaas...

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The only college in Maharashtra which has mechatronics engineering, placement for I.t. is excellent but for other branches there is no placement, a teacher is not very well trained and hence if you a self-learner then it is best opportunity for mechatronics engineering Student.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College Infrastructure - After looking at this college, we feel it needs some kind of resurrecting element to enhance its beauty. Frequent reconstruction resulted  in no improvement to date.Faculty- Poor in terms of knowledge. You have to rely on external resources(paid). Sometimes you feel like going on and teaching them. Lack of dedicated and experienced faculties.Placement- Decent. Only toppers get placement, need others are fooled. The Placement officer lacks professionalism.Labs- The college needs a lot of improvising. Most of the instruments are faulty. Only promises of improvement are made. There is a shortage of printer, so submissions could be the nightmare. Printer-student ratio is 1:60.Hostel- Lack of space as the hostel is shared among dental and engineering students.Campus- The college has a big ground but it is not maintained well.Life- Life seems to be dull, boring.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is nice. The teaching staff is good and great placements. Cultural, sports and technical activities are held. It has a good library with all important books available. Also, a big ground for students to play n conduct various activities. The hostel is big n kept clean for students.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It is a disciplined, strict but also an enjoyable place and like a second home for students. We do all activities including curricular, extra curricular and cultural activities. The staff, as well as non-teaching staff, is supportive, friendly and understanding.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college's life is exciting, only if you have some bunch of amazing classmates. The Architecture's ok, who stays in college ;) Hangouts are not enough, but the area around is developing at high pace, so you can expect something good. Otherwise, if you are damn studios go for it, It has some quality teaching staff. Last and the most important, Fests here are a blast. Do enjoy.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College faculty is very good and helps us to not only our syllabus bit also other courses and extra knowledge.Unity among our IT department is one of the best things in our department. The campus is good. Canteen food is nice.Hostal is in the campus and it is livable.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There are only handful faculties who teach well.Hostel and mess faculty is good.There are few labs good.Apple lab is impressive. No one college in Navi Mumbai having apple lab only terna college having apple lab.Placement is not good from last 2 years.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: TPCT's Terna Engineering College is a good option for a Navi Mumbai resident, try traveling time may come handy for a Mumbaikar with the frequent train issues at  harbour line.But the college quite near(just a 3-5 min walk )from Nerul Station.Infrastructure is decent and has improved within past few months with a new library/reading room being built(which is amazing). The college has a good, big ground at the center of its campus. The college has a newly built auditorium which you can be proud of. There is a nice little pond with few fishes which is situated at the back end of the college. Course & Faculty- The college has introduced a new branch called "Mechatronics"  last year which is  introduced first time in any college in Mumbai University.The college has a handful of good teachers and that's where it lags behind when compared with other Navi Mumbai colleges.The attendance is very strict and if you don't complete the much required 75% then you may have to solve previous year question papers and you end up getting quite fewer marks in internals and in a worst case your parents may also be called. The college also has a "TecRobo" lab which has been set up by IIT Bombay, so if you love robotics you will enjoy here.Industry Exposure is now increased with a couple of courses organized by the college to really make you learn what industry needs.Canteen- A new canteen has been built, quite read quite a reasonable price and a large number of items available. But most of the students enjoy hostel's mess food which is much better than canteen(making you realize your home's taste).Festivals-There are a few festivals organized in Terna  like Resonance(cultural fest) and Avalon(technical festival).Most of the students participate in Avalon and mainly the event is robot-centered.A no of sports events are organized like cricket, volleyball, badminton, etc.The college also has something who is good at acting, dancing, singing, etc which is organized by Antarang, a cultural committee.Placements- The college has a quite decent placement, Hexaware, around 50%-60%  students get placements here. TCS is the major recruiter while IGHexaware, Atos, etc are also recruiters.College Life-You will enjoy here but at the same time, you have to work hard at the same time.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is fun.Perfect place to mould our career.All faculties are very supporting.Study wise.Enjoyment wise.etc etc. A perfect place in all aspects including extra curricular activities.College fests are awesome too..lots of enjoyment.. .dance..its simply wowiee

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The campus at Terna Engineering College is huge but not as good as other colleges. There is a big enough central ground. Many equipment in the lab are faulty. Although the computer labs are well equipped with good computers and the necessary peripherals.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The faculty at Terna Engineering College is relatively less experienced and therefore not competent though the telecom department has a decent faculty.60% of the students get placement. The average package is Rs. 3 lac p.a.The major companies are Infosys and Patni.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The principal has changed recently, the standard will drop again! Agreed the principal was dictator but students used to get good term work and viva marks. Students hardly fail in viva and Practical in I.T dept ..If u get in I.T dept go for it else don't take admission here.Placement officer is a showoff with hardly any communication skills.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: don't ever dare to come in this college...ur career will get destroyed...the faculty don't have manners to talk with students..their English sucks..they look pathetic..this is just like cuba prison ..it is true that 90% of the crowd are like villagers..we are from the 10% wasting our precious lives in this college..people here talk hinglish which u'll not understand...this is my sincere request to u that if u want to enjoy our life don't take admission to this college..bcoz im from this college and im repenting..

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: First of all,this is a non-minority college. so u cant expect a good crowd. colleges like vjti, vidyalanka r are also non-minority where the crowd isn't that good.so u cant say that vjti is a bad college. isn't it?.....whereas colleges such as tsec, kj somaiya have minority where gujratis n sindhis r allotted 50% of the seats. n they r from city limits only.and colleges like this, have 50% reservation. so u cannot make a mistake by expecting a good crowd in any of the non-minority colleges. and in terms of studies (pass %)terna holds one of the top positions among the navi-Mumbai colleges. this college has also a good placement record.....

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Teachers are horrible...even students can teach better than them ....but hey..isn't this the story with all the Engg coll in navi Mumbai..But the students of this college work very hard to bring the name up and it is bcz of them that we are able to find some fun at the time of the fests.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college has huge campus, it's an A graded college. Many companies's recruit round the year, all the labs are well equipped. and talking about the faculty right from beginning (i.e GE DEPT.) all the teachers have teaching experience more than 16 years .and faculties of comp/It/EXTC/EL EX are highly experienced in their particular field some of faculties have even worked with Cern labs, BARC and many other...talking about canteen there are two canteen one in college and other near hostel...the college is best at what it does . College fees is Rs 57,680 none of the private A graded colleges in mumbai has so low fee

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: college is very strict in case of term work marks . e-school software decides the term work marks of students where no manipulation can be made. Its unlike other colleges like VESIT OR SIES where students are thrown term works and made their aggregate to increase. if u r in this college, be prepared to work hard rather than to get easy n free marks..... after all its engineering.... . we must be habituated by handwork.....

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Al tough tough but Honest in terms of sculpturing a Good Engineer.!college does not provides any space for easy new Join students..every one strives hard.!if making students work hard for getting marks is Bad. then the ideology is Bad.!! Therefore  college for knowledge hungry people....

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Terna has huge campus but the faculty members are not good. Some teachers here are not at all concerned about students. They just know how to torture us and you also required minimum 75% attendance. if our attendance is less than that then our practical and oral marks reduce to half .

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Few reasons not to take admission here:1)Some faculty treat students like slaves2)College Building is no better than a municipality hospital3)Term work marks are never granted freely4)Submissions are a headache5)Office-work like collecting forms, submitting documents etc rarely get done in the first attempt6)Attendance is very strict

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Office-work like collecting forms, submitting documents etc. rarely get done in the first attempt. that is the biggest problem... but at the same time we are given less assignment as compared to other colleges... but the journals are given very late.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: 80 % college crowd are villagers and EXTC is the worst department in the college. Think thrice before taking admission in the college. Even the students of fourth year still say that they have made a big mistake by taking admission in this college. I made a mistake.Trust me on this.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: After the initial shock and being the devdas sort for a while you get used to this place or more precisely accept your fate and learn to live with it (in my case at least).Infrastructure needs to improve... faculties need to improve their English speaking skills... half the crowd is villagers but most of them are better than the rich brats in other colleges... I'd rate it 6/10.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Look guyz... this college has an A grade... and hence the infrastructure needs to develop a lot!Travelling for Mumbai students is not at all a problem...Campus is decent... teachers co-operate well if we behave well with them.Attendance really very strict...And the crowd I have experienced are more from Navi Mumbai... and they are really good... not all are villagers... even in good colleges in Mumbai some villagers do exist :pPlacements above average as I don't know much because now I'm just in first year.Canteen good... even hangouts like In-orbit and Center malls are there at Vashi which is just 2-3 stations away from Nerul...So to study well and get away well with your four years average scorers should try for this one...A good environment to study.And believe me the crowd is not that bad.Just co-operate well with teachers. That's it.Average scorers just go for it.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Though the infrastructure is not so good, constructions is being done. So we can just hope that one day Terna would look good in construction wise. For now at least they could maintain hygiene. But no efforts are being done to make college look neat and clean. Otherwise crowd is very good over here. Everyone is very supportive even the teachers also... and placements are also good.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Communication skills is poor in this college... construction is going on so I hope infrastructure will be good in coming years... crowd is quite good not so bad... placement is quite decent... overall a good college for average scorers.. if you try hard you will really get a good placement in this college

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: A Decent CollegeInfrastructure construction is going onSo we can expect a better buildingLabs r decentLibrary is goodFaculty is satisfactory but low English speaking skillsPlaces to hangout are Vashi and Kharghar just 10 min away via local trainCanteen is goodFaculty co operates well if you are good to themDoubts are cleared *if you ask*Crowd is not that bad100 m away from Nerul Rly StnOverall a decent college to take admission in

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Staff of the study-cell is rude. Teaching faculty are ok. Like you have to do your studies by yourself don't depend on them but some teachers are good.Think twice or I would say thrice before choosing for this college. Staff won't give you anything in time except railway concession

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Terna Engineering College can be termed as strict college in terms of attendance and academic curriculum.....it had a record of detaining of students having attendance less than minimum required.Has a very large canteen with menus dominating like vada pav, misal pav .Till 2014 clg was having limited infrastructure facilities with under construction hostel but as of now it has excellent infrastructure in terms of lab materials and many new branch have been opened in which there is shortage of quality lecturers.It organises TPL(Terna Premiere League) which is very famous in Navi Mumbai and has better auditorium of world class which was also came into operation this year only.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Terna Engineering college provides lot of opportunities and platform to develop ourselves- be it technical function or cultural function of the college, you will have lessons for life (of course in good way).
