Good mix of students, some good faculties and the canteen makes life somewhat easier for long 4years. Placements are decent- not too bad and not too good(avg CTC 3Lac)

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure wise the college is good, it has sufficient classroom, high-tech labs, 2 grounds, hostel etc. Some of the teachers are too good, but some are really bad in teaching. Placements are good, average package is around 3 lacs/annum. Its not too much happening place, but the college couple of events that keeps youngsters alive in Terna!

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Probably 1 of d good college 4m mu university. Good professor, well maintained auditorium, average labs n infrastructure could be the good points about this college. Maintenance n hygiene is where d college lacks behind. Overall an average college vth gud crowd.

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This college is a good place to study engineering in Navi Mumbai. The faculty are good in teaching and competent enough to clear all doubts/queries of the students. Apart from studies the college also provides great platform to showcase your talent. But if you want to get placed in good company you have keep your academic records above average level. So finding a good balance of all is the challenge!

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: "About college infrastructure-It is under constructed but i thought it is very nice because the classroom which was built ed nicely. About college placement-it is awesome..............About college canteen-it is big and very nice arranged.About college library and sports facility-library consist 30000 books.it is very big but now it was under constructed.sports events like sport-teck organizes every year,tpl league and clg has its own big ground for playing sports."

College Name: Terna Public Charitable Trust's Terna Engineering College, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Terna Engineering College, Nerul, Navi Mumbai is a decent college for students who score mid range marks in their entrance exams. The college is at 5 min walkable distance from the nerul station. Infrastructure wise the college is great with a big campus which includes a play ground, the Terna dental college, the college hostels and a mini lake. Classrooms for students of 2nd and 3rd year are fitted with digital boards which is cool. The canteen is quite large and provides cheap and decent food for the faculty and students. The library too is good and academic books needed throughout the course is available there. The college conducts a tech fest, a cultural fest and sport tech events separately which are participated in by students with great enthusiasm from both ternites and other college students. The faculty is not that great. However one learns to manage their studies on their in mu. The placements are decent for comps and IT with package range offered in the range of 2- 5lpa. Placements in core companies for ece and extc are low. Overall I would rate this college a 3/5.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: In our college attendance is not that big an issue. But it depends solely upon Principal’s & HOD’s mood. Temporary teachers are not that strict about attendance. If you appear in defaulter list, they ask for a letter from your Parents. In extreme cases parent are called to the college to meet HOD.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: There are no nearby hangouts. Instead students prefer to play football or cricket in the college ground. If you love indoor sports, there’s a gymkhana where you can amuse yourself by playing pool, carom & chess. Goga Pure Veg is only other option than canteen to eat outside college.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Placement is a very disappointing department of Shivajirao Jondhale college. Placement cell is there but it is as good as non-existent. There are no on-campus placements as such, but college arranges group campus with other colleges. College also helps students in developing soft skills by arranging some seminars.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: I passed out from this pathetic college long back... and I had taken an oath that i would never see this campus. we were among the first few batches where college was just opened and it was in horrible state. Other than engg drawing, in my 4 years study, I couldn't find a single person whom I can call sir from bottom of my heart. Absolutely waste quality. One professor used to teach Microprocessor and used to give marks based on number of pages answer written. No jokes folks that was the case. One person used to force to attend his private coaching. Hope he is not there now. I feel ashamed of saying my college name in my organisation. My suggestion is that if you don't get any college then keep this as last priority as it is coming under Mumbai university. Placement was 0 at that time. you have to literally hop in rainy days to reach that barren land.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Attendance doesn't matter at all, just complete your assignments on time and you're done! Sometimes you'll find cows and buffalo in the campus, not to study engineering of course, but they are perhaps more regular than most students. Being a girl I would suggest other girl DON'T TAKE ADMISSION HERE. Many seniors esp boys are manner-less and don't know how to behave in front of gals.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: worst college especially in rainy season there is mud every where and i don't think college is trying to improve this. During four year, the college will disappoint you and you'll feel like hell. location of the college is worst.. there is one one xerox shop near the college and during power failure you have to go some 1 km for xerox near the bus stop weird crowd, weird staff, weird college, weird location of the college..

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Nothing is right. No teacher is deserve to teach in engineering college. I have done BTECH from this college and 70% students failed in last year this is the reputation of college. We try to figure out from MSBTE and found this thing is regular with S.h jondhale :P

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: The Infrastructure of ssjcoe is changed totally & the ambiance is superb. Life in ssjcoe not only teaches about the syllabus in the book but also the world behind the college doors. The journey is quite practical (you will learn your so called ''duniyadaari'' here) Don't talk about the placements, Trust me the SSJCOE is THE BEST, comparing the statistics with other nearby colleges. Festivals, Concerts, sports adds sugar in the tea...

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: The students are of average and below average grade. How to expect the teachers to teach them? and college toppers are producing good results in final year. Students are below the average and so they are blaming the college and others. As it is said 'a bad workman quarrels with his tools'.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Please........! request to college principal. Improve college campus & nearest area. Arrange the travelling, GOVT. buses for Regency Estate bus stop, students require solved travelling problem. After some required changes your college will be very famous.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: You will be encouraged here for things like dance, drama, singing, etc etc... everything except your studies.... students really enjoy this unaware of the fact that these things would simply not work if you go out to seek a job... hard to accept but a true fact... In short, if you truly wish to become a good (conceptually & technically sound) engineer you'll have to face many hurdles here... I have myself experienced discouragement from teachers... so think twice before you join this college!!!

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: College campus is really good.... new principal is quite strict....some teachers are hopeless..like Some female teachers always comments on Students dress up..i have my own experience ..they don't have fashion sense so they goes mad when see any girl in fancy dress...many teachers do partiality in term work...1 teacher is from computer branch ..seriously he is headache :\ ..when i was in BE that one mam concern with placements...sh e just did timepass....no placements, no companies nothing...now we 60-70 students are totally Jobless ..>:( i love my coll life because of friends but really hate due to bad management of college

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: College infrastructure is very good but still some part is under construction

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: My college im not provied any bad remark cleaning process is also 24?7. Its good college all grant provied in our college. My life my best college

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: There are Many scholarship available in my college ie Ebc and for obc and St caste theres alot of benefits for those students and I got offered Ebc scholarship from my college and that helped me alot to my parents and my family. There are many scholarships for middle class and low class students in my college.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Join if u desperately want to do engg otherwise think 4 other option. Go for this college if you unable to find other college in your desired branch.After all, college comes under Mumbai University.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: The college was under construction. The campus of college is not so good.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: College is very good. No bad or worst things about college.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Good college for those who want to get knowledge. College is reachable from all modes. Not far from railway station. Good for students travelling on central line.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Every college is good college as per our experience this college is very good facilities provided infrastructure staff etc are very much good wide range of course offered, events and everything that take place is very much to look for exam structure is s

The bad remarks would be that the teachers aren't given the subjects they are proficient with some times. And that causes problems for them as well as the students.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: College is good. Some improvement is needed in placement and infrastructure. So if college makes it better the its good

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: The college infrastructure is really good with many facilities and faculty is good too and they help us every single time with our problems but they give alot of assignment which are really alot it takes so much time to complete those assignments that's the only negative point.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: our new principal mr bakal sir , is trying hard to improve the infrastructure of our college. i guess he is having difficulty to approve management and get the funds. campus area is big can do lot of productive work in it. the study structure is not in the hands of college thus can not blame them, but hope the university will work on it. last thing when the college is raising the fees it should raise its standards as well.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Yes. I have positive remark about my college because my college is so good in all activities which are very important to all students and there are strictly need to arranged thus all programs and activities.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Bad location as its very difficult to reach the college but good environment in college.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: There is no comment on College management. because College is not good or bad. Students thinking are most important factor.Our College is not good not better.it is average one in Mumbai University for engineering Stream.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: College management is only making money from it. There is no only ultimate goal is to make politicians black money into white. As there is no quality education is provided no value to take admission in such college where professors are self eccentric and egoistic rural people.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: Seems to be an Below average college with all basic facilities. Attitude towards the faculties are judged in the students marksheet. Good attitude can lead you to score good. Overall a good infrastructure and a satisfactory one.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: College management is probably the relatives of the owner of the college. All have a typical accent which suggests they come from the same place. People who are working here don't want themselves or this college to grow in its time and work very lethargically. Faculty doesn't upgrades the knowledge of the students with the upcoming technology in the world related to the engineering course that we are doing. they are still teaching the 1980s engineering standards. the world has moved ages out of that is what needs to be told to the management and faculty.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: College camous is very nice. Its calm and very close to the nature. Just the management should be on a better side. Some of the staff still act as if they working for a government office. Still its a good college, atleast for the chemical department

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: College management can improve canteen and college hygiene needs improvement college faculty is a mixture of good and bad professors.

College Name: Shivajirao S Jondhale College of Engineering, Thane
Reviews: if i ask any question outside the tech-max they will tell u to wait till tomorrow for answer but which tomorrow that they kept secret... it will be next month tmmrw, or it may be next year tmmrw, or it may have never come.. dnt join college if dnt want to waste money for nothing

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Infrastructure : Atharva College has Excellent Infrastructure. Campus is to nice. Atharva has World Class Auditorium , also have Swimming pool. Good IT Labs With Good Speed of Internet connection. Life@Atharva : Atharva College Arrange's So Many Social,Cultural Events. Rhythm is the Cultural Event of Atharva College. Placement : In Atharva 80% Student's got Placed of Various Branches. Every Year So Many Excellent IT Based Companies Visited Like Accenture, Microsoft, Oracle, Infosys, Wipro Technologies, L&T Infotech, Tech Mahindra And So Many. Why We Want Atharva : It has iMac Lab And Provided The Latest Technology's to The Students. Good And Supportive Faculty Member's.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Best infrastructure you can ever get. College feels like resort. Faculties are the best. You can grow at greater pace if you are in this college. There is gym; library; swimming pool; cafeteria. Everything you'll ever need in one place. Plus they have a huge campus area and here the fest's are amazing.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: The overall infrastructure is too good, but what makes this college best is the friendly and supporting faculties and staff members. I am glad that I secured admission in Atharva college of Engineering. It provides different opportunities for students to nurture and be successful in their upcoming life . All I can say is Atharva College of engineering has changed my life and it's one of the best college one can have.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Infrastructure at Atharva College of Engineering is appreciated by the students. Campus is excellent and there is greenery all around. The classrooms are spacious and has excellent ventilation with constant flow of air.There is a mixture of experienced and new faculties which keep changing often. If you can comprehend what they are trying to say then they are very helpful. Computers and IT students are pretty satisfied with their department. Elex and EXTC are not of the same opinion but are not completely against the respective dept. Having said that, students find their professors very friendly and doubts are always welcome with a smile. Lectures are conducted in English but some casual teachers prefer to teach in Hindi and Marathi, too.Oh, it's really good. There are numerous canteens run by the hotel management institute of the same trust. It is spacious and serves delicious food at affordable prices. The Chinese is a must have. They also serves non-vegetarian food on selected days of the week.But compared to other institutions it has poor Hostel.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: This college certainly provides a lot more than any one could have excepted. There is a plethora of opportunities, for anyone prepared to grab them. Hard work is appreciated and honoured. Student life is pretty chill and the faculty is good as well, (with room for improvement). Infrastructure is good with the best of amenities. Overall, a promising place to invest 4 years( if you are serious about your field).

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: The college is so bound to encourage the students to take participate in every technical event which is very important. Every department has excellent faculties for various subjects, excellent workshop, laboratory, so and so forth. Faculties are highly experienced. And I can say my college is the best in management. Infrastructure at Atharva College of Engineering is appreciated by the students. The campus is excellent and there is greenery all around. The classrooms are spacious and have excellent ventilation with a constant flow of air. They are air-conditioned on top 2 floors which are the management students section. The college has two libraries - first and the second year share one library and the third and the fourth year share another. There is a 464-seater Extra facilities are available like spa, swimming pool (only after 5pm, but having a pool in your college, isn’t that cool enough?) and 24 hrs of WiFi internet connectivity throughout the institute. The institute also has excellent sports facilities such as cricket ground, basketball court and volleyball court on the campus.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Along with the academics and genuine faculty, our college also has a lot of extracurricular opportunities for students.There exist different committees based on the different idea so that students can explore their talent and inculcate more qualities in them. The college has a separate robotics centre for students to guide them with the basic knowledge of kuka robots.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Hi guys I am writing this review because I was the teacher in this college. This is the best college as compared to other colleges.You may think that I was the teacher of this college that is the reason I am saying that, but if you ever come to any student friendly. But it is the good college.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Atharva college of Engineering situated at Charkop in Malad is one of the finest institutions for Engineering in Mumbai. Affiliated to the University of Mumbai, the Engineering programme offered here are world-class. To add on to it the faculties and amenities provided in the college by the management are superb and far off better than the peers. One of the USP of college is the student activities happening in and around campus. Various clubs and committees are actively involved in organising and conducting various events. Key events are Rhythm - The cultural festival of Atharva, and Techithon- The Technical Festival at Atharva. Apart from that there are various other national level clubs such as IEEE, CSI, E-Cell, Robotics Cell, Kuka Robots, e-yantra, etc. The campus life is always hustling and bustling with lot of Curricular and Extra-curricular activities happening on campus. Management gives total support for doing various activities as they believe in overall development of the student. Life @ Atharva is fun filled and adventurous, also it is full of knowledge and practical driven exposure.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: There is a mixture of experienced and new faculties which keeping changing often. The professors are very friendly and doubts are answered with a smile. Lot of college festivals and extracurricular activities to engage in. Very decent college with good canteen at affordable prices and good placements. Mobile phone is banned in the campus and various good eating spots nearby. Infrastructure is mind-blowing with greenery all round and the best thing is they have a swimming pool inside the campus. There are sporting facilities too like cricket ground, basketball ground and volleyball ground.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: I'm studying here for the 4th year now and i find this college excellent.Students are friendly and the faculty is a mixture of experienced and new staffs and they are extremely helpful.If you're a hard-worker you will surely be placed as placement accounts more than 70%of the students. The infrastructure well-built.It includes excellent college life and really good festivals.Over it is not less than an 'A'-grade college.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Awesome environment during fests. You can live your college days to the fullest. At the same time placements are good. But for studies ,it's all your responsibility. It's not a big deal to study on your own. Faculty is nice. But you won't sit for lectures,would you?

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: The caste system affects the crowd real bad and so is the faculty based on caste system. The facilities are good but in the electrical department the faculty needs improvement and the provision must be improved. Really clean and they take care of the college more than the students.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: We Had fun. Faculty was good. Professors are good. Some of them can actually provide core knowledge. Remaining provide enough knowledge to understand the concept. Good environment. It doesn't give you the feeling that you are in college. Pleasant environment. Professors are helping. Overall it was an amzing experience

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: atharva college of engineering is situated in malad and 10 minutes away from malad station. along with engineering the college also has hotel management and MBA. for those students who did not get admission in IIT or VJTI or any such institute this college is ideal. COURSES OFFERED- COMPUTER ENGINEERING ELECTRONIC ENGINEERING EXTC ENGINEERING ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ENGINEERING DURATION OF EACH COURSE IS Four YEARS. College is very good in extra curricular activities. Major festivals of college- ganesh utsav techithon e-week rythm Ieee 360. college has a basket ball court. canteen here is very good and hygenic. food is affordablel atharva doesn't has it's own hostel. most of the teachers are good and helpful, while some are average. mobiles are not allowed in college. there are many events organised where people from industry come and interact with students and provide knowledge on various topics outside the syllabus. crowd here is very friendly and enthusiastic. college has theater like auditorium. For palcements many company visit the campus. some of the major recuiters are INFOSYS, TCS , TECH MAHINDRA, I GATE, ZYCUS. "

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Our college is really awesome ,it is now ranked in top 5 in Mumbai university and the events which are held in our college are awesome ,I recommend this college to all students .

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: It is a decent college i would say. You will have a good time

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: College was wondeful just how any boy need his college life.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: College is good well maintained infrastructure and well maintained everything from toilet to floors everything is good they have their own ground which are well maintained with sports facilities. Everything is good.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Students' life in this college is easier since the attendance was not as strict compared to other colleges. But the faculty and seriousness among the pupils about technology, engineering, and scopes as a whole could have been pushed a little higher than it used to be.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Nothing bad, very supportive. Should focus more on practical approach of learning.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: My overall thinking about my college is very positive and I'm gonna miss my college and my friends a lot thanks.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: The college is not far away from my residency which reduced the travelling time so that I can concentrate on academics. The department which I wanted was good. The college has good campus and I had heard good reviews regarding the teaching staff and the way of providing education. The teaching staff is very helpful.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: College is a good well maintained infrastructure. Professors are very good at teaching and very helpful. Greenery is the eye-catcher of my college. Placements are quite good. Students can also get the opportunity to work on different projects and workshops and Internship also.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Positive Remarks: 1.Good infrastruture. 2.Attendance was not mandatory. 3.Placements were good. 4. Industrial visit once a year. Negative Remarks: 1. Average Faculty. 2.Transportation issues. 3.No mobile phones allowed in college.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: The college has a good infrastructure. Faculty are always good about their conduct and teaching methods are advanced. The classrooms are clean and advanced methods like projector and ppt are used for teaching.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Firstly It is very near to my house,hardly 35 minutes it takes to travel. Then i heard about this college as it is ranked in top 20 private colleges in Mumbai, It has a great infrastructure which I googled first. Then the thing which I loved was: In this college there is no pressure of attendance.The teachers here are so friendly that they allows you to do some productive things by not attending the class.Attendance here is at low priority only if you are involved in doing something, if they found you just roaming & bunking the class they will shoot you at PTA meeting (parent's-teacher's meet).Teachers allows you to build projects by waiting with you even after the college timing.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: College looks good and but it lacks lots of things from inside. Labs sucks, most of equipments are either faulty or don't work at all. In chemistry lab we are even allowed to perform full experiment instead they give us all ready prepared chemicals and directly tell us to perform final test and sometimes they just show you.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: Really good if you want to amp up your social life and groom yourself. Mobile phones are not allowed to be used in the campus so that is a negative point, it can only be used in laboratories and washrooms and sometimes in canteen, not in classrooms.

College Name: Atharva College of Engineering, Malad
Reviews: The first thing that anyone notices about this college is its canteen. It is maintained by the hotel management college situated in the same campus. So its quite good. Good library with a large number of books of all branches. Also there are all year round fests which is a great thing.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: It is one of the best emerging engineering college in mumbai with good infrastructure and management. Has a cafeteria for students and faculties separately maintaining professionalism.Well qualified and experienced faculties having great knowledge about their respective subject. College is located on the highway itself making student convienent for travelling. The fee structure is also appropriate. The college has 20+ industrial collaboration giving students certification courses for free of cost. Facilities like e-Library, project based learning, foreign languages are provided to the students for free of cost. Well equipped labs for mechanical, civil and extc department and computer labs having linux, ubuntu installed in every pc. Mechanical and civil dept conduct Industrial Visit for the students which helps students to gain more practical knowledge. EXALT is the technical fest where students are given the platform to present their projects and best project is felicitated. OJUS is the cultural fest where students have the opportunity to show their sports, cultural and creative skills. Good campus placement, companies like LTI, capgemini have recruited students. Students aspiring for engineering, APSIT is a perfect platform for them.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: This is one of the best engineering college in Mumbai, and soon it will be one of the top institution in India. Faculty is best & experienced. They are always ready to help each and every student. APSIT SKILLS is a new initiative started by APSIT, it provides professional certifications free of cost. This initiative has been taken to , "Bridge the gap between industry & academics". Many such initiatives are taken, for all round growth of students. OJUS is the Cultural & Sports Fest. EXALT is the Technical Fest. These fest's provides platform to students for showcasing their talents. TPO Department, has done remarkably well, placement record is great. Big names like Amazon, Wipro, LTI , TCS and many more are some of the companies where students are placed. Institute also provides, free of cost training for GATE, GRE, and other entrance exams. Also free of cost training in Foreign languages is provided. The speed with which APSIT is growing & the initiatives taken by Institute has already made it to list of Top Engineering Colleges In Mumbai, soon it will appear in Top Engineering Colleges in India.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: AP SHAH  INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY A college full of passion, whose faculty are the best in every branch ( EXTC, IT, CS, MECH, CIVIL) of engineering.  The college take care of student's comfortability very well and are really very understanding. Virtual learning is encouraged a lot here.  There are different activities like sports, cultural, technical, etc.The environment is  very familiar due to friendly faculty.  Apart from sports and fests there is additional language learning also which includes Chinese, German, Mandarin, Japanese and French, which makes the regular days more interested and learning different languages helps further in company recruitments.  Every classroom have a/c, there are sufficient labs also with a/c and there is  an e-library apart from basic library.  There are different workshops related to mind peace, hardware, software learning etc. Important stuffs  like canteen and stationary are inside the college premises. College is also very supportive in implementing new ideas from students.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: My experience with APSIT has been fabulous! All professor and teachers are very helpful and kind. APSIT provides various facilities like AC Digital classrooms, book bank, E-library, moodle app for all reference material for all subjects in that respective semester, well equipped practical labs, etc... APSIT also various clubs for Student development like Modified Auto Club, Indian Green Building Council, Lakshya (Social service team), Antarang, Expression (Verbal skills development club), TPO, and also various department students council like Civil Engineering Student Association, Mechanical Engineering Student Association, etc for all departments. Along with all of this APSIT also holds OJUS (Cultural Festival), EXALT (Technical Festival), ICaste(International Conference). APSIT also provides Software learning programs, Language learning programs, GATE preparation classes and Aptitude classes for students all free of cost. Highly recommended for students who are opting for Engineering.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Ap shah has very good infrastructure, well constructed and well-equipped labs. The faculty is excellent. College also arranges PBL (project based learning) courses to improve student's practical knowledge. Ap shah also has club expressions for training students on how to communicate with others and overcome the fear of speaking or presenting in front of the crowd. Ap Shah focuses on the overall development of students, to ready them for the industry.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: A P Shah Institute of Technology is located in Thane. It has a very good infrastructure. Air-conditioned classroom and well-equipped laboratories. All the faculties are well qualified and always ready to clear our doubts. The proper study material for all the subjects is uploaded on the online portal named ‘Moodle’ for students. College also provides free GATE coaching & foreign language training to interested students. Placement drives occur very frequently in the college. Most of the students get placed in good companies by the end of the 8th semester. Also, the TPO is very active in organizing drives & they also provide placement training including communication, aptitude, hard/soft skills to make students more employable. The admission process is conducted in two ways, either through the Centralized Admission Process (CAP conducted by DTE) or offline campus admissions. The good thing about offline admissions is that all the offline admissions are purely merit-based. The college does not accept any kind of donations for admission. College also organizes Cultural Fest named as ‘Ojus’ and a Technical Festival named as ‘Exalt’ wherein students can showcase their talent in Cultural and Technical fields.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: The teaching provided is excellent. Proper study notes provided. Everyone including faculties and management is helpful. Institute puts lots of efforts to improve. E-learning facilities are really good. Very good library facility. Very good labs. Different programs to improve skills of student required for jobs and startups.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: I have heard that other colleges provides print for practical experiment's write up and students supposed to fill up blank spaces after taking readings from experiment. This is really time consuming.But in my college this thing is absent. I really feel that this should be adopted by my college.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: The main reason for applying to this college was that it was only 20 minutes away from my home. Also, heard good reviews from my seniors.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: College is having good staff and APSIT team is very supporting. College is good at taking initiatives . Classrooms are air-conditioned and very clean environment. This is best college in terms of locality also. For admission in this college visit to college website and procedure is very easy. Visit www.apsit.edu.in for more info about apsit skills and everything related to college. College fees is also minimal and doing a lot for all students . When I heared about this college i went to its website and the college facilities were amazing and was near to me so time waste in travelling as it is in Thane , Maharashtra

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: College offers best teaching and learning experience, which has been specially tailored to meet the needs of engineers in today's globalized world. The class rooms are well organized with advanced technology. College conducts seminars, workshops, national and international conferences to update the development in the fields of science and technology.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Positive : facilities, labs, cleanliness, knowledge of staff Negative: staff attitude, lack of placements, and specially backward thinking, college is a place were both girls and boys would meet be friends and be as one, no discrimination, but here, specially in mechanical, they don't allow girls and boys to sit together, even if they see u being friendly with a girl, u would be called to HOD cabin and warning would be given to stay away, mechanical staff is more of like bajrang dal then teachers

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: A college is full of passion, whose faculty are the best inevery branch ( EXTC, IT, CS, MECH, CIVIL) of engineering.The college takes care of student's comfortability verywell and is really very understanding. College is also very supportive of implementing new ideas from students.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: This is one of the best institutes in Mumbai University Huge Infrastructure, well-equipped labs. Best book bank facility, attendance reward scheme. Highly qualified and well experienced staff. Placement ratio is linearly increasing. Institute is fully aware abut recent trends and technology, in view of that student's skill development program, project-based learning is implemented. Student Induction program and a visit to all Departments is planned for the first day of our college.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: As i live in thane, this college was just 15 mins away from my home. I came to know about this college through a friend who was basically a senior to me and was there since 2 years. The admission Process was really good as there were staff to help you out with every detail.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: antastic enviroment always postive vibes enjoyed each day being there superb campus teaching and non teaching staff both are kind office staff is kind principal is a godman always supports new intiative for the betterment of the college.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Best college with all the Infra and support. It's privilege to BE an APSITians.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Best college in thane. Students in Apsit are very proud of their college they help in making college better Faculty supports the students College administration is very supportive. Our students council team is very active.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Negative remarks are only that the college doesn't have its own hostel and students need to accomodate in PG near the college. And all other points like Academics, Infrastructure and Placement are quite positive and very impressive.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: APSIT is one of the best emerging colleges in Mumbai. The college environment is very friendly. All the faculties are well experienced and have expertise in their respective fields. Lectures and practicals are conducted regularly. The infrastructure of the college is too good. The college has done collaborations with many companies. The placement is growing every year. As per the requirement of the subject, the college organises industrial visits for the students.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: APSIT is one of the finest institutes in India with state-of-art infrastructure and green campus. Institute focuses on the all-round development of student and has a student-centric approach.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Good infrastructure, cooperative faculty, nice classrooms, well-developed labs. I got more confident after taking admission in the college

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: No negative remarks. My college has improved a lot over the year. They've grown exponentially for the benefit of student only. Constant updates have been made to the college policies to make life at apsit better for the students.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: The college Higher authorities take good initiatives to take college at a high level.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: The college have been grade A grade by grading organization also the college has been applied for NBA ACCREDITIONthis year and mostly will get it done

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Apsit is the best college for education. Here education is based on project-based learning. Infrastructure is in well manner. The important thing is there is no ragging. Labs are technically great. Classes are fully air conditioner.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Negative remarks are only that the college doesn't have its own hostel and students need to accomodate in PG near the college. And all other points like Academics, Infrastructure and Placement are quite positive and very impressive.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: College is in great place and seniors are also very helpful. Environment of college is good as you mix in it. Just the college is a little far away from main stations.

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Faculty of the institute is one of the best in MU. Many extra curricular activities are also conducted frequently. We have our cultural fest- just, a sports fest and tech fest as well. Since ours will be the first batch to graduate, can't take a call on placements. Bt I am sure that college will arrange for good placements. No college campus as such. Yet best infrastructure. Each and an every classroom is air conditioned. Playground for students also missing!

College Name: AP Shah Institute of Technology, Thane
Reviews: Nice infrastructure, but no ground. All the educational-purpose-machineries are new. The campus is small. AP Shah has really good professors, all hired from the good colleges of the university of Mumbai. For other years, there are some brilliant faculties and a lot of average faculties. We have air-conditioned class rooms and two common rooms where students can play. Attendance is not a big issue. You can bunk if you want to a certain limit. Canteen is not so good. Limited VEG dishes are available. The college has a stilt-parking facility which occupies the whole ground floor of the college. And the rest of the floor of the college. And the rest of 4 floors are for educational purposes. AP shah has 2 seminar hall of small sizes. The college also provides foreign language classes amongst which courses are available for Germen, French and Japanese.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: College is good but no campus type thing .if we talk about library then it is also good ..practical lab also there in a good condition mostly all apparatus and machine are there. One more thing canteen, it contain both nonveg and veg food at average price not very high or low ..overall i can say very good college.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: I am studying in this college as a mechanical engineering student and first of all you all that the crowd is superb in this college. Teaching is mind blowing and the teaching staffs are very much supportive in this college . In this college they mostly concentrate on practical sessions rather than theory one. And they prepare you to the next level that after completing college they make sure that u will get job by campus placement that's a good part.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: 1.Does not have enough space for labs. 2.Should think upon teaching quality. 3. The only good point is the location of the college.It has the presence in one of the most beautiful places in mumbai i.e. carter road bandra. 4.very less companies visiting the campus. 5.Teachers are under qualified for new syllabus. 6.lowest fee. 7.Sea shore near the college makes it memorable. 8.college has to improve in every means ... i.Should improve their infrastructure. ii. Should appoint experienced and qualified teachers. iii. Should have active placement cell to have good placements. iv. Should have good lab equipment.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: In RIZVI you get different environment and u can expose yourself can even interact with Architecture and management student as the are in the same campus there is a huge canteen where u ca. Meet ur new friend and can enjoy ur college life as college location is in Bandra carter road is an amazing glamorous place where u can hang out with ur friends the faculty of computer Department is good even for computer Rizvi is best it has amazing faculty and equipment.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: While the location might seem appealing, the limitations of being in a residential area with no campus to speak of can provide a sharp reality check. The college is a Minority Institution and that does seem to play a decisive role in the overall outlook of the faculty and students and leads to a perception of nepotism in some cases. At one time it charged the lowest fees among all the Mumbai University colleges thanks to its limited infrastructure. The Teaching staff seemed to be changing on a yearly basis with former students being inducted into the teaching faculty after passing out. These newly inducted faculty would teach subjects from the viewpoint of scoring marks in the university exams rather than ensuring that the students understood the subject being taught. The office staff were quite helpful and offered excellent support to resolve any complicated problems in matters relating to the university. There was no hostel attached to the college, but its canteen provided a wide selection at affordable rates. However, Canteen space was shared with the multitude of other institutions in the same premises and was woefully short in capacity to serve them all. The Civil stream was lucky enough to have greater exposure to the industry due to the nature of the stream leading to the proximity of multiple active construction projects in the area, but none of the other streams managed to organise an industrial visit for their students during the same time period. While the library held a decent selection of books, their condition was rather poor. Classroom ventilation is poorly planned and this can lead to hot and stuffy classrooms in the summer months and in late October. Laboratory equipment may not always be in the best shape, though the college did spend for some new equipment when final year projects required it.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Overall the college provides a good atmosphere to learn. The faculties are friendly, no issues with that. Also, the research work going on in the college is way too much. Incase you are a research type of student, the college will help you out. The canteen food might be an issue sometimes.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: It's a nice college. The crowd is pretty okay. Infrastructure is good Better than many colleges in fact. Has a really huge canteen which is amazing and the faculty is good as well. The location of the college is another plus point. Has the most amount of seats for civil and the best part is the if you're doing civil engineering like me, you are learning about building from a builders college. .

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Sea facing collage with awesome faculty. My life taking several tose turn during my collage but all thing getting fade away as i enter my collage with my friend's and teachers all around me with great enthusiasm chearing m all over in my each and every step for my even small. small problem

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: There’s no college ground but there are lots of public grounds nearby for sports enthusiasts especially cricket which beats in every Rizvites heart. The toilets often stink; so it is advised that you finish off your stuff at home. The infrastructure is improving though.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: A couple of years ago there were pretty good teachers but due to some unknown reasons the staff keeps changing. But now the teachers are Ph. D graduate and experienced. Very few colleges in Mumbai can beat the location of Rizvi College of Engineering. It's off the plush Carter road promenade and behind Pali Hill, home of many celebrities.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: You can just come for practicals and study at home for the remaining time. So many students score out here. Imagine going to college right from 9 am to 5 pm and then rest of the evening being spent completing assignments. You can't even think of studying under such circumstances. Life is simple at Rizvi.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: You can come and go any time you want to, you are your own "marzi ka malik". Some teachers do threaten about attendance but that is just a formality. Years pass on and attendance keeps on falling. It's no big deal in Rizvi rather it turns out to be a plus point for students

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Crowd at Rizvi College of Engineering is predominantly Muslim due to the 50% quota. Overall, the crowd is pretty cool and the fact that Engineering college has Law, Science, Commerce, Arts, Architecture and Management colleges attached to it; means that you might get a chance to mingle with some of the best looking ones (if not engineering) in the locality (the canteen is common for all).

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: The Rizvi College of Engineering canteen is a paradise for non- veggies. It's really big; hence airy, well ventilated and mostly very crowded. You can get some of the tastiest food here. The prices won't be heavy on your pocket and yes, no one brings TIFFIN in Rizvi, so good is the canteen. The seating is very comfortable. Food available varies from Chaat to Chinese, traditional thalis and what not. Don’t forget to try the Bhurji-pav here.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: A college in which you can spend 4 years with peace and without any interference from the college management unless you end up doing something really crazy. just fill the papers and you pass (not literally though). But there are disadvantages to it as well, so enter at your own risk!!

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Each year more than 30 % to 40 % students are placed through this cell. The training and placement cell is active to keep touch with the industry and invites them to come and visit the institute for campus interviews. Mechanical and Civil departments get the best placements. But, there is no guarantee of placements.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Rizvi is a decent college for those score just about average marks in the entrance exam. Not too far from south Mumbai and easily accessible from western suburbs; so travelling is not an issue. A college in which you can spend 4 years with peace and without any interference from the college management unless you end up doing something really crazy

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Best college in mumbai for mechanical and civil branches and placement is also well.now college improve there status and standard also.placement for civil & mechanical is the best in the whole of mumbai, GO for it and this time the col will offer almost 100% placement bcoz the is now very much impproved

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: the faculty is inexperienced but friendly and they help u out trust me.. And no rule followed as fill the paper and u pass.. The crowd is extremely friendly, supportive and for me- the best.. And also- there are issues with attendance now on, this year atleast 5 students from each year fell in trouble and weren't allowed to fill the university form, so be careful but the attendance % is not too high, you're considered even if its 25-30%.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: the interior of the college has been improved to a gr8 xtent.....as far as the staff is concerned they completely suck to the core.....and attendance has been a much better priority now, concluding that you have to at least maintain your attendance record till 30%.....howeva once you land on carters its totally funtastic... :)

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Civil is the best because the trustees of rizvi are builders and if you are a smart one then you will surely get a job..The canteen is full of bedbugs so enter at your own risk ! You might carry some bedbugs at your home too... otherwise the food is good and reasonable

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Attendance rules have been revised - Minimum 60% req. People who dont have 60% attendance are not eligible for the term test. Hangouts are good.. canteen is also good.. placements are decent (upto 60 to 70%).. civil is the best department in college..

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Features Of RCOE: 1.Average faculty (Best for EXTC) 2.Best Canteen (Good space, Even Non Veg) 3.Don't worry for Your Attendance. 4.Average Placement (Just Perform well in exams) 5.Nearest Lovers point (Carters and Bandstand) 6- RAYS is the annual sports, cultural as well as technical fest of Rizvi College of Engineering

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: I (EXTC student) will say college is good 3/5, but it's still Ungraded... More than half of the crowd in engineering is irresponsible & aren't bothered about studies... they just wanna pass with 40. Faculty with some exceptions is good (almost same as every other college). As said before you can perform well by taking advantage of low attendance criteria (avg 30-40%) & placements are less, as low number of students are eligible.. No Industrial Visit at all.. So if you want your engineering life calm and average, you can go for it... but you CANNOT ENJOY REAL ENGINEERING here..!!! Better for lovers, ok for smarties... all the best.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Really good for civil engineering. Advanced technology and methods of teaching. Good at sports especially for cricket. Admission is done via online process on the bases of MH CET marks,

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Rizvi college is good for placement in civil engineering. Admission is done via online process of DTE on the bases of CET marks. No online admission are there. Teaching methods are good, really good at sports especially cricket. Rizvi college is known for its cricket team. Small campus.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Infrastructure is ok but overall a good college for that fees.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: The college is very good but there is always scope for improvement.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: College is good enough but there are certain points which lacks college so my college lacks a bit in infrastructure and campus but accordingly college is trying best to make it for students convenience and comfort study atmosphere.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Negative review - 1. The college bulit their infrastructure by taking extra money from students which is wrong. 2. There are no grounds to play anything if you wish to play and not to study. Postive review - 1. Faculty members are good. 2. Marks are also given good.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Our college does not solely depends on assignments for marks and they give marks on the basis of attendance and students knowledge and interest. Along with that each and every student is treated as family.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: College is very good, offering a cost effective education to students, With a lot of scholarships. Faculty is nice. Students chill mostly in the canteen, it's a big canteen and can easily accommodate 100's of students. Overall it's a nice atmosphere mostly kids from nice background come to the college so the crowd is very good.

College Name: Rizvi College of Engineering, Bandra
Reviews: Rizvi college is located in Bandra West off Carter Road. This college accepts students who can not get really high percentages. So it is a boon for students who score below 80% or less. Rizvi college has great infrastructure and also has lifts made available for students' use. Faculty is of great help as students can approach them anytime for any doubts. Also, the college has separate labs for physics, chemistry, biology, information technology, computer science and also a gymkhana where extra curricular activities take place. The college has an auditorium where the very famous 'JashneRizvi' takes place and celebrity judges are present every year. This college has great placements and is also one of the best colleges.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: This is one of the best college I would say in Mumbai .I completed my engineering in 2014. amazing faculty who teaches you as your own child. Ready to help you all the time. Very few people knows that very famous film actor Mr.Kadar Khan Sir was a teacher in this college only he got his turning point of life into film industry due to one of our college functions only. So many companies comes for campus placement with handsome package. Its one of the best college I would recommend all to apply for this college.Your will learn lots of new things here infra is not much good but if u truly want to learn something then infra doesn't matters.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: As Our college is really popular, there are people coming from long distance. Infrastructure is not up to mark. Classrooms were sufficiently large but now it size has been reduced which is not sufficient for 80 students. some teachers aren't good either, they hardly match the expectations which is one of the major concern. Infrastructure is average as there is no possibility to increase the infrastructure as it surrounded by government assets on both the side. Our College is only sufficient for engineering but there is 8 to 12th school and jr. College, Diploma, Engineering college, IT also part time education is also available so there is mess

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: When you visit this institute you can feel by that ancient architecture, the type of technical experience it holds. When I first visited the campus attracted me a lot, but then it was like "Hey, Where is the play ground.", as I was totally into the sports but this lack in the institute is a bit disappointing. Then I came to the studies, the faculties were up to my mark. For an average class student like me, the lectures were all of my understanding level. When it comes to the Canteen, it literally disappointed me, as compared to other my previous college cafeterias. The library & the AC seminar hall are at the best level. The main thing that attracted me is the Alma latifi hall wich comprises of a mosque too, which is an amazing sigh of this institute's ethics. The crowd mostly comprising of Muslim students is so ethical and delight. All the departments are well equipped with all its technical requirements. This college is going good so far as it's located at a place where we can accommodate from any place of Mumbai , mainly railways.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: M.H saboo siddik is one of the old colleges in Mumbai and is regarded as one of the best in town. located at the heart of Mumbai near Nagpada Mumbai central it is known for it's mosque type infrastructure. The campus is quite huge but it includes several other courses too including junior college and diploma. The electronics faculty is good there are few teachers with less experience but has a great knowledge in field of electronics. Most of them will be found as headache, as they will only focus on completing the syllabus and term work. Placement i wish u prepare yourself mentally that u won't be getting placement from this college. Fees is increasing year by year by margin of 10K approx. Right now it is 110k INR, but here you'll learn to be strong mentally for sure.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Very nice college. Have good set of professor. Only lack in infrastructure. Have nice and well maintained labs. Much better than any any other Mumbai university affiliated college in civil engineering. Placement for our department is very bad not to blame the college almost same scenerio in all other M.U. colleges. The administration department is a pain. Fest aren't supported (financially).

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: All this college has is cons (considering IT field, for other field ask or look up someone else's review) 1. Infrastructure - Old college still the same, not much upgrades said that they were gonna fit A.C's in the first year still after passing out the infra is as crappy as ever. Lab's are useless half computers not working. The ground is just for junior and school kids. Watchmen will not allow you to play so there goes your tp. 2. Placement - Horrible TPO only one or two good companies. That's why the most important thing to look at in an engineering college is placement which this college doesn't have. So that's why even if u are in the minority don't go for IT or COMPS in this college. 3. Industry exposure will be pretty clear to you from above point. That is zero exposure. 4. 80 % of staff is worthless don't know how to teach. Favour those who favour them in assignment term work and blah blah(which is there in almost all colleges BUT) that is ok but the worst part is attendance. You have to keep 75% or above for term work marks and also to submit assignments without any trouble. Since sitting in lectures which you can't understand or get any interest is compulsory, it is also at the same time waste of your intellect. Instead, you can study at home and score as well as gain knowledge then come here and sit like machines. 5. College life depends totally on your attitude. Go with those who come for only timepass, then you'll end up timepass even after completing 4 years. Go with studying crowd and end up with good academics(which is boring but funnily important). I would say be balanced. 6. Affordability - Scholarships are there for the minority as well as that Caste thingy. Nowadays almost all colleges are expensive. But according to the money you pay you to get 0 value 0 facilities.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College life is amazing, but that's only if you really want to enjoy. Infrastructure is fair enough. The faculty is just average. College placements are below average. College fests are amazing. College trips are Amazing It's good if u know how to find a way to enjoy else no college is good.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: I am in first year SEM II. Till date, there is no problem with the faculty and other staff. Infrastructure is developing. There are also sports competitions and other seminars on technology. The teaching faculty is good and also experienced. The office faculty is mediocre. The best part is it is in south Mumbai so many destinations like Chowpatty, etc are nearby

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Generally L & T, Wipro, Infosys, Godrej & Boyce, Tata Motors, etc. are few of the companies that visit this campus to meet their requirement of engineers. But don't go by the name of the companies, because the number of students placed is just around 50%. In the recession year 2009, they fell down to 20%. Average salary offered is around Rs. 2.4 lac p.a.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: MH Saboo Siddik’s college of Engineering is one of the few colleges in Mumbai which offers automation engineering which makes it a noticeable college. If you are interested in that this college is a good option. Else the college is fairly OK. Attendance is required to approx 60%. If not there may be problems in store for you!

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: its not a fairly /OK college . dude it got AA rating at state level, i studied here 3 years i can say it is above avg-good colleges. it is among top reputed old colleges of Mumbai. Regarding Hangouts- Dominoes and CCD are nearby. Others include McDonald's, KFC, Celejor, Monginis, Baskins & Robbins etc which are around 10 min walking distance.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: college crowd is decent 50% r Muslims but that's not a problem as college-student r secular. placement now are 80%[eligible student's] those who worked hard 4 years really paid v.good handsome package. avg. package is some wht above 3 lkh also u will find less crowd in locals compared to other areas also nears local station is just 10 min walking distance. abt infrastructure it is 6-story huge building with large classrooms also there is a bank inside the campus only. max. faculty is good except one-two. there r many hangout near college also ;)

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: teachers don't know to speak English! library is not "extensive"..it is a dungeon not a library..girls are not allowed in the canteen..not allowed to wear capris or t shirt..no printers..no working pcs..the prominent hangout places are McDonalds, kfc, baskin & robins, domino's, cafe coffee day and a few hukka places.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: I am in F.E Electronics.Its a decent and a nice college.And from this year on-wards the annual festival of the college is known as ''Ambrosia'' and not purple.The renovation of the college is going on and they are doing it very efficiently. Most of the teachers are good and have very good command over the subject. We all enjoy to be in the college. Overall I can say that its a very nice college.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: hey friends....the canteen here is horrible.....the college administration is absolutely ridiculous..... the library n office staff r really bad...toilets r lyk hell....it has got a good infrastructure but not properly maintained Bcoz of all the idiotic administrators who do have enough money but r not interested in using it for the college ...the only best top here is the neighboring jail where u can interact with the prisoners n have fun....

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: i m happy that the college is renewed... and its process is still going on feels like we r in really standard college; the automobile and mechanical are highly qualified and experienced and also computer staff but don't have idea about other branches.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The infrastructure is being revamped now and the interiors of the college definitely look much much better than before. The faculty is certainly not the best except a couple of profs. (in each of the branches). The canteen is perhaps going to be your last option even if you're hungry like hell!! The crowd's pretty decent.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Canteen food may cause food poison so never prefer eating from there. Computers used in festivals for LAN gaming are outdated. They still play FIFA 2008 in 2015. The only positive which I can think of this college would be close to Byculla Station or Bombay Central and offers a decent degree. As for placements, 10 students were selected out of 60 in campus. So you will either have to stand out of other students or will have to look for off-campus placements.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: I have passed in 2011 with Mechanical Degree from this college. The staff of MHSS is horrible and not helpful at all. In my four years of study, I have only found 2 professors out of 10 or 11 who were good in teaching (the teaching faculty of Mechanical Dept. has changed a bit)

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is OK. Fests are not worth calling them as fests. Management is worst. Professors are good in Comps and IT dept. Placement is strictly OK for IT and comps dept and pathetic for other branches. Though it was memorable 4 years of my life. he food quality and taste is poor and it is advisable to carry your own tiffin.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Easily reachable from anywhere in the city. Fees 98000. Canteen is poor, Faculty is OK, but don't help much. management is horrible and the college building isn't well-maintained. Hangouts- Jail visible from many classrooms. No sports facility, nearest open space is Shivaji Park. Crowd is pretty decent. Overall a good college but needs to improve in many ways.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College life was jst merely boring at the start but as we started events than it became a bit exciting. It is a developing college nw in terms of academics and cultural both. Jst the office staff needs to b more focused on work and college shld encourage their students in all aspects. The good thing is college is strictly enuf to avoid vulgarity in their campus

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college faculty was good...extra curricular activities should be encouraged...also the office staff should be bit more co-operative... overall the college is good in terms of education..i would recommend this college for civil, automobile and Mechanical engineering... its well known college n still reigning...for other streams not bad...

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: ETC faculty is supposed to be okay. New professors keep coming and going. Non teaching staff behave as the king n queen. (They dont even give respect to anyone) A well developed college getting a bad name because of such character. The college is still developing on infra..

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has a good reputation from years. I had heard about good teaching. I got admission based on my entrance exam scores. My name came up after the 4th list. The overall admission process was very easy from the college.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Campus is not that interesting but teaching quality is good so I'm advising you do not take saboo siddik College until and unless you didn't get any college for engineering

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Positive remark- Faculty is very supportive, learning environment is good, Hosting different cultural, technical festivals, Negative remark- Less Internships, Placement and Job opportunities are also too less, infrastructure can be improved.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The overall infrastructure and atmosphere of the college are quite good. Quality facilities are offered by the college. The queries of the students are taken care of really well. I got into this college after completing my HSC through the CAP round. There is no special reason for me preferring this college as it was one of the preferences while I was filling my admission form and I got my name in this college in the first list itself. This college was offering facilities, infrastructure, atmosphere, and ofcourse, the course I needed so I preferred to block my seat here on the first go.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Because of good infrastructure, historical achievements, and good placement ratio. The admission took by CAP round. The college has the best teaching facilities with well-equipped labs they have a great history of making good engineers. The college is rated with A++ remark is one of the reasons to choose this college.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is very clean and hygienic, And the canteen good is very healthy, Teachers are friendly The negative remark is the college is still not maintained properly And the course curriculum should be renewed

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Maintaining the proper asset of an organisation is very much important Late Mohd Saboo Siddik Seth has developed this college and from those years it has been maintained with proper arrangements for parking and security

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The atmosphere was good, Faculty were also good and did help us with our project works, placements etc. The college cam improve in the course structure, the lab works, a better playing area for refreshment and the placement scenario.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is good with placements and teaching and stuffs. The canteen is the biggest negative thing about the college. There is no cleanliness in the canteen and the food quality is also not good.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college should work on placement because there is no meaning of having a good teaching staff if the deserving students will not get placed. The college should increase the extra curricular activities

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: No negative remarks for my college By Grace of God I have got my dream Institute so no negative remarks No problem for Parking Ample space for Parking and Campus is huge Canteen is good Library is well maintained All is good

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Positive:- Labs are spacious and has latest equipments. Library has a good number of books. Convenient to travel from all three railway line. Located in heart of the city. Negative:- Canteen not good. No sport ground. Fest not that glitz and glamour.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College supports overall development of an individual. Its one the oldest college in mumbai which was developed in 1929.Overall experience of college is very good and anybody can apply for this college without any hesitation.

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: One thing I can say that regarding bad remarks about my college that college staff person were not doing their job as properly

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Pros are the faculties are good and that's it all depends on the student how they look at the college Cons infrastructure is in building phases hope it will get better soon gender ratio is 1:30 for mech Dept

College Name: MH Saboo Siddik College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: "College Infrastructure - Looks grand from the outside. The office and corridors are well maintained. Classrooms can be better Placement -Average placements Canteen -Probably competes for the worst canteen anywhere in the world. Library -Well furnished and equipped. Sports facilities -The sports events are great, but nothing much thereafter."

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is amazing The overall crowd is good college fees is very high as compared to facilities provided the faculty is not so good and is one of the biggest problems canteen food is average attendance above 75 is compulsory placement is ok hygiene is horrible no place for sports college fest zephyr and tech zephyr is the best part

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College has excellent infrastructure and it is improving more and more year by year. Faculty should know how to teach and clear the doubts of students. Concepts should be taught in interesting way and every student's doubts must be clear. If it requires more lectures for it then be it but the core concepts should be well stored in student's minds and teachers should take this responsibility. Placements are not so good in LTCOE as TPO brings Non-IT companies for placements of IT students. Students diversity is a very good point in this college. College fees is very high as compared to facilities provided by the college.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Faculty of a mechanical branch is good lab facilities are average,canteen food is ok college fest is amazing,some of the events are really good they mention gymkhana in college magazine every year,but there is no such gymkhana in the college.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The faculty is good and always there for students.Recently there is the improvement in infrastructure.College host annual tech and cultural fest some department have their own tech fest.Many student clubs are also there in college.The office staff is the worst they never listen to anybody and no concern shown to a student.College fees are also very high but there are no facilities. There is no playground. In canteen also there is no place to sit.And placement is the worst.At the end, i can say that its an average college with average college life.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
