Reviews: Good college and has all basic amenities.faculty is good.placement as such is not up to the mark.student crowd is also decent but on the other hand has no.such great college life.there is no room for sports but is developing.there are various clubs in the college.college also goes for inter-college competitions.industrial visits are conducted for every branch every year.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: A good college to pursue your bachelor's degree in Mumbai. Facilities provided are okay types. Recreational activities are a plus point. Many competitions are organized throughout the year with a cultural and technical fest called 'Zephyr'. College conducts training programs for final year students which are helpful in aptitude tests. Overall a recommended college to take admission in.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This is the best college if you want to enjoy the college life. The college has very good infrastructure and facilities for students as well as faculty. I really enjoy the FEST conducted in this college and the FASHION show is just amazing. Faculties of this college are good and the Principal is just too cool and supporting person. He always boosts the morale of students. Sports is another area to look out for in this college. They have a very good sports team. So I strongly recommend this college to all the students.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: One of the numerous below par institutions offering technical education, LTCE endows upon its graduates a degree that neither offers adequate classroom knowledge of undertaken course nor employer valued current industry exposure, its only saving grace being its accreditation from Mumbai University. Potential enrolls are advised to make an informed career choice rather than just follow the herd.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: 1) This is my graduation college and as far one of the best college for mechanical engineering students in Navi Mumbai. 2) The college has best infrastructure for all the departments ie mechanical,computer,electrical,electronics etc. 3) The faculties are the best teachers for mechanical department. 4) But the college lacks to give industrial exposure and placement to the students but they are surely improving on it. 5) The college has also a good library to help them in the curriculum. 6) Last but not at least a value for money college as far as my mechanical department is concerned.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The cultural festival of Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, 'Zephyr', is hosted sometime in March, and the technical festival 'Techzephyr' is hosted around September.Hygiene isn’t great, but that really shouldn’t be of much concern for engineering students.An amazing infrastructure does not make an amazing college.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Like most colleges in the outskirts, Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering (LTCE) doesn’t exactly attract the best crowd. While its not bad, the majority of people come from Vashi, Thane and Koparkhairane. It’s a fairly mixed crowd though. Acceptable.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: A Nightmare for College students is here......"UNIFORMS".....a compulsion...!!! If afraid of being ragged in other colleges, better join LTCE....quite strict about ragging....not good college but if u don't hav option then ok...the waste college ever i have seen.......full y corrupted...... .the fees is not even half the worth....

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Very unhygienic place..canteen on basement which is dirty... No waters in washroom ...leakage and dirty washrooms... Practice building is ok... no campus at all now ....basket ball court without basket..... dirty washrooms... no one to clean washrooms.... Faculty are ok ...Please visit both the buildings ,washroom, and canteen before admission or else.. you will cry

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There have tiny changes in the infrastructure recently, washrooms have turned worse and so have the classrooms. Until the construction work completed students will have to face difficulties and that's gonna a year or two more.EXTC department rocks!! But you will have to face many problems if u missed any important things like submissions or tests, etc. But after all the best branch of LT is EXTC

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Faculties here trouble u a lot especially in second year..!! Many rude brats hangin around..! But a decent college if u don't hav any options... They are real strict about the attendance here..!! This is why students are forced to sit in class and study.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Last possible option if u can't get in better ones. Mechanical department is probably amongst best in Navi Mumbai, though with decent placements & even comps. If u want a hip life, cool friends , great hangouts and decent extracurriculars , this ain't the place to be! Pretty depressing social life here

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The electrical department is the worst here. Now even the infra structure is lagging. We have so many more restrictions placed on our head by the college. The labs in the 1st year comps department and mechanical department are good while the remainder suffer with non functioning equipment.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Fees are high... no other colleges has this much fees especialy in SE... approx 1,13,000... poor facilities.... no gymkhana.... no ground.... poor canteen.... all fests are dumb.... only students of mech should join this college... EXTC is worst....

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Really awesome college. Superb infrastructure, experienced faculty, well equipped labs, a massive library and even placements above 75%!! What more we require? It is surely a competing college for KJ Somaiya, Vidyalankar, Vivekananda, etc. Mechanical Engineering department is best here and some even say that its better compared to Datta Meghe and Father Angel.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: 1,00,000+ fees, No Gymkhana, No ground, Non-hygienic canteen, None of the lift works except exam time, college takes money for gymkhana + college i-cards and so on, doesn't issues cards and there isn't any gymkhana at all... None of the equipments of the labs work... EXTC is worst... This college is only money making collge...

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college has canteen but there is no seating arrangement, the college has lift but none of them are working, so many washrooms but none of them are cleaned and maintained, NO GROUND, NO SPORTS ROOM and we have to PAY Rs 1,13,000 for such nonsense.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I study in this college... This is the worst college of engg I have ever seen in Maharashtra... it does not have proper washrooms and fans does not work... and you can't identify whether it's Gents or Ladies Toilet... it does has not have gym, khanna, playground... college only puts money in pocket... it does not have facility at all...

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Probably the only college in India which charges you a ludicrous 500 bucks for issuing an ID card. I am repenting to this day for joining this college. Well to put it in few words, it is more of a 'money laundering scheme' and less of a college. Classrooms leak during monsoons.Admini stration is not up to the mark.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: No placements in college. Faculty and tpo are not supportive. They do what they want. Office and exam staff is very rude in nature. Non-working instruments are more in every lab. But fee is expensive. Please do not select this college for your egg.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: 1st of all one should not do Engg.But unfortunately if u wanna do Engg don't go with this short college.Its the worst college .Worst management .They just want donations from student.And the faculties are like who the hell r they and how they became a teacher.Worst management worst teaching faculty.Whatever will be the college whoever be the faculties but if u r getting a good placement through the college the college is best.and for us what is this placement....???accha aisa b much hota h kya??the college having worst placement and worst campus.A shitt is very valuebLe than getting admission in this college

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College management only cares about the money. In conclusion don't take admission in my college. Plz try other private colleges and even there take detailed review from a former student.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Although College is good. Placement is not up to mark. Faculties are cooperative.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Lokmanya tilak college of engineering well i can them good remark. and our college management staff are also helpful. never trouble us well from my side i will give them a good remark.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Overall I love my college very much. The college staff & management are very good & help in every way possible. I don't have any negative remarks except for the restriction of college management on the college grounds & canteen during lecture hrs. Also low attendance to classes is frowned upon.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I want to pursue my career in Electrical and power related field. My college has ranked in one of the best colleges in Mumbai for Electrical engineering. So I choose this college. The college has very good Placements. My college organizes Various Fest and National level Competitions in Electrical field.The faculty of professers are Excellent.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College management is good well I had not face anything bad remarks during academic year.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Yes the college is nice but I think they should bring more and more companies to our college which will give our students more opportunity to perform their talent in front of companies and get the job which will be very very beneficial for our students

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: 1)College should focous on actual industrial visits. 2) they should allow students for atleast 6 months of internship 3) college should focus on more practical knowledge other than theoretical knowledge.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College focus on progress of all students and for there better future. But not able to change there conventional methods of teaching. Students are altogether great crowd to be with but some of them are not serious about there career and try to distract you.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is best for engineering in Navi Mumbai area. So if you are the citizens of Navi Mumbai or near area and wanted to do engineering then this is the best college. But the only thing is that mess food is little bit expansive.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Our college is good at some points where they deserve a positive remark but even can get negative remark at the same time. But still, the institution and the trust are responsible for this not the students. So I believe that students should be the face of the college not the trust.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College have a small campus I thing is a negative remark and it have small ground, and positive point is that it have best and free environment teachers are the best part of college and this college is full fill of events

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: infrastructure is good but it could get better if they connect all the buildings like architecture, school, engg college tigether so yhat the campus becomes a bit big and a good place . some teachers need to improve ther teaching skills

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There should be a proper playing ground of college. The fees should be not this much expensive, as the fee structure you can see is very costly. Many extra charges have been made in the fee structure.

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: No there are no negative remarks about the college it is a great experience been getting from college and it is a good place and we get good knowledge from everywhere and had enjoyed my college life in a positive way

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Overall my experience being here since last three years seems to be good enough. Basically the college infrastructure seem to be well maintained. Highly satisfied being here

College Name: Lokmanya Tilak College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Overall the College is good in terms of good education.Although the placement is not that much up to date.The faculties are very supportive.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It is a very decent college for average background students. Mechanical branch is rated with A grand course. Canteen is decent. Almost 80% people get Placed easily. Faculty are quite experienced. Mostly of them are PhD. Have a great experience in teaching.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I got into this college through CAP round. The faculty here is amazing. Labs are equipped with all the new and advanced equipments. SIGCE is the placement capital of Navi Mumbai. Students get internships at various firms. SIGCE is one of the best technical institutes in mumbai. Cultural, Technical and sports fests are celebrated here. The new infrastructure in Ghansoli gives students an amazing experience.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The Faculty of the college is good but the placement is not provided. Canteen and playground facilities are improved now. As college has shifted to Ghansoli the overall infrastructure of college is best. College is best and doesn't worry about jobs. The staff is much more helpful and lectures are best by most of the faculties.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College infrastructure is quite poor. The campus is very small. Student crowd is average. Affordability vice its good option. There is no auditorium so companies can not come on campus. College life is decent. If you have a good crowd in your batch then it will be a good experience but from college side input is quite poor.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: As per my experience i would suggest not to do any stream of engineering from this college. The sole purpose of doing engineering from this college can only be getting Engineering degree from Mumbai university. The fees structure is comparatively less as compared to near by colleges but return of investment is quite poor.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is not that great, infrastructure is below average, teaching faculty is mostly good and are very helpful. The good news would be unlike other colleges this one is continuously trying to develop itself and the first big step is shifting to a new building.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Smt. Indira Gandhi College of Engineering (SIGCE) is a 15-minute walk from Kopar Khairane railway station which falls on the Thane-Vashi/Nerul route. Indira Gandhi has an average infrastructure on the whole. Many teachers are well-qualified and experienced. There is a majority of the Maharashtrian crowd. The canteen of Smt. Indira Gandhi College of Engineering (SIGCE) is not spacious and it becomes suffocating during breaks. But apart from that, it is hygienic and but foods are costly as compared to local price. The cultural festival of Smt. Indira Gandhi College of Engineering (SIGCE) is ‘Ignite’ and also, the sports day takes place in the month of Jan. The technical festival is changing the name every year is held in March. Placements are 5-10% I think.Smt. Indira Gandhi College of Engineering is shifting to ghansoli, navi Mumbai. next year I think. There are great infrastructure and campus as well. Recently NMMT started bus service from kopar khairne to vashi(via Indira Gandhi College).

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college has Wi-Fi facility throughout the campus. The staff is quite good as I experienced and it’s going towards the peak of success in the coming days. Still development centers have to start in the college. The college lacks cafeteria for the refreshment of students. Overall it is a good college and ranks 87 all over the India. Placement record is excellent.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The staff in the placement cell did great work. Around 130 companies visited the campus and recruited 40-50 students. Students with average grades can also get placed. Electrical students got placed in core companies, which is quite impressive.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There are no placements, and none has got placed from our batch. From our senior batch, two students got placed. Only ten students got internships from my batch. There is a placement cell, but it is useless. The highest salary package offered was 3 LPA. Only one company called Torrent Power has visited our campus.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: You will cherish yourself in this college. There is no second thought before joining this college.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: positive is college structure and maintenance by non teaching staff cleaning and all is good so that no pollution there cleaning staff on each floor and a each section there's 3 sections and 8 floor college with management building of 3 floor maintained clear clean and neat hats off to the non teaching staff if the college

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The management doesn't pay salary to the faculty on time, so in that case, they do the hard work for students but they don't give them their wages on time is the only sad part.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The teacher's gave personal attention to interested

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: negative remarks is huge , because the faculty is small ( small computer labs ,small electrical labs , as well more improvements needed) honestly some computers in computer labs are stopped , even we don't like the teaching staff over there , they just teach us like we are robots (if you are present its okay , either go to hell) they even not full fill our concepts

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Our college has good management and the staff helps with every aspect of educational needs.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: everything is good. management is also good. they manage all the events and activities very well and with good manner. they are very kind-hearted.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Our college has one of the best management and the staff helps a lot with every aspect of educational needs.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Since the relocation of the college, the campus seems more promising than that of the earlier one. Since there are not placements through this college, ensure it is the last college on your list while choosing and selecting among different colleges. The staff members are terrible and I'll advise opting for a better college.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is quite good... But they must do something about placement because it is the most important thing for last year students.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I had bad experiences in the college.I suggest students to get A grade college's if they dont want to struggle in future for their jobs.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Through centralised admission process. Your score would be compared with other participants and admission is only through merit. IGCOE website or Mumbai university website will provide you details of the admission process which may vary as per course.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Management is good, teaching is good campus is little small and placement needs to improve

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college was an institution by itself. It was definitely good. Any such educational society is a boon to mankind. It can be in no ways bad as it always imparts good and quality education. There is always something to learn

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Overall the faculty of instru at this college sucks,but computer and electronics branch has some good faculty. Management here is mediocre. So to conclude average college and can be avoided if other options are available.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College dont have Sport Ground. Whole college only have one projector which also bad in condition. Please dont take admission in this college if u want education digitaly or by new techniq. Teacher Knowledge is Good. But lack of Computer lab and others ga

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The placement committe is good. Good professors. The nature is good, the programs conducted are very good and one can show his hidden talent, in the annual function named IGNITE. Principal sir provides many opportunities for students.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I was unable to enjoy my college life because of lot of stress I had to face in my studies. I feel insensitive and stubborn college management behind it. They were earning a lot on the grounds of "Development Fund" but were not improving infrastructure

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Don't opt for this College you can't truly enjoy your amazing 4 years but you will definitely get an experience unmatched to any other college you can get into,don't decide for this college. For such experience.

College Name: Smt Indira Gandhi College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College life was decent in this college as majority of the students were very friendly and easy to interact. The faculty was very examination oriented and stringent but qualified enough to teach. Annual events, committee events & industrial visits were all part of an experience from this college

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: The infrastructure was average there but was not bad at all. The faculties were very supportive , lots many events are hosted now a days to engage student and even teachers by both teachers and students. Even the facilities are made more advance . Student's suggestions are taken into consideration and worked on it

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: The infrastructure is good everything you need to be an engineering college is available.The canteen food is cheap, hygienic. There are 2 building blocks in which you have non-computer branches such as chemical, biomedical, biotechnology in the older one where as comps, IT, EXTC are present in the newer one.The faculty team is lenient, supportive, and qualified enough to make you an engineer.placements are good enough 550 offers came for a total of 570 studnets.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Tsec-A college with life and happiness. tsec as a college is full of masti and fests.It has IVs and all but studies here are of a level the industry exposure is also very good as well as the placements. situated in bandra west in one of the prime location I would recommend it for any other average student in mumbai

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: The building infrastructure is very good, the campus is small, but everyday there's some new thing happening in the college which makes it so much more fun to attend. The crowd here is amazing and everyone tries to help each other out.The teaching faculty cannot be termed as good or bad, there are some exceptional teachers and there are some average ones, but overall they get the job done.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Best collage in terms of horning your communication and presentation skills. Amazing location and possibly best crowd one can get for engineering college. Faculty is highly professional. Very good infrastructure. Placements are at par with what the top colleges get in Mumbai. Definitely comes in top 3 engineering colleages in Mumbai.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: TSEC is one of the happening college in Mumbai, one of the tallest building but infrastructure is okay okay. Its not college with big lobbys to walk by and sit in groups . You will feel like some residential building with some classrooms. TSEC has many events throughtout the year. If you are part of some committee then its good for you else, your wasting your college time. It has best placements with average faculty. Students of IT dept find difficult to bunk lectures, whereas, other department students can bunk easily. Fees is too high!

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Although infrastructure is not good, the locality and crowd makes up for it. Not very study oriented but good placements make up for it. Not great faculty. Co curricular activities are on top with numerous committees like IETE,CSI,MS,SC and many more .So overall a good choice.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: TSEC is one of the best College under Mumbai University. The crowd here is just fab, so is placements. Companies paying from 2.4 LPA to 12 LPA visit TSEC campus. The teaching staff is good(not great). Non-teaching staff is also good and supportive. The college environment is also awesome. It is located at Hear of Bandra i.e Linking Road. There are 3-4 colleges around TSEC. Loads of eatables are available near the college. Lots of College Festivals are conducted. There are Lots of Student Committees. Overall a Good College. No hostel availability.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: My college life is amazing and full of new experiences every day. Our college infrastructure is cool, placements are for all, the crowd is as good as any other college in Mumbai and the faculty is outstanding and supportive. The co-curricular activities in our college make us different from others and we love TSEC for that.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Being situated in the heart of Bandra, you'll have an amazing college life. It is equipped with all the latest facilities. The faculty is very good. Portion taught is up to date. Being affiliated to Mumbai University exam patterns and submissions are very methodological. Attendance is not a very big issue in this college. However, we need to have a minimum of 75% attendance per semester.It's ranked 5th in Maharashtra.Fests keep happening round the year to give you a break from the monotonous studies. Even if you are new to the college you'll never feel out of place. Travelling is not an issue as it is situated right next to Bandra station. Share autos are available outside the college gate throughout the day. The canteen provides lip-smacking food. But, still, if you aren't satisfied, there are umpteen of restaurants around the corner namely Burger King, McD, MOD, etc.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: I spent 3 years of my graduation in TSEC. the experience I had was in no comparison to any other educational institutes had to offer. from innumerable IV and festivals to high-quality staff, this is where I always wanted to be. the college also offers better placement opportunities. companies like Deloitte which do not recruit from any other colleges come here only.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College (TSEC) is located on the very famous Bandra Linking Road. It's a 10-minute walk from Bandra station (W.Rly. & Harbour Rly.). Hundreds of share rickshaws from the station drop you to the college. Thadomal Shahani Engineering College is surrounded by many other famous colleges of the same HSNC board like MMK and R.D. National College and the very famous IIPM. Just like many other colleges in the city of Mumbai, TSEC, too, doesn't have any sprawling campus. Attendance is not a very big issue at Thadomal Shahani but they do stress on it sometimes. So one needs to be thoda attentive and pay heed to warnings, if any, just for the sake of it. Thadomal Shahani Engineering College (TSEC) has a 50% minority quota for Sindhis, so the cream crowd is very much expected. Decent people from good families are expected here. As it is located in the heart of the city, there are students from Central, South, Northern suburbs and Navi Mumbai. General life as such is a very happy-go-lucky types. The annual intra-collegiate event of Thadomal Shahani Engineering College (TSEC) is called Avalanche and is usually held in October. This is done primarily to provide an opportunity for the freshers in college to participate and get to know the college and their seniors better. Isaac (Technical Festival) and Trifles (Cultural Festival).

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Totally fun with many extracurricular activities, not very good with curriculum but satisfactory. Gives the experience to be cherished whole life and good opportunities for placements and at the end of it all depends on you. Many possible awesome outings because of the awesome locality of college.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Wow..! My college days are unforgettable and in fact, those days are happy days in my life. Every student has those days in their life's as well. I enjoyed myself a lot when I was in Jr. College. I have learned a lot from my professors. Whenever I was wrong they corrected me. They used to be very friendly with us. We used to have competitions. No matter whether we win the competition or not, but they used to tell us participation is very important. They were very supportive and encouraged us in all things to grow up in our life's. We used to crack jokes on others. We used to comment on others. We used to bunk the class. We used to jump the walls for second show movies. If we caught by sir's we led to punishing. In fact, I experienced. So, college life is so beautiful, nobody can forget those days in their life's and those days will never be back again.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: The college life in TSEC is really amazing. The faculty is good, infrastructure is fair enough. a ton of places to hang out. A fest, one every two weeks just makes the perfect mix for you to enjoy your college life. and the placement record is excellent too..

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Thadomal shahani engineering college is one of the oldest private colleges in Maharashtra state with the following branch 1 Computer engineering 2 Information technology 3 Chemical engineering 4 Biotech engineering 5 Biomedical engineering 6 Electronic and telecommunication engineering

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: TSEC is a house of committees and social events. There are immense numbers of extracurricular activities which a student can take part in apart from just going to college and studying. The faculty is good to a certain extent and also approachable. Placements are good.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: This is the worst College you can ever experience. The faculty is extremely rude and full of attitude. They cannot teach and cannot communicate with the students politely. They have made my life a living hell and just cannot wait to leave this college. They won't let you sit for the exams if your attendance is less than 75%. They will fear you of giving a drop at least 7 times a day. It is absolutely a nightmare being in this college.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: College is really excellent in terms of extra curriculum activities and in terms of people and location where it is located, people here are happy and chilled, infrastructure has become bit old but you will find all the comforts here except lecture halls,faculty varies by departments some departments are cool with everything while some departments get up to your nerves,placements here have grown every year with interesting packages, 80% crowd is Sindhi while other 20% have come on their merits, go for it if you want to have good career along with fun with your engineering period.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: This will be one place where you can see change in yourself. Change in you when you entered college and you leave college will be phenomenon. Only one place where you can develop your personality. No attendance compulsory!!! Yes you read right..There is no attendance compulsory. You'll find festivals everyday here. This helps you in many ways. For technical helps you in creating site,for non technical your negotiation skills etc. Placement policies are also awesome. HERE there is no concept of dream company. You can sit for 2 companies.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Studying at TSEC was a wonderful experience from experienced faculty to extravagant festivals, from the social life to engineering to sports everything was encouraged and supported along with academics. One of the best colleges in town. The best part is the location.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: You would get great peer group, nothing special about faculty

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: None. Overall it is a very good college with good faculty and students.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Overly it is good college but the college is old. The class do have air conditioning but infrastructure is quite spooky. There are two buildings of the college. The new one is good and well constructed. College management is relatively friendly and there to help all the time. The culture events are fabulous success every year and old trends are always followed. Highly recommended college for Computer and electronic engineering.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Good college environment and good at teaching and also there is some good name for the college in the society, it also provides good placements after the completion of the course. Teachers here are also experienced.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: The college management was amazing but they should work more towards betterment of students. The student bodies and committee aure slowly being dissolved to bring focus towards studies and lectures but its not a win win situation because the lectures are also not happening properly and student Bodies are dissolved so no extra curricular also

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: This college is best suitable because of the quality of the knowledge given they give their whole to give u the right knowledge. Teachers are very helpful they not only help us with our academic but with personal issues as well.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: The college management is very good. All the notices and decisions taken by the principal are properly informed. Bad remarks would be a low campus area.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Good student culture and active student and social life.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: No campus but very strong in extra curricular activities. Good seniors and good surrounding to have fun.The environment of this college is so good. All the classrooms are big enough, classes are clean. The library of this college is one of the best part of this college, it is so large and full of books. The laboratories are well maintained and every library have all the needed equipment.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: All over it's a decent college if you dont get into any NITs. Since the city place the role any college here is managable. Negative thing about the college is infrastructure and canteen. The food served is not made in hygenic place

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Every college has some positive and negative aspects. In my college most problems that we faced were with the infrastructure to be precise the lifts. Our classroom was on 8th floor and most of the time one lift was not working and there was a choas

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall its a really good college both in terms of academics and extra curricular activities. You will meet really good people here. I enjoy every bit of my time here in my college with friends, we play a lot chat a lot. I hope this helps.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall a very good college. Students can look forward to go there

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Positive side was accessibility and locality. Negative was the inavailabity of sports ground and quality professors

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: The College is pretty good in terms of overall remarks but there are a few issues as there are in every single college in India. There is always issue with budget when it comes to festivals. There are restrictions imposed on the contingent teams etc etc.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: It was a wonderful time in Thadomal Shahani Engineering College. I got to learn both professional and personal skills throughout the course. It is a college where a student must definitely go to learn the best aspects of both technical and personal skills knowledge

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is really good as its located in a prime location, thats Bandra Mumbai. There are alot of places besides that can be visited by students to chill. Also some of the faculties are really good, they write books for engineering syllabus. But overall the college is really good for aspiring engineering students.

College Name: Thadomal Shahani Engineering College, Mumbai
Reviews: Thadomal is generally known as TSEC. so TSEC is best college according to me best teaching faculty.best labs. best seniors, best hangouts places like bandstand ,Carter's road, gilato, and many more. canteen is not so big bt food is osm. ravi rice..franky. how xan we forget linking road ..clg is just close to linking road ..kfc ..mcdy..TSEC is also popular for fests like carma ,avalanche ,.infrastructure is not so good but clg located at heart of city bandra..placements aee also good .n main thing sindhi coata

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is not so great because the college is in bandra and its a very posh area,college is all but but two buildings.placements are excellent, we have to companies coming for placements, adjoining national college has good canteen which we can use, sports facilities are not much great but we do have a recreational room which is okay, administration it's slightly annoying but bearable it's a renowned college and live up to its expectations

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Labs are open until 9 pm...Library is Open till 8.30pm...Teachers are highly qualified, supporting and enthusiastic. Placements average salary is the best in MU. Companies like Accenture, L&T, Wipro, Morgan Stanley etc visit for Placements Very Near to Azad Nagar Metro Station. 10 min walk from Andheri Railway Station Inside plush green Bhavan's campus. Has 2 Mess canteens nearby and a lot of food stalls and canteens near the campus.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Situated in the heart of Mumbai, this college resides in 52 acres of green campus. As of now SPIT is the best college in Mumbai University. Strongest point of this college is their academics. This college is one of the very few who actually think about learning science and personality development of the student. Although sometimes it may seem tedious to follow their schedule, but, believe me, it will be worth when you will be sitting for a job or decide to do something different. Under the guidance of one of the coolest principal, this college is improving by leaps and bounds.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Labs are open until 9 pm...Library is Open till 8.30pm...Teachers are highly qualified, supporting and enthusiastic. Placements average salary is the best in MU. Companies like Accenture, L&T, Wipro, Morgan Stanley etc visit for Placements Very Near to Azad Nagar Metro Station. 10 min walk from Andheri Railway Station Inside plush green Bhavan's campus. Has 2 Mess canteens nearby and a lot of food stalls and canteens near the campus.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has got everything that you want and also all that you don't want.! Want: Awesome fests, industry exposure, decent placements, awesome crowd, best seniors, supportive faculty though not the best but average faculty, huge campus, many canteens. If you do not want hectic schedule, lots of submissions, lots if graded tests. In all: this college has taught me time management the best.!

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It's one of the finest colleges of Mumbai. The faculty is supportive and the environment in the college is just the best to develop yourself. It's a hectic schedule with lots of submissions and all but it teaches you time management like never before. The crowd here is the best and the seniors are the best that you could ask for. Very supportive and always ready to advise and help you. Best environment for personality development.!

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: the campus is huge. The fests offer you so much to learn. This college teaches you time management the best reasons of its hectic schedule and frequent tests which are graded and that doesn't sound like fun at all, but it's so hectic that u start enjoying it because you in all that together with all your. The crowd here is just amazing. Few nerds are there but then it's expected since it's top college of Mumbai. I'd say the best place to learn anything and explore everything is SPIT.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: SPIT, one of the renowned engineering colleges in Mumbai, the college where I happen to be doing my engineering too. For me, this campus is more than what it stands for. After spending merely six months as a student of this institution, I have everything I could have ever asked for. Because it's more than a college campus. This is a place where I'm learning, and not studying. I'm learning things that will actually matter ten years down the line. There's more than rote learning studying here. There are people here, not just the students but the teachers too, who have positively impacted my life. And yes, the friends that I've made, they are going to be for more than the 4 years of engineering.SPIT is larger than the educational institution it is. This is the place where they teach you not only how to learn but also how to handle the ropes of life.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Sardar Patel institute of technology (or spit). It's the prism and the students, the incident light rays. It brings out all the colours of everyone who passes through it. And although it keeps our noses so close to the books that they are rubbed raw, it does give us the scent of the pages and allows us to explore and expand our own potential. The all round approach to the students welfare is seen here. The udaan, the space, the clubs, the freshers. The seniors, here, always encouraging and supportive, the principal, always ready to see to the classes, the teachers, working hard as hell to keep up spit's fame and status. Spit makes sure that these 4 yrs are the best years of every student's life.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Compromised sizes(you will never use the full 47 acres of the campus) and facilities in gymkhana(Just a little room) and playground. Relatively better placements backed by wide opportunities to explore the corporate world. Wonderful library. And every good college like this one has a hectic and busy schedule so there is not much choice left in that area.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Located in an inaccessible part of the suburbs, the college still manages to pull the brightest minds in the city. If you are unable to get into IITs, NITs, this college might be a decent choice. Pros- Good Placements and almost 100% placement. Decent Infrastructure and a huge campus. Cons- lack of hostels, have to maintain a good attendance. The crowd is primarily nerdy, but a bunch of cream crowd is expected.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Located in suburbs, considered as 1 of the best colleges in the state. Although the college is quite good, but as it comes to Mumbai university it lacks behind the best colleges. The crowd is much better than other government colleges and it has the talented pool of people but I think it still has a long way to go.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Good people to hang out around. The crowd is competitive and provides room for development. Fest is a good experience.It provides a good exposure to the corporate world. The faculty is average. The college schedule definitely teaches you time management. Too many assignments to do and continuous tests are a bit too hectic.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Seniors are helpful. Fests are fun. Good corporate exposure. A lot of extracurricular activities. Lots of stupid submissions, though. Attendance is a big issue. College schedule teaches you time management big time. Very hectic college schedule. teaching quality not that good.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The best of city lads get admission here, but they are just like any of your school friends with whom you have done crazy and stupid stuff. But you can still survive here, it takes some more active neurons, that's it. One great advantage is you can be anything you want to be. There is a lot of flexibility in student programs and events. Students take an initiative to do many good things themselves and there are least hurdles to clear it. Though teachers are not up to the mark, they neither are a pain if you are doing something innovative, knowledge and talent are respected.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The people you are surrounded with in this college are amazing. A perfect environment to grow and develop yourself. You get a lot of opportunities here to have a look at the reality of the corporate world. Internal tests are pretty strict. Attendance is a big issue, though.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Sardar Patel Institute Of Technology lives up to his name of being one of the best colleges in Mumbai. Strict up to an extent; this college provides a great environment for academics as well as co-curricular activities. Great exposure to the corporate world.All in all, A complete package.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Placed at the heart of Mumbai with students coming from different corners SPIT has well-maintained labs which have all the necessary equipment. The teachers are fair and decent but internal tests are little strict. The crowd is mixed with all kinds of people. Lots of extracurricular activities are there and fests are pretty amazing too.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: SPIT provides a very nurturing and friendly environment with great opportunities for an individual to develop and grow professionally. The faculty is very good, helping the students in every possible way possible. The infrastructure is pretty decent. If corporate world is what your target is, then SPIT is probably the best place to be in. The college ensures overall development of and individual by giving opportunities in every field possible. However, if you're looking for a technical profile, you might face a little difficulty in the beginning as many opportunities come your way. The committees (ecell, ieee, etc) in the college helps you to develop your corporate profile by providing you with the opportunities needed for it.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: SPIT is ranked amongst the top colleges in Mumbai. It has a lush green campus situated in the heart of Mumbai. The faculty is experienced and highly trained. The overall atmosphere in the college is competitive therefore pushing students to excel in academics. SPIT also has its own startup incubating center thereby giving students an impetus to explore new ideas.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Amazing environment to develop skill set required to sustain in a corprate world. Good amount of Exposure. Supportive faculty with loads of experience. Will teach you time management efficiently. The culture that prevails amongst students is very nice. Seniors share a tight bond with their juniors and help them through anything. No ragging is prevalent.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Great Placements 2nd best for Engineering in mumbai Good faculty immense industry exposure Great infra.. Decent faculty Discipline Attendance required Good companies pick up the top students great competition Great computer Laboratories WiFi on all floors Awesome campus

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I had the best time of my life during my 4 years at SP. The college is one of the best colleges in Mumbai with excellent placements at world renowned companies like Morgan Stanley, Microsoft, Delloite, KPMG, Mitsubishi, NVidea to name a few. Apart from the regular engineering, there are great avenues for other activities like sports, debates, cultural events and even major international competitions which the students of SP including myself have won. Organizing the technical or cultural events, being part of various technical and non-tech committees, avenues to participate in all sorts of events, SP provides you with great opportunities to grow as an individual

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology is one of the finest colleges under the Mumbai University fraternity. It is a sister institute of the autonomous Sardar Patel College of Engineering and a lot of derivatives from it. The faculty includes a variety of qualified and experienced professor. The Electronics department headed by Dr. Rathod has produced some of the best alumni of the university. The department takes earnest efforts in the development of the students. Most of the students receive good on campus placements and a large number of students pursue Masters education.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Campus here is awesome and u will find an excellent crowd. The only problem is hostel but one can easily avail PGs. If u won't be able to get into NITs or VITs then it is the best college for engineering one would choose. Placements in Comps and IT department are excellent, extc placement are fair enough

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: In 2017 this College received autonomy status from Mumbai University for 5 years..The college faculty is capable enough to handle autonomy. Infrastructure is really good. Students here are enthusiastic but unfortunately not dedicated towards research and development, even though there is a good RND platform. College life is great!! Good cultural fests and mediocre techfests. Placements records are excellent for Computer Engineering and good for other branches. Companies like Siemens,etc even comduct campus interviews for internships.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Being in this college is one of the best things that has happened to me. The quality of students here is amazing , everyone is engrossed in some or the other activity every time . The campus of our college is too vast and beautiful.For students planning to pursue MBA or MS after Engineering, our college is one of the best college you can get into. The quality of education is not top notch but it isn't the worst too, besides the students here are academically so strong that many a time you don't even feel the need of teachers. Our placements ranks second in all over the Mumbai after Vjti. We have an incubation section for students planning for startups. Our incubation center is funded Rs. 2 Crores by the Government and is the only one of it's type in the whole Mumbai University. Beside our college only need IIT Bombay has such an incubation center. So needless to say but our college is the best for students planning for startups.Our college gained autonomy from the coming semester so things are going to definitely improve. In a nutshell , our college is one of the best colleges you can get into.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The best thing about this college is that soon we'll be getting autonomy and well enter the league of colleges such as VJTI and IIT-B. Futhermore I love the fact that we have such a huge campus with all the amenities one can think of. There is even a lake in our campus! Curricular activities are top notch too.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Here are some of the perks of this college: Excellent faculty Well equipped labs Industry exposure Ample research opportunities Excellent placement records Loads of internships TBI has introduced the advent of many startups working from our college.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has excellent infrastructure and the cherry on the cake is that we will be getting Autonomy soon. The professors are very helpful and we are provided with many opportunities for internships as well as research work projects. Our alumni interact with us too through the alumni network which was recently setup.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college promotes an Educational Environment that combines academic study with the excitement of intellectual curiosity for engineers of tomorrow. It has a TBI which recently got a 4 crore grant from the government. Many clubs present in various branches keep the students engaged after college hours, thus ensuring all round development of one's personality. Experienced and helpful faculty combined with many internship opportunities ensures that students turn out to be proficient engineers. Though i couldnt get a bf

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall the college is quite good. There are ups and down for every college out there and this is also one of them but it has recently surpassed VJTI so it's a proud moment.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Sardar Patel is one of the reputed colleges in India. After 12th the only moto which I had was to get a good college and a good branch. Sardar Patel was a dream college for me and getting admission over here was like a dream come true.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: There are no bad remarks as such. Only Attendance is a issue. 75% is must.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Placement is the main factor I chose this college. This year there was a vast increase in the product based companies visiting our campus. It is ranked among the top 3 engineering colleges of Mumbai.Also average salary offered here is high.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college used have its own canteen but it was recently closed due to intimation from fire and health department. So one needs to go to outside the campus for food. One can also go to the SPCE canteen or SPJIMR canteen in case you need a mess.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the best college for engineering. All activities Ihave taken participation which i was keen to. College is famous for its teaching methods and it is also support sports for inter college level activities.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Sardar Patel institute of technology is one of the best engineering colleges in Mumbai and you should definitely consider it as one of your top choices. I have nothing but positive things to say about the college. You meet great people here, make some amazing friends who would be a part of this amazing journey with you. In the end i would say to enjoy your time over here.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: it is perhaps the best college amongst all MU affiliated colleges. it has a great TBI ,that helps bring out the entrepreneur in you. infrastructure is good too and is improving constantly. the faculty is great too and helps out the students in any manner possible.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: great college that helps the character to grow in every student. our college has mac labs that help in the development of ios apps ,which I am sure is not provided by many other colleges. several internship opportunities are available to every student including fes.

College Name: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: S.P.I.T is a great college with various facilities and the best of faculties. the college has really helped me hone my skills and bring out the best in me. the teachers have been supportive and very easy to approach. the college is good not only at studies but also at extra activities.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: A very good college for overall development of the student. Faculty is great and helps us in every way possible. Ground is there for playing and practicing various sports.crowd is awesome too.made really great friends here. TBI is great and helps us get acquainted to various industries.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is very good , college is equipped with more than required labs , has its own football , basketball grounds , gymkhana , cafeteria . Faculty is highly qualified with PhD's and Ms from elite IIT's . Staff is friendly and supportive . Students are given opportunities to explore their interests and talents through cultural programs and paid internships , crowd coming here is selective based on merit and campus placements are top notch with mass recruiters visiting every year.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Campus placement has improved drastically due to the young and dynamic TPO. 80% of students getting placed and rest 20% moving abroad for higher studies. you will get placed if u have at least 55% marks and necessary skills in coding and interpersonal relations. Infrastructure is good and management is friendly.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Xavier Institute of Engineering is affiliated to the University of Mumbai. The institute offers Bachelor of Engineering courses.The institute offers Bachelor of Engineering with specialization in Computer Engineering, Electronics and Tele-communication, Information Technology courses.The institute's infrastructure is modern with well equipped facilities. A variety of teaching and learning techniques are employed to impart knowledge and skills to students at Xavier Institute of Engineering

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: XIE offers B.E. in three fields - Information Technology, Computer Engineering and Electronics & Telecommunications Engineering. Also, each stream has 60 students intake every year. I would like to say that the infrastructure of the labs and library are good, equipped with latest devices and very well renovated. There are separate laboratories for each subject and for each field.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Xavier's college is a nice college with huge campus and grounds for various activity. The college has a good participation in sports and cultural activities. The college has its own festival spend and transmission which are very popular and interesting. The college crowd is very nice. The faculty is just awesome and helpful. The college is very hygienic and clean. The college canteen is also.nice awesome.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has the Christian minority.the college with a huge campus and beautify surrounding.the college is very hygienic. The college faculty is very helpful and lenient.the college gives a good support to cultural and sports.the college has its own cultural and technical fest spend an and transmission.the college classes is well spaced.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has a huge campus with two grounds and a basketball court. The college has its own cultural festival spend an which is quite famous and also it has its very own technical fest transmission and also has sports festival sparx. The college has an above average placement from companies like tech Mahindra,Infosys etc.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has only three streams I.T, EXTC and Computer Science. The campus is huge and has a huge ground. The college canteen is also good.the classes are well spaced.the college crowd is also nice.the college has its own festival spandan which is very popular for all cultural events.the teaching faculty is also very good and helpful.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has a huge campus comprising of 2 grounds canteen etc. The college has an excellent % of placement. There is the great encouragement of sports and cultural activities by the college principal, staff members and all other committee members.the college life is interesting and of great fun. The surrounding atmosphere is perfect for studying.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The principal has started the system of sending letters at home and threatens to detain students who bunk regularly. As long as you keep it above 70% there should be no problems. Regarding hangouts, there is nothing much in Mahim so the students usually head to Bandra which is nearby. Innumerable places to go once you reach Bandra.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The infrastructure Xavier Institute of Engineering is not very satisfactory. The college ground is big enough to play all sports. Majority of the lab equipment's work properly. Classrooms are in decent condition. Libraries have desired number of books. Lack of lush green plantations is a big thumbs down to such a huge campus.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Xavier Engineering College is definitely not your first choice but it is a better option than the colleges which are far away from Mumbai if you don’t manage to get into the top colleges. Most of the teachers at Xavier Institute of Engineering (XIE) are good but there are a few horrible exceptions. The fresh graduates who have taken up teaching are really pathetic. The best faculty is in EXTC and IT departments.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: 60% of the students get placed. Tech Mahindra takes maximum students. Patni, Infosys, Accenture and Quinox are the other major companies. The placements and salaries offered are just about average. Panasonic recruited a student from EXTC and offered 12 lakh p.a.. Hope it's true.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The placement situation is improved now.This year on wards TCS, accenture, Infosys and Panasonic have started recruiting students. Panasonic offered 1 from EXTC student 12 lacs package to work in Dubai. Also Spandan n Transmission don't happen alternate years...They both happen every year... :)

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: its got d perfect blend of studies , discipline , sports and tons of fun. teachers are cooperative. teaching methodology is nice. regular assignments and tests keep you in pace with approaching semester exams. you get acknowledgement s for any type of co curricular activities. seniors have always been friendly and helpful. lots of sporting activities to show your field mettle.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Oscar Wilde after seeing the 3 story Xavier Institute of Engineering- 'Never knew shit could pile up so high.' Truth be told, this college is not the best way to spend your 4(or more) Engineering years. Reasons being: 1. Attendance is strict as hell. 2. The area sucks. 3. The canteen serves jail food. 4. Average campus 5. The crowd is really really average. Feels like the weight of the world before you graduate. Convocation=sal vation from this God forsaken Guantanamo of a place

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Principal (well I don't really feel like talking about him. It lowers my dignity). Most of the times when you enter the college, you feel like you have come for a wedding. You have a plus point here. You can have dinner for free if you want. Talking of festivals, they are OK except for some restrictions from management. Placement is OK compared to quality of teaching. I give this college 1 star out of 5 star. Don't try to make this college as your option unless you have done very bad in entrance exams.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is ranked 3rd among private colleges in Mumbai by Times of India.It has good infrastructure,lot of labs and a lot of companies come for placements.The faculty is also good and very helpful.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: There are multiple factors which made me choose this college.1- the college ranks 4th all over Mumbai.2- the college provides 100% placement 3- the quality of teaching is very good and teachers are well reputed.4- college focuses on both technical as well as cultural development.5- the college provides an environment of growth.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Staff is very good and helpful. The main negative thing is that ther vicinity is very poorly managed we dont have that many shops near by as it is situated in mahim. Canteen needs improvement. Canteen is shitty in our college we dont have space to sit outside seatings are not clean and food is not that good.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: At first, you will hate the college. I specially hated the college canteen. But yeah. College koi bhi ho, sab gaaliya dete hai. Dost acche banao, memories banao and give your best. I missed alot of these things.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Positive, great environment to study and grow All over more than a medium level college with decent placement records and good student crowd , students come from different parts of Maharashtra to achieve their dreams.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Positive are all mentioned throughout the form Also to mention they really keep the college clean and many trees around the institute which gives nice vibes. Negative can be attendance issue which is actually not enforced by institute but by Mumbai University to which we are affiliated

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: only the gymkhana is not properly managed and no kits are properly there in the place. and about the placements, it's very excellent and very nice. most of the companies come to our campus and they take most of the students.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is ranked 3rd among private colleges in Mumbai by Times of India.It has good infrastructure,lot of labs and a lot of companies come for placements.The faculty is also good and very helpful.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Very good college ranks 3rd In Mumbai among all the negative feedback no negative feedback the only negative feed back is the librarian and in tea they put a lot of water 200 characters why so much ?

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College management was good and supportive overall good and enjoyed our college life.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college life was mostly chilled and had a overall good experience in this college.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Teaching staff is really good. Infrastructure wise need to improve.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall my college is a place where i experienced many things faced many problems,learned how to solve those problems,met many poeple. Faced hardship with some teachers but this experience made me so strong to face the outside world. So all the work we did at our college all the problems we had in turn made me more stronger. So i would say that the management of college is really good. Its how it has to be.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College management sometimes pay too much attention to only studies rather extra-curricular activities. But they are helpful at the end, However if you encounter the Admins you will find that all they talk about is scoring in exams and studies and not care so much about student bodies or extra curriculars.However the director, Father Francis is the best and most supportive for all the things and helps students a lot

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Because i always wanted to get admission in TFWS seat.When i was filling my form to get admission, i applied all College for TFWS.then luckily I got admission in Xavier with TFWS.And i wanted to get in IT department so i got it.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is very good and very well organized.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The teachers are the best thing about XIE, they punish and scold you but also give you term marks. For our batch they made special greeting cards for everyone. We have a big ground for Cricket and Football. Two big Workshops for technical activities.

College Name: Xavier Institute of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: This college rocks as long as you mind your own business. 3rd class staff (especially teaching staff). Library is not at all a favorable place to sit and study (thanks to the mosquitoes). During exams you will get to enjoy Koli music and dance quite often. Don't ever try to eat in the canteen, you'll most probably meet fried cockroach someday. You better go and eat in the next lane.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Nice college. Pretty average though. Most of the time the college is totally empty. I have hardly seen any seniors in my time in XIE. Staff has BMC mentality. Attendance is very strict and teaching is average. If u have 130+ in MH-CET please don't opt for this college

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology (VIT) shares the campus with Vidyalankar Polytechnic and Vidyalankar School of Information Technology. The campus comprises 3 buildings, 2 gardens, a football field, a volleyball ground and also a cricket pitch. Placements at Vidyalankar are quite decent, mainly because of the contacts the college administration has within the industry.A canteen and a cafe both offer a wide range of food and beverages. Food is edible and moderately cheap.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: VIT has one of the best faculties in mu. Their electronic labs are very well equipped. They provide us with good study materials. They also carry out various programmes like eyantra: a robotic competition in which I too had taken part and it was a good experience because I gained ample amount of knowledge from it. VIT is best known for its infrastructure. I have also made a good group of friends with whom I not only have fun but also study. In short I am lucky enough to be in VIT.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: My college life in VIT is much better than my junior college life . The infrastructure is awesome it looks like a mall. classrooms are big and spacious. Faculty is very good and complete all the syllabus. Canteen provides good food but the cost is very high... If u are a bright student placement is guaranteed but no. if companies coming are less.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Happy to be part of such college, amazing infrastructure, super awesome faculty, and all other events organized in college are very well organized best college. We are being well trained by are mentors for our career and different seminars by different expertises are also arranged.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Vidyalankar has a nice campus and excellent faculty who are highly qualified. Our classrooms have AC. So, no problem in summers. We get lots of other facilities also like computers with the internet anytime in college. Our college also has wifi in entire campus. VIT is one of the best college affiliated to Mumbai University.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This college's infrastructure is awesome. The teaching faculty is nice they help you with your every problem One can enjoy life in this four years. You can be a good student if u listen to lectures because teaching is nice. Labs are maintained. Recommended college.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Talking about studies The faculty is really nice they help so much their efforts are there. Then labs are maintained. Nice equipment. The fest is fun here. Then sports n all is there. Infrastructure looks like Mall. Nice n big canteen. Enjoyable life on this campus.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Although situated in a relatively repulsive area, once you enter the gates, Vidyalankar Institue of Technology boasts an excellent infrastructure and a diminutive but decent-looking campus. Apart from the locality and the accessibility, shortcomings about the college, per se, are pretty hard to spot. The laboratories have state of the art equipment and the library offers a myriad of books, both old and new. The professors, like in every other college, are diverse; some good and some a tad below par. The crowd is heterogeneous, yet affable; the seniors, too, are very obliging. There are two canteens that serve fairly average food. The college does not provide any sort of accommodation for OHU students.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I have had a great experience with his college, I personally feel that college must be secondary it's up to individuals interest on how you perform during your graduation and very less it depends on the college. So if you are a good learner VIT would not be a bad option.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: VIT is a college which will help in your all round development. The infrastructure of the college is excellent while the faculty, canteen, placements are decent. The has good transportation from Wadala as well as Dadar stations. The crowd of the college is decent but there are very few places to hang out outside the college.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Here education quality is really great. The crowd is great and people come from really good places. The college is in the best locations of Mumbai. The food quality of canteen is also hygienic and also there are many places in Mumbai where you can hang out around after college. There is a safety for students in the college. Faculty members are good and helpful. You will really end up in a good company.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It has one of the best architecture which makes you feel very comfortable(P.S. all classrooms, as well as computer labs, are air conditioned ). Helpful faculty & non-teaching staff makes your routine easy. Renowned companies visit the campus for placement. Hosts one of the best college annual festivals call VERVE in which you can take part in any committee you want to.Has lots of Technical and also Non-technical committees which help you to grow as a team member as well as an individual. Overall a great place to be.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The campus can be compared to a mall, the teaching staff is friendly and approachable, a non-teaching staff is exactly opposite. The campus is wifi enabled but the connection sometimes is negligible. The college has a good crowd. Teaching is also very good. Libraries are really good. No four wheeler parking for students.
