The area surrounding the college is really shady. College will train you for your placement interviews. The auditorium is really good. The kits in the labs are sometimes in a bad shape but you can live with them.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Faculty of this college is nice .infrastructure is the best placements are good. Canteen of this college is also good. Good library. Teachers are friendly . Labs are also good . Cleaning is also proper. Overall best college.hostels are quite far from the college.Nonteaching faculty is also helpful

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Best infrastructure as compared to any other colleges of Mumbai. Good placements. Good crowd. No attendance compulsion and experienced lecturers. You can enjoy four years of your life along with studying. Good for pursuing MS and also good internship opportunities

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The best college faculty ,good infrastructure good crowd and affordable Canteen is good Life in this college is best and really great experience Every week there is new workshop or conference and etc Gymkhana is best place to play with your friends Teachers teaching is nest as they use ppt presentation and quiz for every subject Department takes feedback for them n they take it in positive way so no teacher does partiality Overall the college is really awesome be sure with vidyalankar!!!!!!!

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College infrastructure is just like awesome.collage always take a responsibility of students involvement in each n every activity conducted by the different student council.The professors in the college are very experienced people they give u a deep knowledge about the subject conceptually.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Abhorrent. Mostly egotistical faculty knowing nothing beyond their own BE or ME probably done from here and working here because anywhere else they won't get value. Everyone behaves like they own students. Extracurricular activities are squashed. Director is far too happy with mass recruitment. Important tools like github are considered hyped up shit here.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The campus is superb, faculty top class very helpful, notes are also very student friendly.good placement record.two libraries where all books are available reading room is there. The whole campus is fully AC and wifi is also there. Very great atmosphere.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Academic wise its a good college to opt for. There are professors who look forward to teach in a way which is easy for students to understand and they also complete the entire syllabus. Library facility is good. Food available in the canteen is bit costly.VERVE our cultural fest is what you can enjoy. The classrooms are spacious and air-conditioned. There are projector and LCDs also available during teaching. The average package got by students here is around 3- 4 Lakh per annum. Few of the students do manage to bag bigger and very high paying offers too.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Vidyalankar has got amazing infrastructure. Though college is placed in bit slum area but inside our college you will get healthy environment! The college has proper cleaning systems, well maintained washrooms, water purifiers. We have all AC classrooms. All faculty members are so friendly with students. They do help people and students are very enthusiastic to do their work! Our student council is also very much helpful. They arrange events every Friday and Saturday so that people can learn new things! Better response has got from students to these events!! Companies like TCS,  L&T places our students with satisfactory packages.So overall it's a great college.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This is my second year in this institute and so far it has been very good. Teachers teach with great effort. Infrastructure is very classy. The college has maintained a good ground but you need to take permission from sports secretary if you want to play on the ground. We have the print in our college so that we take printout in the college and we need not roam out for the print. Vidyalakar live is very useful, it is just like a social networking site where we can discuss, the teachers can share experiments and assignments. Soon vidyalankar is going to get nba accredit ion which would be very beneficial for the institute the students.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I have been in Vidyalankar Institute of technology for more than 1.5 years and the experience has been great. I love the infrastructure. It is better than most of the other colleges. I have been to and I have been to quite a few good ones. At first, look the college looks like a 4-star hotel. It has a life-size chess, an Amphitheatre and an award-winning Auditorium.All the classrooms are Air-Conditioned. One of the important utility for students is VPrint which allows students take printouts at the nominal cost.The cleanliness inside the college is worth talking about. You won't see even a single piece of paper lying in the corridor. This is the joint effort of the cleaning staff, students and teachers.Now talking about the ambiance, the college is surrounded like a peninsula by a not-so-good area (a slum actually) Sangam Nagar. Dosti Acres, the famous towers is walking distance from the college. There is a Coffee Day Xpress(CDX) inside the college. Some of hanging out points near college include Dosti Acres, Five Gardens and Big Cinema IMAX is also nearby.VERVE - the college festival has tons of activities spread over glorious 3 days. The Events include Technical events like Lazer Maze and Lazer Tag and non-Technical Events like Creative Writing etc.So that's all about my experience great Vidyalankar Institute of Technology.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Amongst all Mumbai university colleges, my college is one of the best in infrastructure and campus placements and moreover the faculty os also very nice and co-operative.The hostel is a bit far from the college but it is very nice and neat. It also has a very nice ambience for studies.There are iPads provided in the libraries and very nice and affordable canteen.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Has this college provide their students a good quality of training and development courses. Faculty are welled experience in their field. This college provides many a knowledge and experience activity in every one. College campus is best from others college.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: If you have ever been to Vidyalankar Institute of technology, your first impression would be whether I am in a mall, there is no parallel to any engineering college in mumbai and not just outside the classrooms inside are no less epic. I had the good fortune of not only being a student here but being on other side as a faculty for a short stint post college. The values I gained in this college and friends I made have made this one helll of an educational trip

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is very good but the surrounding area of the college is a big problem .While studies are well taken care of by the excellent faculties (one doesn't need to join classes) ,extra curricular activities are almost nothing compared to other colleges with similar CET cutoffs.Placements again are nothing to what it should be for a college with such infrastructure and faculty. No dream company visits the institute. 3-4 mass recruiting companies visit (mass recruitment ~35-45students /company).Again very less compared to other colleges and only IT companies visit.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Spent 4 years of my life here. Faculty used to be top notch, some of the best profs in Mumbai used to teach here which was the USP of the college. However the faculty quality has deteriorated. But the college infrastructure has improved every year since. Even though the college is not located in a particularly attractive area i.e. Sangam Nagar, it nonetheless  makes up for it with the campus life. Something or the other keeps happening there everyday. And the new management block that has been built...simply WOW! Placements are one thing which could drastically improve in the future and be better managed. But that's the case with most of the engineering colleges. The cultural fest and tech fest are two of the most eagerly anticipated events here. The cafeteria has a wide range of foods..from burgers and pastries to dosas, rolls and maggie. A new CCD store had also opened opposite the football ground.Coming to the sports facilities...there is a sports room which has all the sports equipment and where if you go you'll definitely find someone or the other playing TT or Carom. There are two grounds which are used for either cricket or football alternatively.  The college is not that strict about attendance...although a minimum 75% is required. Some faculties might be a more strict in that regards...however in the end everything is managed. You'll get a mixed crowd here..from the super rich to the middle class and not so affluent people...people from SoBo to Thane! Senior Junior interaction is a bit less, however the friends you make here will be friends for life. In short you'll have an awesome 4 years of your life here!

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: excellent infrastructure good support staff excellent faculty the college has state of art labs for all the verticals the college provides holistic development and has decent placements the higest package at our  time was 30 lakhs pa which only collages like iit can boast of all in all one of the better colleges affiliated to Mumbai university

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the best engineering college in Mumbai. Extremely liberal faculty. Takes ample advantage of its location being in Mumbai, leveraging the industry presence in the city. Campus infrastructure might disappoint, but up-gradation is in process. Good hostel facility. Good Placement support.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College is built like a mall, carved surfaces , and clean corners. Canteen with excellent yet affordable food and great place to hangout in free time.With two big and one small ground, it displays variety of sports like cricket, football, volleyball,etc.

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: "Must say Vit is the best college I have ever seen in my life. When you first enter the college you will fill you are entering in a mall, it has award winning  infrastructure. With top faculty, who are ready to help you any time. Vit has the best campus in whole mumbai. It also has a well maintained a/c library and reading Hall for students. The college also has a gymkhana were indoor games like tt, carrom, chess etc are played.Vit also has a free WiFi in the entire college campus for the students. It has antiragging acts for students safety. All the top class company make their way to Vit. A package of 35 lakh was given by the Japanese company to a student. It's is the best in class college for students aspiring for engg. "

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: "VIT has very good infrastructure and the teaching faculty is also good Administration services are also good they help the students very much "

College Name: Vidyalankar Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: "College has got really very good infrastructures. 5 students from this college are placed in Work applications (Japan based company) with healthy package of 35 lakhs per annum.The sport facilities are not at the par but canteen is very good.It has got one of the best faculties in Mumbai all coming from vidyalankar classes.."

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: It's a good college to study as most faculty members teach well. Lately the placement scenario has improved too. Really creative and fun crowd. Better than some MU colleges but still has a lot to improve at."

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Infra is good and excellent canteen facility. Placements : Good placements. Don't have worry about if you have a decent CGPA. Average package for ECE is about 7 LPA. Most of ECE students from ECE get placed in software companies. Very good placements for CS students with the highest package around 30lpa and average around 10 LPA. Infrastructure : Good infrastructure. Very good hostels. Gym is not great though. Sports department is average. Very good swimming pool. Two big playgrounds. Individual departments are huge and well seperate. Sea next to the campus. Very huge library and books get limited are college strength is hugh. Faculty : Faculty is decent enough. KC is very revered in foreign universities when it comes to higher studies, so obviously faculty and curriculum is good. Very good competition environment. Courses is better than normal VTU syllabus. Lot of optionals available. Department allows to pick optionals from other departments. B.Tech students get internship offer . faculties are helpful and food is good in canteen.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: in this University, students are taught how to earn the best job by hard and disciplined work. Students got more than one job offer on average, with some students getting 6, some students getting 5, some getting 4 job offers etc. The highest package went above Rs 10 lakhs per annum. Many students got job offers of Rs 9 lakhs per annum The infrastructure is suited to the needs to developing a student as a maker. University does not provide high end readymade high valued kits to work upon, but provides all infrastructure via which you can build and learn. Students are motivated to design and develop, and as a result the infrastructure contains high end equipments now, which have been developed by students like mini-CNC machine, 3-D printer, which are itself sellable products. University funds it's students to register their own company and sell these products Teachers are extremely helpful. They do not spoonfeed, but open the window for the students to learn, and develop themselves into makers. Many faculty members have themselves worked in industries in the past and hence can give the real insight of how work is done in industry. During exams they take special classes to help you build, but once again the discussions are never question answer oriented, it is oriented towards developing yourself, which will help you earn a good job Lot of events are held, which the students are given the complete responsibility to organise like Science exhibitions, entrepreneurship weeks, international conferences, technical festivals, job fairs, cultural festivals, celebration of science week etc Highly good impression about the University

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: college was average. placements are not good. very less opportunities. college staff is also poor. hostel is not available for this college. But college life is very interesting. But still I will not refer anyone for this college. As placements are very very poor as staff.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: I have completed my B.E. in Information Technology ,As college is at 10 min away from Thane station ,very easy to reach.Teaching is excellent ,teachers are very supportive,always ready to help students.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Good infrastructure. All labs and classrooms are well equipped. Library is very good having very nice quiet place for reading. Canteen is very good, clean and hygienic and serves variety of good food. College has sport centers.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: I heard and read many bad reviews about this college but none of them are true. The faculty can speak English fluently and is helpful and friendly as well. The college management is excellent as well. It will soon emerge as one of the best engineering colleges in Mumbai.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: The college was very good and I don't think it requires any room for improvement. But yes one thing was there the water coolers weren't working properly at times so just need to fix that and the door of the science lab was jammed

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: The admission process of k.c college was simple it was on the basis of merit. I preferred this college because of its quality education and environment also it is very convenient. 5 min walking distance from churchgate railway station Name of a website - www.kc.edu.com

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: The college was best except feedback was never considered from students , the principal was quite strict when it comes to attendance. They Even call parents if students don't attend college lectures and practical.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: I heard and read many bad reviews about this college but none of them are true. The faculty can speak English fluently and is helpful and friendly as well. The college management is excellent as well. It will soon emerge as one of the best engineering colleges in Mumbai.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: The college management has taken good amount of steps to maintain college discipline and there are anti-ragging policies which were put into place while we joined. The infrastructure is well maintained and curriculum of the courses is also upto the mark. This college will be my first recommendation to any fresher planning to join college.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Nooo remarks about the college it was perfect but just the vice principal did not give our batch a farewell we stil regret! For it and all other batches recieved it .so we request not to continue this process and send a nice send off!

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: I had started my college journey from K. C. College only & did felt like another home. Even the combination of Stats, Maths & Eco was available with very few colleges & K. C. College was one of it. So it was my ultimate choice.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Blitzkreig is the biggest media festival arranged by us! It's gonna happen in current month. 22 Nd and 23rd and apart from this there is inter collegiate fest namely kiran where different courses become continents and fight.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Nope .but just like to bring one thing to the notice that the vice principal didn't sign our 112 forms for CA articles and here the college was not much supportive.! Overall the college is an ideal institution to study

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: The college is average overall.The infrastructure is bad and always under construction.Faculty is average.Very student friendly college.Poor placement cell.provides good platform for students to showcase their talents and develop leadership skills.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: College infrastructure is really good, admission process is quick and with best services, traveling is easy and attendance is not compulsory.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Education in this college is too good and helpful in future as faculty here are too good and what they taught still remember after years. This college provide us platform for interactions with others and for our research in which students are interested.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: The college is based in a prime location in the city with easy access to Western and Central Railways. The connectivity by road is also great. This make commute very easy and convenient. The faculty is always pushing students to it's full potential and out Principal Dr. Hemlata Bagla is very encouraging be in academics or extra curriculars.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: I chose to attend this college as it's amongst the best colleges in Mumbai. If compared with top institutes it comes around the top 5 colleges for commerce. The bad aspect is the size of the college, it's really compact. The admission process is purely based on merit, for people belonging to general category. The cut-offs are significantly high for commerce courses. Most admissions happen after May till around July or even August. KC is preferred over other Colleges as more than a college, KC is a brand. If you look at the Alumni,  of that will speak for the college. Faculty is extremely good, professors are friendly.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: This college will help you grow. You will get multiple choices and you will change completely from within as well as from outside which is your personality and confidence. This collehe will help yoi build your image.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Nope .No negative comments but yes if college supports students for some professional courses would be great and if the vice professor would support us for our internship as he didn't not give us sign on the form

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Nothing as such the college is perfect in every way.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: K.C.COLLEGE if looked by an outsider's point of view must be and average college but in reality the college is good and studies here gives students a habbit of self dependence and good ethics. The atmosphere of the college is very good, teachers are very nice and kind.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Really amazing college. One should not hestitate to take admission in this college. The teaching and learning is really good and you will have an amazing social circle required for one's own development

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: I would say the overall experience of 3 years in this college was amazing and if I could relive something again in my life, I would definitely want to go back to my college.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Its good, near station, good area of college many events are conducted can make new friends which are genuine and good can go anywhere from the college area. Have HR college beside it. Having a great experience over here

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: At the end I would like to say is that Kc college is one of the best colleges of south bombay and really helps to students to create a future here, from A to Z, all things are there over here which a person needs to become successful

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: KC college is a very good college that has a perfect balance of academics and extra curricular activities and I would like it to remain the way it is.

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: The college has the best canteen. It has best faculty. It has great culture, where students are encouraged to participate in the learning process. Professors are really good. They take extra effort to help students

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: The college has good infrastructure and good faculties with many festivals and events.there are soo many social activities too like nss.tree planting and all. various college committees and clubs that organize various events where we can showcase our talent and improve are personality along with our communication skills

College Name: KC College of Engineering and Management Studies and Research, Thane
Reviews: Infrastructure is good. Vibe is good. Campus Is too good. Collage have libraries and sports centres. Classrooms and libraries are neat and cleaned. Food is good and hygienic. Cafeteria is hygienic. Overall campus is too good.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is excellent and the students are comfortable with each and every thing in the college . The college always looks for the comfort of the students.The college immediatedly reports with any of the damage occurs .

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Placement is good with companies like TCS Nagaro Microsoft visiting the campus every year. Average package is 3.5 lakhs. Infrastructure Is good and the campus has 2 canteens. The crowd is good .The campus has 1 library which is well maintained. The faculty is good and helpful . The campus is usually very clean and hygienic.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is too strict for attendance. Festival is not too good. Faculties does not support for other extra-curricular activities. Even they does not give good marks for internal as compared with other colleges. No industrial visit for my department. Faculties are supportive for placement activities. There is growth in placements.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Bharti Vidyapeeth College Of Engineering located is located in Kharghar. Below are pros and cons of college. Pros - Less fee than many other counterparts - Improving - Good campus - Close to Kharghar Railway Station - Good Principal - WiFi in college Cons - Aweful faculty (They can't even speak English properly) - Average placement - Very few hangout places nearby - Strict attendance

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College campus is very good but there is no proper ground. There are CCTV cameras all over the college. Labs are also well maintained with working experimental setup. The college has good workshops. Chemical faculties are interactive but not that much helpful

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Everything is just as ordinary as it could have been. Expected more from the college but didn't get, most of the faculties don't know the proper way to teach, they need some training on how to teach, rest of the thing is that our future depends on ourselves, on how we perform ourselves and work hard, hence needed internships

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This is a good college beneficial only if you are hard-working, dedicated and motivated. Good building, lush green ground, helpful teachers and awesome crowd. Hostel only for girls and placement packages are average around 4-5 lacs with highest around 8 or 9 lacs.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: My experience is not at all good. This is a very average college with many restrictions and attendance is a very big issue at this college. Infrastructure is fine but teachers are not interested in teaching. Students are nice but if you get admission here, please don't attend.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is perfect with a lush green ground, experienced teachers with a lot of experience. Good people with high aspirations and a will to do something. Awesome canteen with very good food. So many things happen every day which helps in the overall development.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This is the probably not the best but still a better college to get admission into. The students are very hard-working and dedicated, teachers are helpful and classrooms are air-conditioned and wi-fi facility is available.There is a possibility of getting very good packages.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This is one of the best colleges of North India with very brilliant students and experienced faculty. This is one of the best places to study with a very good infrastructure and AC classrooms. Continuous events are organised and we are given a chance to improve ourselves.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There are good n bad things about everything in life. College is good in its academics and curriculum and other facilities but canteen food is not good in taste.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is good, faculties are okay placements are assured by principal and if you work hard u will get one. But thinking and preparing for off campus placements. College management is not too good but it will surly improve with time. Students and faculties both are working hard for this

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: In my opinion college is good for my overall engineering experience. College management is good and every department has AC computer labs with all the necessary facilities.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: As mentioned a very good place for education and also a good platform to showcase aur abilities. The campus is good. Also the class rooms are well maintained. A positive point about location is it is near from kharghar railway station. We do not need any transportation facility from station.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college's suits them who are working along with their studies. It is not very demanding in general but it also depends upon person to person.one may feel bored if they are only concentrated on their college life. Not a happening college life here.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: If we talk about the engineering department, the college are is very small. We have architecture and dental college too, but space wise the engineering college is very small. The benches in every class are not at all maintained. All the labs are air-conditioned and well-maintained. The college is neat and clean, and you will see greenery everywhere. The infrastructure of the building is okay, the colour is maintained. The playing ground is not at all maintained.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Just a good College with good infrastructure but there is scope for improvement in various sections. Facilities need to improved. Staff quality. Machines and instruments quality. Specially placement need to be more aggresive.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The only thing Im not satisfied was the cafeteria of my college it is not clean, it is not hygienic but you do get some great smoothies and shake

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is overall balanced and maintained with proper infrastructure, security and it feels like a home.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: As there are two side of coin. So there are some negative parts in the college that it's is too far from the main city and the campus is overcrowded with unknown people they allow everyone in the college campus

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: our college is overall good in every department. Improvement of technical knowledge, extra curricular activites, events and sports activites everything is there but 75 % attendence is compulsory in our college canteen infrastructure need to be more better these two are negative point i think.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College management is not good as much as we expect and the worst part of college is the canteen which should be totally replaced. If you see that once you will never go there.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There are various scholarship. One of them is e-scholarship. It is annualy implemented. Consisting of reducing. They don't neeed to get money anymore. They have earned enough for lifetime. So good package we have. The fee structure is feasible. Fee structure is affordable.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It's is good. There are so much of events celebrated in both the odd and even semester. Like there is Abhiyaan , which is a cultural event held at very great level. and then there are multiple sports played. It's actually a a fun.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It is a average college not that great or not that worst. College management is fine but too much of recruitment in college office.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is overall good for a student scoring between 100-130 in mhcet. It will be surely a great platform for learners. Bvcoe also stands among top 50 private engineering college so it's great to be in.

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is overall good management is also cooperative if we be polite with them

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Overall it was a nice experience. We made new friends with multicultural experience . We still stayed best of friends

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College management is fine. Help with every student Idea. Even they have the support for entrepreneurship ideas

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: There only one problem which is cross in between the students. But we can peacefully do our work

College Name: Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Chemical dept. faculty is not at all good. Teachers can't explain properly . Politics is played in giving marks. Our college is not worth of money we pay.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: "Bharati vidyapeeth college of engineering ,new delhi(BVCOE) is affiliated to IP UNIVERSITY .It is among top 3 colleges of IPU and also ranked among top 10 engineering colleges of Delhi. Placement is good. Facu lo ty academic and spots is good.lot of technical and cultural events are organised frequently. "

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college has good placements record. Companies like tcs, eargel infra, wipro etc. Visit the college for placement. Students get pre placement training so that they don't have to face problem. Infrastructure of science is good and wifi facility is also available in our college. The placements are good and it totally depends on our skills.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This college gives so much of opportunities to explore There are various committees such as student council, Rotaract, Nss, yin, EN cell, prahar racing team etc. One college with so many platforms and staffs are also very supportive. The crowd over here is very good. The food you get in the canteen is also delicious. There is a stationary shop inside the college campus.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college environment is very friendly. All the teaching staff is very supportive and is always ready to help. Very spacious classrooms and the washrooms are also very neat and clean. Classroom have been installed with projector's making it easier to understand the study material.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is really nice with positive crowd.Not only technical but cultural events are organised through the year. Proper computer room and lab for enhancement of practical knowledge of student. College canteen serve you delicious food and sport room is the place where you will like to spend more of your time.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Faculty is supportive and helpful. Far away from nearest railway station though bus facilities are provided but have certain timings. Canteen food quality is average. Library have good collection of books. Labs (civil) are below average. Equipments are very less. Annual functions, sports and games conducted are Good

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The faculties of civil department are friendly with the students. Helping students in getting the best out of them. Not only the civil department but each and every department gives an exposure to the respective industries. The student activities give a platform to showcase their talent. College environment is excellent. The college also provide an opportunity to participate in National and International conferences. Good percentage of placements are also provided. For Civil engineering department Placement campus for MARATHON REALTY, EAGLE INFRASTRUCTURE, etc. are provided.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The location and infrastructure of the college is pretty good with peaceful environment to study. Also, the faculties are highly qualified and helpful with assignments and projects. Especially the department of civil engineering has all the facilities, laboratories and provides a good industry exposure. College also provides bus facility from kharghar station to college which is quiet appreciable.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Nice education system ........teachers are also helpful . Focuses mainly on studies but great support for extra curricular activities also . Overall good ratings . I recommend this colg ......overall grest facilities and nice study atmosphere . Nice laboratory facilities also .

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college labs are good and in working conditions. Thr faculties are very good and supportive and crowd is not so good. It has good fests and supportive teachers. The canteen are is the best place but there is no variety in food. For studying this college is very good.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college has no good placements, and 75% attendance is compulsory. The college is average. Placements: I would say that the placements are average, and they try to place you in non-engineering profiles. The average salary offered is 12-15K per month. They don't offer internships, and they tell you to get it on your own. Around, 20% of the students got a place in engineering profiles. They keep job fair and rarely anyone is placed in it. Infrastructure: The classrooms are spacious. The lab needs more advanced equipment on the campus. The canteen looks great, but the food is average. There's no ground to play. There is no hostel. There is no A/C in the classrooms and labs. If you're a sports player, then this is not a college for you. The parking is good, and the gym is small. Faculty: The teachers are well-qualified, knowledgeable, and not helpful. The teaching is good in the EXTC branch. There are different teachers for practical and theory. There is no industry exposure. Around, 75% attendance is compulsory, and you'll get detained if your attendance is less. You cannot do a lot of other stuff as you always have to maintain your attendance. Other: Only one big fest named 'Nakshatra' and some small 2 to 3 events are held on the campus. There is only government recommended scholarships like EBC, OBC, SC, ST, and nothing else. The campus crowd is average. They provide bus facility from a railway station. There are 2 to 3 workshops related to your branch. There are a few sports activities.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This college is good. Staff of my department is very supportive. They helps in every activity. Right from studies to sports, you will find everyone support. Lot of motivation to participate in other activities. Entrepreneur development cell. I strongly recommend this college

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This college is great. Good facility. Great faculty. Will definitely refer to my juniors. Infrastructure is mind-blowing. Campus crowd is decent. People know very less about this college. But no regret after you join. It gave me more than my expectation. Very healthy relation between staff and students. Lot of encouragement for extra activities. I got attached with this college now.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is worth, as it is located in navi-mumbai. The college council, brings you some great social and cultural events, so that throughout the year you can enjoy, faculties are good enough, canteen has been changed now. Crowd is actually good, as most of the students are enthusiast. Yes, there's always a trip in a year to somewhere, with the notation of industrial visit . So, overall, the college is worth if you want to study as well as enjoy your engineering days.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Excellent! Saraswati College of Engineering (SCoE) is spread out over 11 acres. Classrooms are spacious and labs are well-equipped. Centralized air conditioning will probably be introduced soon. They have a variety of outdoor sports like volleyball, cricket, football, and badminton. What’s more, they are apparently constructing the largest library in Maharashtra soon. EXTC faculty is supposed to be really good, although maybe a bit strict. Others are just about okay. New professors keep coming and going. Relatively good canteen with more-than-edible food. Misal pav is an all-time favorite. Quite a few of them, actually. There’s a McDonald’s, a Subway, Little World Mall all of which are pretty close by. The huge central park spread over acres of land and built on the lines of New York’s Hyde Prak is also close by (Though it's still under completion)

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College life was good,Don't expect anything good from this college, just be in your crowd and move on, enjoy ur 4 yrs of BE,faculty is average,some are really good and supportive,No new ideas will be shared ,the crowd is mediocre, Tech fest and cultural events are good.Try some other colleges in Navi Mumbai and Mumbai, u will find good exposure there.Kharghar is a good area,lots of new places to visit,you will enjoy the food corners.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Good faculty for all subjects, they also help in study, good infrastructure, hostel, good teaching learning, big digital library, having well-developed classrooms, laboratories,gym khana, computer laboratories, drawing room. Good festival nakshatra. Not so good placement for college.Good sports activities.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Attendance: The college is very strict in this respect. 75% attendance is compulsory, failing which students are charged Rs.5000. Yeah, you’d really rather just attend. Crowd: The crowd at Saraswati College of Engineering (SCoE) is decent, quite cosmopolitan. Very enthusiastic and love to participate actively in festivals of their own college as well as other colleges. Canteen: Relatively good canteen with more-than-edible food. Misal pav is an all-time favourite. Placements: Not too great, with about 30% of the students getting jobs Fake promises: SCOE has paid wifi and while taking admission the promised to provide free wifi.They don't have any subscription of IEEE.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is good and has great facilities. With better infrastructure and modern facilities, this college is awesome. The college gives holistic development to students. The atmosphere is very serene inside the college. It also has some great and learned faculty.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Based on previous year reviews, the college was carried out online. The college does have good infrastructure and space for events/festival organizations. But lack of equipment available for Mechanical and Civil students.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: SCOE college is a good college and faulty behaviour also friendly.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The teaching faculty is still good but the management is worst. All local staff non educated always speaking in marathi.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Expect placement cell all the sections of college is good for the students and definitely help students to being proffesionals in theire respective field

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Overall college is average in terms of placement and infrastructure.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I would not tell any bad remark but the management is doing a good job. The college gives a lot of exposure by proving guest lecture and even campus placements. As I am placed so my view is you should take admission for different learning.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It is fairly good and cooperative and help in being placed though their Network. They also help after completion of course.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Socially active our college take part in many activities and also organises many activities and apart from studies they also focus that a student is capable for giving a speech in front of audience Which builds confidence in them.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: No, the college is really good in every aspect of one of the best facilities

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The teachers and facilities are good in college. Good canteen. Bad things include unavailability of a proper ground to enhance sports. Also some of the crowd is not good.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: No negative remark but the college should make a ground for itself so that sports will take place regularly because every time the sports are being organised in a ground which is situated in Panvel and many can't travel.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Placement is good. But not all branches have good placement percentage. This is the negative remark. Recently our college got 34 MhrD rank. Which is very useful for students to choose the college.

College Name: Saraswati College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This college is great. Good facility. Great faculty. Will definitely refer to my juniors. Infrastructure is mind-blowing. Campus crowd is decent. I was afraid at the start but later on I got attached with this college now its like I don't want to leave this college.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Scoe,kharghar is 1 of the satisfactory college if u don't gt any other clg. n it is better than any other central downside clg u will enjoy sm of joyful movement in dis clg. dnt expect any placement frm here including teaching. sm teachers will easily become ur fav. n sm will make ur sem as hell. almost crowd is from thane . all over everything is fine i like this clg.!!

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: SFIT has a lovely infrastructure ,the college is always spotless clean with a very cool atmosphere as there are a lot of trees and plants inside the campus.There are various indoor and outdoor sports facilities such as there is a Basketball court, Badminton court ,students also play throwball , cricket and enough little space to play Football too. Coming to indoor sports there are facilities to play carrom, table tennis and table football (foosball). Our College has a placement committee and also training for placement (TPO) activities. Companies like TCS, Infosys ,Capgemini and many others come for placemrent here. There is Ecell for students who want to become entrepreneurs and encourage them to start their own startups. Many of the college students have created their own startups with guidance from the Ecell committee. There are various committes for all the three fields I.e IT comps and Extc. There is Robocon committee for students interested in robotics and lets them explore their ideas with creating remote-controlled robots on their own with proper guidance. All labs are well maintained and there are PCs with Windows as well as Linux operating system. There are two popular fests every year - IRIS (Cultural fest) held in Feb and MOSAIC (Technical fest) held around September-October. There is a Seminar hall ,an Auditorium ,a huge computer center where students can access the internet. There is NSS like any other college. There are authorized and unauthorized Industrial Visits ,treks held. For IT students there is a colloquium held where in seminars are conducted by IT professionals from different fields alongwith Technical paper and poster competitions. Annual Day is also conducted once a year.Other activities are garba night , freshers party ,edm night during the Cultural fest and much more. Teaching is good overall but some teachers are extremely talented and a few about average. There is projector facility in every classroom. There is a wifi enabled reading room where students can study or work on projects. There is a library with good staff and availability of books, novels, magazines,B.E projects, past papers.There is no hostel as such inside SFIT campus but exactly opposite There is SFIMAR(St Francis Institute of Management and Research) where there is a hostel and I know SFIT students who stay there. SFIT College canteen provides veg as well as non-veg food ,icecreams, soft drinks, snacks,coffee and tea.Also SFIT students go to the Management canteen for variety in choices of food. SFIT has its own stationary and there is one right outside the campus too.For hangouts with friends there is Dominos so near the campus and other places to explore nearby. There is a bus-stop to your left as soon as you leave the college making it much easier to travel for students who come from Bhayander to those from Malad .Also our college is so near from Dahisar as well as Borivali station (more close to Dahisar) just 20 rs by auto.The college is a bit firm on discipline and attendance .So Overall SFIT is a very good pick.It provides students with the best of opportunities,teaching and guidance. I am proud to be an SFITian.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It was a great time. We used to have much fun in group. I miss those days. The faculties were superb and studies were fantastic. Overall a must period in one's life. My favourite subject was Physics. I used to score the highest and my base was very strong on that. Every topic's discussion used to start with me. Teachers were very supportive. Debates were very fruitful for us..

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: As a student of this college for past one year would like to bring to notice that this is a very good college. The teaching staff is very good and well educated.This college also supports extra circular activities like sports and different fests. The festivals like Iris and mosaic are perfect for hanging out from studies for few days.Sfit has a very COMPUTER engineering branch. College has good connectivity very near from Dahisar station. My message to the students pursuing Engineering considers this college if you want to pursue Computer Engineering as your career.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This college is really strict in terms of attendance and stuff but the quality of the study is nice. The teachers really remember you if you're a defaulter and your life becomes hell in last few weeks of the semester. Teachers don't encourage co-curricular much. Nothing attractive about it except for you've got your squad there to chill. Overall a 3/5

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is good, staff members are strict and awesome, the crowd is average .... the facilities are awesome ............ overall great experience, attendance rules are very strict which forces us to go to the college and attend the lectures most of the time.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is good enough. Discipline at its best. HOD are kind and helpful. Teachers don't have much knowledge about the subject but they are average. College is developing and getting better. Many extra activities are also started. You can join various cells and enjoy your college life.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College life isn't wat ideally is, infrastructure is pretty good, faculty is poor except a few good teachers, recreational activities is excellent, environment is best suitable as far as studying is concerned because there is greenery around and der is silence and u can enjoy d beauty of nature along with studying; canteen is worst, but overall it's a good college and nothing wrong with being a part of it;

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college life is good, not too good not too bad You can bunk a few less, but do take care on the attendance part and wearing the ID card is must though you can fool around without it. Don't come face to face to a teacher without it. And the teaching style, You can relate it to school type which is bad but it in itself has some advantages. College is good in overall view.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Good college life faculty is good helpful crowd of college is very good. The infrastructure of college is not very much pleasing overall it's good. College is very much strict about attendance teaching faculty is very about teaching. St. Francis Institute of Technology (SFIT) has a school-type infrastructure. The campus is huge and well maintained but not eye appealing. It is very clean just like any other Catholic institutes. A gymkhana which comprises Table Tennis, carrom and chess. Facilities for outdoor games like volleyball, basketball, football and badminton are available to the students. Very often you'll see the volleyball court turns into a gully cricket ground. The classrooms are good, but again the same school type benches, blackboards, and windows to look out from (during the lecture). Okay washrooms, very good elevators and peaceful campus complete the infrastructure. Currently, it is undergoing renovation and up gradation of laboratories.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: My college is one of the most strict colleges of Mumbai. They make sure you attend lectures and are regular in your studies.There are many extra curricular activities in our college.You can also take part in sports.There is a total of 5 student organisations and there is also e-cell which teaches you entrepreneurship. The infrastructure is just average.There are fests which make sure students do not get bored of studies.Teaching faculty is quite good and they finish the portion on time by keeping extra lectures.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: St. Francis is definitely the best college I've been to, the fun we had and the rules we've broken, and the assignments, tests, college canteen and its cat.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: My overall experience is good till now there are many parts where the college can get better . There are many things that i have learned from the college experience till now and it have been great till now .

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The main reason for me to get to this College is, it's near my place which saves me from too much of Mumbai's hectic traffic. SFIT is a well-known college for its discipline, this college gets the best placement among other colleges in the locality. With an average package of 3 LPA

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: 1. College is very strict regarding studies and attendance 2. Also helps in extra course and help us to study above and beyond syllabus 3. Makes students internship before placements 4. All faculties helps a lot in cultural as well as technical aspects

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Average: not so good and not so worst our college lagg some quality education and exposure.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Professors attitude isn't that amazing. Talking just about the extc faculty. It and CMPN faculty just seems lethargic, which the students feel is an easy going attitude. Atleast the extc profs ensure you are prepared right from start, and won't spring surprises on you towards the end of the semester when you should be studying

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Certainly not the top engineering colleges.Management is driven by brothers from Church and are not open towards college betterment in terms of teaching,placements,and infrastructure.Go in the college only if you have no better options and are desperate to do engineering from anywhere.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Positive: Great facilities, technical knowledge on a national level, sports and games one national level too. AICTE approval, guaranteed placements and many more things. Negative: Feels like more of a school, lots of restrictions.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The most things you will hear for this college is that it's very strict.there is no life for students here.Students are forced to sit for lectures with their attendance criteria. Yaa these things are true but it really is not that much that people speak of. It is a combination of strictness and decipline. Its not that there's no life for students. Students are allowed to play after lectures which most of the college don't allow. Also during events there's lot of entertainment for students. Its not only about enjoying. its about studies plus entertainment. College is college although however it may be you will always remember it when you leave it.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Placements are quite good if you see the whole college placement but again for my branch there are no core companies, so people end up in IT companies only.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Positive is the attendance and the discipline in the college is the most concern. Negative feedback as on I didn't experience any in my college career. Over-all for a student preferring engineering SFIT is a good option.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: As I said earlier, The principal and the director have implied school - like rules for students. A student needs to have more than 75% attendance in individual subjects rather than average attendance. They are forcing students to give extra exams.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: its a better than average rather good college

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Studying in SFIT is like full of joy and happiness. we gain technical as well as cultural knowledge. the infrastructure is simply WOW. the canteen and food is always upto mark. the teaching and non teaching staffs r loving and caring.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The good thing about college is it has better infrastructure, faculty,canteen,play area ,parking and management. The bad thing was the timing of the college hours which was too extreme it almost felt like going to school.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I found this College to be strict for attendance and submission. They are really strict for Attendance. If you have Attendance less than 75% (now in each subject) you will be treated like a criminal in the staff room. Parents will be called in the college and imposition will be given to you.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall, my experience was great and it was a good college to study in and placements as well were good. The faculty was the best and they used to conduct extra classes for students which was free of cost. The hostel management as well was a bit strict bu

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The overall ambience is pleasant.4 years of engineering were pretty hard at the beginning but it went well.Our college has improved majority of its facilities throughout the year.We had a new hall been made for events and shows to take place.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The positive side about SFIT is that it's a really good catholic college which maintains discipline in you and gives you an opportunity to display your technical talent and even helps your nuture your hobbies. The only negative remark I've about this college is that the attendance is mandatory for the lectures or the subject teachers at times take severe actions if you are a defaulter in their particular subject.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Great as per parents view but students say it sucks because of shitty rules and engineering itself is hectic.

College Name: St Francis Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is having very structured academic plan that helps students to make the best out of facilities available. The faculty are also helpful and the entire syllabus is taught in a well planned manner. The placement has also been improving over the years with dedicated TPO and assistant TPO.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College has a big campus. It has a great environment to study in. The faculty is very supportive & encouraging. The college is bit too far for students coming from mumbai city. During rainy season there are many travelling issues.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Every faculty give his best and works towards every student for his excellence and improvement. college lacks bit of infrastructure since engineering campus is bit small as compared to other colleges. Every vacation college conducts free semi ars and workshop.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college crowd here is good. The faculty is decent and some of them are the very best in their respective fields. The college rules are sometimes too strict and questionable. Overall, it is a decent college and I have had a positive experience overall

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college has adequate infrastructural facilities for effective learning. More stress has to be laid on practical learning. Industry diplomats should be made to visit the campus and hold seminars to familiarize students with the existing industry and market conditions. Dedicated professors and a friendly cosmopolitan mix of students with a number of extracurricular activities and events to participate in made my college experience enjoyable. The college has an efficient training and placement cell that brings in good companies but care should be taken to see that all students other than IT department are placed. Professors were dedicated but more stress and efforts should be put in providing good practical knowledge to the students and see that they are molded according to industry requirements. The college is affordable to all students belonging to the middle-class background and the fees are not exorbitant but fair in comparison to the quality of education provided.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is beautiful! Campus is good, a crowd is awesome, awesome friends, very lively, great teachers, always ready to help. A lot of events all round the year. Students councils and other councils are great (as I too was a part of it). Placements are good. Overall experience is fantastic.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It has really been great 4 years with all mixed emotions right from 1st day until the last day.Great staff and very good student crowd have what made SIES happening and this student-teacher culture was always appreciated from various delegates on their visits to SIES! Unity among the students be it for right or wrong reasons has always been on top! The most beautiful thing we Gstian's cherish is the beautiful temple inside the campus! Sies has always been a treasure for me and I will cherish all memorable moments throughout my life

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The faculties are good and sound technically.Have to improvise the infrastructure of the college.Good environment to study.library and other facilities are also good Affordable fees and worth studying. Apart from studies I developed my interpersonal skills and technical skills by participating in several events like IMPRESSION and cultural programs Organized by my college I really feel proud to say that I am a student of SIES GST.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: High fees ,moderate infrastructure, good crowd. No ground no hostel. Laboratory infrastructure is moderate Overall just fine.Located in Navi Mumbai. Fests are organized nicely . 10 mins walkable distance from the neural station. I have no descriptive words left to complete your 250 characters. Please remove this kind of silly validations.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Good college with an awesome crowd and good placements. The faculty is ok.Infrastructure is good with a good library and practical labs.The only problem is strictness related to mobile usage and other things.Placement facility is good. It's one of the few colleges which provides a degree in Printing and packaging technology.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Placements of the college are pretty decent . Had fun working with college student council by hosting various events. Principal sometimes opposed the cultural events and used to tell a student to focus more on studies which created problem while working for student council. Unnecessary strict restrictions on mobile usage in college campus were so m much frustrating.Learned a lot during the college life.Overall experience was pretty good

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is definitely decent as far as infrastructure is concerned when compared with other colleges affiliated to Mumbai university. There is a requirement for a P.A. system to ensure that important information can be passed spontaneously. Also the instruments for various departments must be functional and students must not feel the lack of basic requirements. On the placement front a student body should be present and students must also actively participate in bringing companies for recruitment. It should be mandatory to have a PhD professor in each department. There must be diversity amongst the faculty to guide students in an industrial aspect and research aspect.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Good infrastructure is a key factor for any educational institutions, SIES is one of it. Faculty members and their industrial experience help students to gain maximum knowledge. A good library with optimum books and e-media, a good place to hunt for knowledge. Modern laboratories peruse students to gain maximum practical experience. Also, extracurricular activities are the best part, Tatwa Moksha Laksh is one of the well-known festivals in Navi Mumbai. Overall SIES is a good place to pursue the career.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The environment is good , college is very strict in case of attendance , mobile phones are not allowed which is not tolerable. Infrastructure is good but the campus is not upto the level. There was no hostel so only localides can attend it. Faculty was not good. There was no playground.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The most primary aspect by which we can judge any college is academics. Now, the teachers are friendly and approachable in nature,however,the faculty is very particular about its attendance and about the discipline the students maintain. Like any other college, SIES has its technical(cognition) and cultural(TML) festivals. Many events are brought up in these festivals and the efforts put in do not lack in any aspect. Nevertheless, I have seen two points that hamper the festival. The first one being the approach taken by event heads. Their persuasion lacks motivation and seems more like a compulsion. The second one, the way the event head organizes the events. According to me, the time bracket of many events clashes with each other. The last point, the infrastructure of my college. It is not as flashy as the other colleges that are compared with SIES, but they try to make most of it. In a nutshell, its worth giving a shot. Even though the college has its own share of flaws, if you have the will to make the most out of the college, SIES is sure to help out.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The most primary aspect by which we can judge any college is academics. Now, the teachers are friendly and approachable in nature, however, the faculty is very particular about its attendance and about the discipline the students maintain. Like any other college, SIES has its technical(cognition) and cultural(TML) festivals. Many events are brought up in these festivals and the efforts put in do not lack in any aspect. Nevertheless, I have seen two points that hamper the festival. The first one being the approach taken by event heads. Their persuasion lacks motivation and seems more like the compulsion. The second one, the way there event head organizes the events. According to me, the time bracket of many event clashes within each other. The last point, the infrastructure of my college. It's not as flashy as the other colleges that are compared with SIES, but they try to make most of it. In a nutshell, its worth giving a shot. Even though the college has its own share of flaws, if you have the will to make the most out of the college, SIES is sure to help out.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It is a very nice college. Teachers are very cooperative and helpful. A lot of events are being held for the benefit of students. It has a very good college infrastructure. A very good positive aura is found in each and every corner of the college. The college is very good in sports activities. The college has a famous 33 feet tall hanuman statue and temple. Each and every faculty teaching has a good experience and sound knowledge in their field. This is the only college offering two in one i.e B.E. Printing and Packaging Technology in the Asian continent.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It is a nice college. Teachers are very cooperative and helpful. A lot of events are being held for the benefit of students.It has a very good college infrastructure.A very good positive aura is found in each and every corner of the college. The college is very good in sports activities. The college has a famous hanuman temple. Each and every faculty teaching has a good experience and sound knowledge in their field.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Good faculty, canteen, very good campus. good Extra curricular activities. college festival tatva moksh.. good infrastructure. Placement is good. overall college life is good. Faulty is willing to help.. one of the good college in navi Mumbai. A mix of crowd (majority is South Indian, but doesn’t matter). You’ll find both kinds of people here fun-loving and books-crazy. A very energetic crowd makes the college environment vibrant and active.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Decent college but very strict with attendance. Lush green campus with excellent infrastructure. The campus has excellent facility for sports with a good gym. SIES is a very old and reputed brand in Mumbai and well known in Navi Mumbai as well. This college will help in overall student development.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The management is not that great. Many rules and stuff which make it seem like a college. Other than that the college is a really great place to grow as a person even if you dont learn anything. Students all come together to help other students to develop in more ways then just studies. The seniors and the alumni are the best things about the college. And the activities

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: For some lectures you will have a rotating class due to lack of space.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Our college is definitely one of the best college in not only in Navi Mumbai but in Maharashtra. Seniors helps juniors in every aspect of their college life. Teachers guides the students in right direction. There are many more opportunities provided by college to students to show their skills in academics as well as extracurricular activities.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Na Overall good exposure to technical world. Also good contacts to get students into good internship offers. Placement team is also very good with good corporate contacts.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Among all of the colleges in which I was able to take admission, I heard from my seniors that SIES had good campus and placements. I had heard that SIES had a good faculty and teachers are friendly and they help students whenever they need them. SIES fests are too popular so it lead me to it.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I got admission on thr basis of my JEE Mains marks. I had scored 110. I was interested in Computer Science hence I took the course. I opted for this college because it was one of the best options available close to where I live be because I hate travelling everyday.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college is excellent for students who wants to improve their self in studies and extracurricular activities.this is the wonderful place where you can learn the difficult concepts of engineering with indulging in extracurricular activities like NSS and student council activities.also there are 6 student chapters and students can take their membership based in their interest.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Ground is very essential for a college and this is the only thing we are lacking behind in.The entire premises of the college is very clean and tidy also the toilets are very clean.U can find ro purified water at every floor of the building and the canteen food is also healthy.If u live in a hostel, u can blindly rely on the canteen food

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Their sincerity towards teaching, campus and placements attracted me towards the college. Also, I preferred joining a computer science program above any other and I was desperate to get a college of my major as soon as possible. So getting into this college was mainly because it offered me my desired course with decent placement offers for the future.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This was the only college that had this course, it was close to my house and it was a reputed institution within Mumbai University. Moreover SIES had a plethora of options when it came to extra curricular activities.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: no hostel facility No ground Labs are very good Lab faculty can be better Teachers are very good and helpful Seniors are also very helpful Events organized are also good There is no transportation facilities

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: My College is way better in everything i dont have any problem with my College. Each and everything is good. i am soo lucky to be in this College. My College even has scooty/bike parking thats the best benefit.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It is overall a good choice for students scoring around 100-120marks in mhcet. It will be surely a great platform to enjoy the four years as well as study.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Decent college overall and will have your beautiful memories of your life here.Decent college overall and will have your beautiful memories of your life here.Decent college overall and will have your beautiful memories of your life here.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Way too Strict college the only college in mumbai charging 5000 bucks as as a fine and confiscating cell phones if found to be used within college campus but overall its always fun to break all the rules and keep the teachers back for a chase.

College Name: SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college has decent faculties and has a really good infrastructure , no playground or such ammenities.However it is a good place to be at and there is an opportunity to interact with many people because of the small batch size. A tradeoff is with the term works and grade as it is not very just at the college but it has improved.
