But if you are for awesome campus life SIES is not the place to be.The placement is improving TCS Igate and LNT being the primary recruiters.The fests are good but not happening as most other colleges in Mumbai. The fees is higher than the average fees in Mumbai colleges.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Horrible experience. Zero placement along with below average teaching faculty and last but not least canteen food needs to get change. College infrastructure was good enough but rules in this was terrible. If someone caught with a cellphone, he/she was supposed to pay Rs 5,000.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: There are no nearby hangouts. Instead students prefer to play football or cricket in the college ground. If you love indoor sports, there’s a gymkhana where you can amuse yourself by playing pool, carom & chess. Goga Pure Veg is only other option than canteen to eat outside college.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Needs to think more about the quality of education rather than quantitative. Needs better infrastructure in classes than construction of turf If you want to enjoy college life it's a best place Support needs to be given to students which work in college events , which for now is not given help in academics is a thing on which college should focus

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College is very good,but overall ambiance is not that much nice. Nowadays treating every student like they are in school. No freedom to leave college once you enter, the gates get shut aftr 10am and open after 3. Placements are good, companies come to visit are very nice. You can learn many things here But canteen is average, need to develop it more and to provide quality food with more menu's.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Great infrastructure to accommodate students. Helping seniors, no ragging whatsoever. Great placement cell provides amazing opportunities, better than most suburban colleges. Some great initiatives and clubs to join in and make a difference. College fest is also a highlight of this institution. Great crowd to socialize. Although some aspects can be improved but despite of all that a great institution

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Good infrastructure, Sufficient placement, Knowledgeable staff, Excellent cultural festival, Excellent technical festival, friendly environment, Good scope to develop n excel in our field of choice, Good learning facility, Helping seniors & staffs, Healthy competition between students, Motivating students by felicitating them by giving them certis n trophies so that can do better next time, Excellent sports festival, Encouraging students to participate in sports, Overall development of the students.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: This college teaches you not not only about the course but also about various aspects of engineering...right from providing support to providing opportunities..a supportive and skilled staff and the crowd is good..would definitely recommend this college to all

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: One of the best Private institution in Mumbai for Engineering studies. Good management and Support. In my 4 years of education, I have found so many learning opportunities till date. The course structure is very good. Also, the status of placement is good. Especially they are providing lot of placement trainings and conducting lot of aptitude exams to nourish each students skill. My experience in this college is really good. Also, there are many academic programs held in college like international conference, various kinds of exhibitions etc. All of the teaching and non teaching staff are very helpful. Extracurricular programs like blood donation camp, social work etc happen in college. In all, I would recommend the future aspirants to join this college as it will lead to their better future.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Best bits of this college lies within the ample play space and recreational amenities. Level of education varies a lot . Faculty is on one hand very skilled in your first year but somewhat deteriorates further. Very nice crowd is not expected inspite of the fact that the college is well within suburban area.overall great experience.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College infrastructure is good. They keep renovating all the time. So the canteen has changed thrice in 4years. College staff is too helpful in times of need. They have a playground basketball court and a lawn. All activities are organized by students and it's a good experience organizing those events to build your leadership and teamwork qualities..overall experience is good in this college.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has 2 adjacent building with the view of Eastern express highway on the front side, while a view of the ground of college on the rear complex. The Placement cell should work more and get enough placements to pull more crowd. Overall a good experience studying, but you'll enjoy roaming around more with the friends you make there. I had done electronics engineering and the faculty was also good and knowledgeable.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Excellent Placement Opportunities, excellent teaching Staff, huge campus, good reviews, excellent crowd, best play grounds, number of turfs( three), pool campus interviews, multiple awards received by the college for top college in mumbai through various prestigious organisations, Excellent batch of seniors

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Actually I didn't chose the college the MHT-CET Score I got chose the college but it turned out be a very good college if you ignore 2 or 3 useless faculties. The campus is very nice. And the big advantage of getting into this college is that there is no blacklist for attendance less than 75 %. The placement and training department is the best part of the college it does everything for students.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Great, college has excellent campus college has 4 acres of sport ground it includes three turf one basketball court Kabaddi court and one volleyball court every your our college conducts three technical events tantra Oscillation

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: I got admission by DTE after I shortlisted. And it near to my house and the branch is available for me. College infrastructure is good and location is convenient to reach by bus, auto, texi or local train also.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: There is a good mix of students from different parts of the country. Students have a very healthy atmosphere to learn and interact here. Seniors are supportive and there is no kind of ragging done here. The placement cell is very robust.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: There is a good mix of students from different parts of the country. Students have a very healthy atmosphere to learn and interact here. Seniors are supportive and there is no kind of ragging done here. The placement cell is very robust.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Good college with good faculty enough greenery around also the campus is big enough and has a ground good canteen and a turf which is free for college students als has a air conditioned library for the students.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: The life at PVPPCOE is really good as the faculty here is really supportive and friendly. It has many facilities like different types of clubs, gym, and canteen.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: college has excellent campus college has 4 acres of sport ground it includes three turf one basketball court Kabaddi court and one volleyball court every your our college conducts three technical events tantra Oscillation and Fesa

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: From the last 2 years, I am having great experience in PVPPCOE. The college supports Academic as well as extracurricular activities. For placement, the college provides training and arranges various mock drives. The Institute is tied up with external technical organizations and build industry-supported labs as part of raising the technical standard of Students. The college has a nice and silent environment. College's canteen provides a variety of dishes. Hygiene is also maintained. Special common rooms are provided for both girls and boys students. College's library is quite big has a lot of good technical books. Faculties and staff are very helpful and they also helps us to understand the latest trends and technology.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College having the best academic records and behaviour of the staffs are quite helpful. College having the best campus including all the facilities provided into them. Overall College management is supportive and up to the mark including various clubs such as NSS, eco-club, Women's department cell and Students council. College having the centralized library which includes various books of different authors.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Since the last three years, I'm having the best educational experience of my life. Our college provides the best infrastructure and college campus. The canteen at our college is also very good. Hygiene is well maintained and the best quality food is provided in the college. The college management always thinks in the best interest of the students. The college library has a very vast collection of reference books required for academics. Internet facility is provided in the library for the students. The labs of our college are well maintained and have all the apparatus in good condition. Extracurricular activities are given the same importance as academics. The cultural fests give the students a platform to showcase their talents in front of the college. Technology day and engineering are celebrated in the college with great excitement. Sports are also given equal importance. There are different committees like the student council, Nss, Tpo, eco-club, WDC etc work for the betterment of students and helps the students to grow their knowledge in the respective fields

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College overall is good but needs to improve a lot in the terms of its name since this college is struck in a controversy on unofficial land taken to build the college and there is no safety of fire till few years. But now the principal is working on this to develp the college and seeking all sorts of permission.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Negative remarks Fee Structure is average but facilities are very less as compared to fee Structure. Fees should be reduced looking at the infrastructure and facilities that are provided Faculty of the college should be more friendly. Should concentrate more on practical knowledge to students rather than taking useless submissions. Should be polite , friendly and should respect students as even once they were students

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: No negative remarks. My college is the best in the city. Excellent infrastructure, faculties. Facilities, placements, events. It's been taken care that we are not falling short of anything. I hope my college continues to be the same

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: College is good you will have a typical college life of engineering assignments, practicals are sometimes too much to do but its part of curriculum. only negative remark is crowd should have been better at my times also there no nearby hang out place.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Our college is very good in mumbai region. having only 4 courses offered in our college the college faculty and management is well accountable. Our college is very strict about attendance in college.

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: Food quality in the canteen should improve. And also there is no playground in our college. College does not have proper gym room .

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: There must be good sports teacher for us so please provide and invite every student for sports also not only for coding contests

College Name: Padmabhushan Vasantdada Patil Pratishthan's College of Engineering, Mumbai
Reviews: It is one of the prominent college in Mumbai. Situated in the heart of Mumbai is located at Sion-Chunabhatti. It is spread over 2 acres of land with decent infrastructure and play area. It has a football ground of its own. The college faculty is well knowledgeable and helpful. It has given me friends for life and they are not just friends to hang around but highly knowledgeable and have a better understanding of future perspective. Regarding the placement, it invites decent companies ranging from TCS , Capgemini, to the recent banking company Ariston Capital. Overall the college is nice and a good option for those seeking admission in the engineering field in Mumbai.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College is overall good . But placement in this college is worst. Teachers are cooperative most of the time. The new canteen is worst. Not at all good. Industrial visit is not good. Must we had one in our college life . No hostel for boys and girls. So outside mumbai students have to search hostel and paying guest of they are ad admitted in this college.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The infrastructure is good. The faculty is very good and supportive. You can feel free to go to them at any time if you are stuck somewhere. About 20% of teachers hold a Ph.D. and some are pursuing. You'll have ample opportunities for co-curricular and extracurriculars too. There is no hostel facility available but you can contact the admin. Office and they'll help you. The canteen is the best part, though ;) All in all. A modest place to be in.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Best engineering college with excellent placements and faculty members. Accredited engineering college by Government of India, Maharashtra and Mumbai University. Best engineering faculty under Mumbai University. It has a good location for peaceful study and creating bright engineers. It is superior in any adverse situations and helpful in creating excellent careers. Undoubtedly top engineering college in Mumbai. Creating good future and talented engineers.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Manjara Charitable Trust's Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology (RGIT) is located near 7 bungalows, Versova. The nearest railway station is Andheri. RGIT's glass building which looks stunning at the first glance has a balcony/small terrace on every floor. Faculty at RGIT, in general, is nice. The Boys to girls ratio is the same like any other engineering college. Students from the Western and Northern suburbs and South Mumbai are mostly seen in this college. Owing to it RGITs upmarket location, the college has some fantastic hangouts.Versova beach and 'Versova rocks' followed by Yari road are all very close to the college.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: According to me, the college looks good from the outside but to beware all this is from the outside. Professors are rude, unruly and try to make students feel less and beneath themselves. The infrastructure is poor, canteen is small and cannot cope with the demand of students.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Good college with great infrastructure has a good name in sports as well, but you have to pay the expenses of sports yourself (travel, etc). As any other college, some teachers are good and some are okay. Can't say anything about placements as I am yet to complete my course.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The crowd is great, the faculty is average, college timing is good, location is average, teachers are helpful but are strict, the canteen is average. The main problem is people hardly know about this college, library is good, workshops and rest of the committee is good, life is pretty much ok in this college

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is the fantastic view from college is awesome because of Versova beach. Not so strict about attendance and all placement is average, canteen is nice, labs are ok, feasts are awesome, faculty is average, surrounding is nice, metro station is nearby, hangout places are awesome, overall a decent college

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is located in Andheri (W) and affiliated to University of Mumbai. My overall experience was great. Good quality of crowd, good infrastructure and great location. Faculty is easy going, not going harsh over deadlines and all. Need to study on your own mostly as most faculty is young and bit inexperienced. Lots of activities like college fests. Good placement companies, mostly IT. Has more departments than usual like mechanical, MCA etc.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Sea facing college balconies, Vibrant festival culture, Above average faculty, Location of college (PVR , Lokhandwala market, Juhu Beach, Irla market are all close by and this is excluding many other awesome restaurants nearby). Infrastructure of the college is pretty good too. The building's architecture is world class. Placements here are decent.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: An awesome infrastructure of glass windows and a balcony on each floor Great seniors with amazing college life Best place to hangout foodies can always find a famous spot a couple of meters ahead Teaching is good Not so strict on students And best of all some of the great college festivals

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College infrastructure is awesome, in terms of placement is best,canteen is reasonable and hygienic, library is also excellent, in term of sports its little poor its best college in term of croud that comes to study

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: To start with,one thing comes first,you will not find any other college with the better location then this.college is located near beach.canteen is really awesome,food is ok but to sit there with chilling breeze with friends is different thing.faculty is really strict,and one thing here in this college faculty is not partial,they will not hesitate to give in internal kt if your performance is not good.also there is no ground for college and hostel facility is also not present.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: A good place to be at ,cool atmosphere ,decent canteen, decent staff, great location , okay type infrastructure good place to be at with cool atmosphere

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Course curriculum is pretty good regarding comp. engineering. Exam structure is usually divided into 8 semesters in which in each semester you will need to study and take care orelse you would end up with a KT instead. Teaching is too good and upto mark.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Our college is one of the best engineering college in Mumbai, but quality of education is not upto the level upto which it should be infact all private engineering colleges in India have same condition. Infrastructure is well developed.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It is average when compared to all the engineering colleges in Mumbai. Yearly fees are around 1.1L. It is feasible for many, but because of Freeships and Scholarships by Government of Maharashtra, people get tuition fee waiver making the course feasible for all.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: All basic facilities are available in college. College infrastructure is overall good. Spacious classrooms with projectors wherever necessary, labs, xerox & stationary centre ,Wi-Fi in library is also available. Canteen provides good food.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This college has various good reviews about it also it ranks 7th in the list of all engineering college across Mumbai This college has very good infrastructure also the college has well-educated staff provided with a proper canteen in college itself. Also, alumni are well managed. Labs are good. Sometimes net is not available.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college does have all the basic amenities, which is satisfying the infrastructure is good ,however no campus. The college does have a well maintained library with over 2000 books , journals and papers.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Fee Structure And Facilities Fee structure is less for caste students as it is the case in all other colleges. It's not too expensive but not until the Mark. Its 99k per year for bachelors in any field.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Labs are well maintained. Facilities are up to mark as needed. Most importantly internet access should be provided at least on lab computers. The only thing I love about this college is its scenic view visible from the college windows.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: As of the teaching most of the teachers are excellent in their respective domains , the curriculum is slightly outdated and needs further enhancement for further employability and further placements .

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Our college is well maintained but sometimes there is no proper water supply in washrooms. Its is near the versova beach so we have ample of fresh air and the environment is good. The canteen is good. There is no wifi in college.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college has various good reviews about it also it ranks 5th in the list of all engineering college across Mumbai This college has very good infrastructure also the college has well-educated staff provided with a proper canteen in college itself. Also, alumni are well managed. Labs are good.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The course curriculum is well designed by the experienced faculties teaching Computer Engineering under Mumbai University. Recently, their has been changes in the curriculum so as to meet industrial needs. There are 2 unit tests of 20 marks each carried out, one is after 30-40% syllabus gets covered, the next is during term end. Final semester exams of 80 marks take place after practical and oral exams. Faculty is good.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Overall my 2 years experience is good. Teachers are helpful too. They used to clear my doubts.So many extra curricular activities happens in college almost on daily basis. Most importantly no ragging is there in college. All seniors are also so supportive

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: We have a lot of committees and students from all dept are a part of all committees. Its fun to be in. We get to learn many new things and even seniors are supportive. There is no such thing as ragging over here.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: There is almost nothing bad remarks as per college. College is strict as well. Also, the proper security guard is there for Id check-in in college In the college, a faculty is helpful for students to their problem. Labs are well maitained. Proper facilities are provided.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Quality of placement is average. IT companies like Infosys came during campus placement. IT and Comps students are getting placed well as compared to other departments. Placement Cell is there in the college which provides information about Job apportunities , internships to all students.

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Like any other mu college you may find some good and bad teachers.....different people may have different opinions about the professor....acc to me most of the staff is quite good and also friendly with the students

College Name: MCTs Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Rajiv Gandhi institute of technology, Mumbai is located at versova, Andheri. The college offers five streams to choose from, mechanical, Instrumentation, EXTC, IT and comps. The college faculty does not live up to its expectations. Overall, its a decent college but definitely not one to opt for in the first round.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Rajiv Gandhi institute of technology The college is situated at very good place. Infrastructure is good. There is balcony at every floor so that u can spend ur time there. Companies like l&t visit to the campus for placement. Talking of canteen that's next iitb only in Mumbai region.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Don't enter the central jail. This college is horrible to the core. Attendance is compulsory for every event you can imagine. The students are horrible too . All are from Koparkhairane gaon and vashi gaon. All they care is about marks. No technical projects. No thinking outside the box. This four years are of utmost importance . You cannot you just should not waste it in this jail. Peace Bezos.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: One of the most strict college.Choosing this college is one of the biggest mistake of my life.I assumed strict meant good quality of teaching, but it's not so. Most of the facilities mentioned in the brouhchre are fake, like access to the turf(football ground) , swimming pool etc. Both the facilities i mentioned are given on rent in commercial basis. Students have to pay for practicing on ground. The canteen is no more than a gowndown. The infrastructure is very poor, the environment is dull. Going into details the college college doesn't allow (not promote) creative thinking. Attendance is not given to the people who represent college in different competition like Robocon. In the First year of the college you will have to face the warth of Humanities department where you will face infinite loop of retest and never ending assignments. The worst of all departments is the electrical department,here teacher's are only looking for opportunities to trouble students. If you are absent for one day you have to complete the day's work and give Viva on it,then and then only you will be allowed to sit in the class. Summing up I won't recommend to you to take this college if you want to live a happy and mentally healthy life.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College experience is okay. Faculty members are well educated. One of the A grade college in NAVI MUMBAI. Come here only if you will be on time and be prepared for tests every week. Indian education gives very less exposure to industries but we go for industrial visits every semester and the faculty members with experience share them when topic comes up. Overall its a good college and quite strict.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is good in respect of studies and faculties are concern. The new building is on the verge of completion which might see really good facilities and equipment for the incoming students in future. The only thing I am hate this clg is its No time for extra curricular activities....that can be done only after 4.30 which really is bad. Fest is like nothing which is also made compulsory to realise that u r in jail.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I learned alot more than I expected. Faculty is too friendly.Campus crowd is inspirational, healthy n supportive.Teaching experience was very good n practicals was quite interesting but not helping too much.Workshop experience helps alot.Technical event's by ARC are too good.College should support students for national international level competitions by funding sponsorships.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is no so good but comfortable. Points for college improvement are: 1.More corporate world exposure is necessary for students. 2. Because of average quality of examinations students lack basic concepts so companies won't be much interested in our college students. Placement has been declining in the recent years

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The best thing about this college is the Professors and the placement. Professors do take care that the portion is completed on time and are generally very strict about the performance of the students. This college is surely not for students who join Engineering "just to have fun". However, you might come across some ridiculous rules in this college like attending the college fest is compulsory for all students.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Trying to get your ward an admission in this collegePlease think THRICE before doing so!Most of the parents try to collect information about such infrastructures via the college website or some 3rd person whose some long lost relative have studied there...1. Being an 'AGNELITE', here's my review for this college based on my 4yr experience I had there..2. 1st yr, sem1, 2nd week of the college: my roommate gets accused of copy case, which actually was a washed out mcD receipt.. they scolded him to the level that the guy develops fits in the practicals henceforth leaving the college.3. You would've never thought how much writing work you have to do each sem just to score 5 marks for the termwork.4. 87â„… Attendance & your parents get a call that your child have low attendance & sholud compulsory attend the PTIs.. no matter how far they stay else no attendance until they make contact with resp. teacher.5. Canteen rates just went ahead of what they actually taste.. you can actually see a lot of hostelites (who already paid for the mess) sharing meals with local students or ordering separately. Hostelites can have a decent meal only during breakfast on tuesdays & sundays.6. People seeking college hostel for their stay: no wifi till 5PM even if you have final year project on off-days. Till last year, there were 2 visitors room in boy's hostel, which are now given to the students. So parents visiting their ward 'must have a relative' staying nearby or should try to get a hotel room.7. College faculty is good in their own ways, but don't even think to mess with anyone.. you can't guess what will be coming back to you in return! Some teachers actually worth a lot more even if they are strict, while others won't even bother.8. COLLEGE FESTS: literally EVERYTHING is COMPULSORY here, even the inter-college fest (only for saying out loud) 'ETAMAX'. you have to pay a huge debt to participate in different events for each day else a fine of â‚¹4500 to be paid to the college for not attending the fest (seriously think about it!)9. Coming back to hostel: PLEASE LOCK YOUR DOORS & CUPBOARDS else you'd regret sulking in the vain of loosing your belongings.10. College introduced minority quota in yr 2012 & the college lost its ranking since then.. you got to have more then good scores to enter this college (think again!)11. The college teaches you many things in its own way that you'll experience yourself in future but my overall rating would be 4.5/10 for this college.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: When I first entered in this college ,I was really excited about my new journey in life.As I entered teacher gave me the burden of huge syllablus of engineering and schedule of each and every test in the term year.Literally,I had brought only one book. But each and every teacher told us to complete the notes.In this college faculties tried to indulge fear of engineering syllabus in you.Canteen is like that you are in workshops place.. Playground is not available for you as you have to attend each and every lecture. For using playground you have to pay for it.(Disgusting).Other than that students really understands each others pain and I made very good friends for my life.In short its just like a jail in which the faculties are jailers.. But this college teach you how to survive in corporate industry and how to handle stress

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Sure its a jail for few students. But if your motive is to learn and excel in your academics, then its a heaven. The Best faculty you can expect. This college will imbibe you with discipline, punctuality, determination. Good placement opportunity. I loved my experience in this college.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The college infrastructure was all right but the faculty needs to be selected with more precision for quality . The placement scenario was good but proper preparation and guidance should be given . Syllabus is a different thing but real industrial exposure should be given as in the end theory only doesn't come to help .The practical approach should be built .People should be helped to build their career early on like suggest students for certifications .. courses etc .As a college environment, it was good .

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: I'll mostly be talking about the First Year experience as that is going to be the hardest time there. I'm sure most of you have heard about how strict this college is, and I assure you they are completely correct.Let's start with the "Humanities Department"- This is the department you will be under in your first year. This comprises of Basic Sciences (PCM). I am trying my best to not be prejudiced but they are probably the most hated department in the college and rightly so!Let me elaborate-A few years back the college became a "minority" institution and the "quality" of students took a dive. So to maintain their reputation as a good college they will use anything they legally can to convert you into a law abiding student.If you have a problem with authority, the 4 years you spend here will be traumatic. The ironically named Humanities department is the most stubborn and dedicated department you will ever come across, they do not take their job lightly.I once failed a prelim exam and the teacher sat with me and other failures till 7:30 in the night !!!It did end up helping me but I digress.To increase the aforementioned quality" of students they have used certain tactics some of them end up being useful and some of them don't but something they all have in common is that they are all painful.1- There are weekly tests called tutorials which if you fail they will give you Impositions(Write the whole damn thing five times, etc). I once had to write a Physics paper 15 times!! This is a completely useless tactic as nothing I write is by goodwill and by the time of the End-Sem exams I forget all of it. It does nothing but adds to the frustration of seeing your friends sleep and waste time where you are in class.2-Remedials- This is quite possibly the only college with prelim exams and this is the week before the actual prelim exams where everyone has to come to college and revise. Never before has my time been wasted is such an orderly and disciplined manner. This is also one of those times where you will be whining about your college life.3-Prelims- This, however, was not such a bad idea and has helped many to prepare better for the Semester exams.4-Re-Prelims- Yes, this college has Re-Prelims.I will give you a moment to let that sink in.!This is what you have to do if you fail Preliminary exams. I failed one, and the teacher sat with me till 7:30 in the night! I have never seen such dedication in a teacher before (I am not claiming this to be a good thing). But my feeling is mixed towards this one because after that day I opened the books only before the exam day and I still passed with flying colors.!5-Attendance- This college has probably the most strict college in terms of attendance. In 12th, I had an attendance % of about 25-35% but after coming here it is now 85-90%. It has been really difficult to adapt to this college's rules.I find this to be not very productive. There are times where I just wanna get some rest and anything taught will not be affecting me in any way,  but I can't, and I find that counter-productive and quite frankly irritating.6-College Fests-This is absolutely ridiculous.You have to pay a fine of Rs.500 per day for every day of fest you don't attend. I thought they were using it as a scare tactic, I was wrong! Their reasoning is that nobody comes if they don't keep the fine.  We attend more lectures than any other college, we do more work than the students of any other college, I'm sorry if we don't want to attend the 'barely average' fests. I'd rather rest! Do you want us to attend lectures or have good fest?Make up your mind!There is something fundamentally and philosophically wrong with this college.The Father of our Nation once said, "Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes." This place doesn't give you the freedom to make mistakes.Here the teachers have absolute power.The students are powerless. This is psychologically degrading and just..sad! BUT....this college also has one of the highest pass percentages in the first year(75-85%!).That's all I have to say about the first year experience.I won't be going into too much detail about other things as they can be found anywhere on the web but still...as a formality-1-Canteen-7.5/10 Good enough, Cheap enough2-Hostel-Wouldnot know3-Infrastructure-7/10 Okay. I guess4-Faculty-10/10-I hate them but they do a good job5-People-Christian/Mallus and  generally above average studentsIn conclusion-This is more or less a school. Fear is the name of the game. There are always some who try to rebel, but the faculty will slowly tire them till they forget what they were doing in the first place. College Life is nonexistent. You will regret the decision to come to this college even though it has some benefits. In the end, it tries to imprison the youthful spirit of college kids and changes you permanently for better or for worse. You can only hope it doesn't do the latter.When you first set foot in here you will find it depressing and for lack of a better word, it is, but you must always keep in mind that at least some of it is helping you ( Sounds grim? I agree).P.S- If I don't get a 10 Lakh package for all the s**t I have put up with, I will personally burn the college down :D)

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Certainly one if the best and the most prestigious engineering colleges in Mumbai. It has a great campus and the best faculty in all streams. Has a very good placement record. Has excellent hostel and canteen facilities.Definitely a top preferred college among all engineering aspirants.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Our college management is too good and best among all the college's in whole Mumbai.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Is famous for discipline that's maintained in campus, high quality education, all round development of students, good reputation among dream companies and infrastructure, was among the top engineering colleges of Mumbai University.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is good overall placement is good canteen provide higenic food management is not supportive for any circumstances problematic are the rules and regulations .

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Academically college is good library labs are excellent teacher teaches well have good knowledge about the subject. Campus is lively and beautiful but if you looking college life and enjoyment this is not the right place. Every thing is compulsory from do

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Positive - Good environment, good faculty, systematic procedure of teaching and prelims are as per the Mumbai University rules and syllabus. Negative - The number of assignments are more compared to other engineering colleges and as marks of these assignments are included in final CGPA, one cannot ignore them.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College management is not so much supportive few RR is irritating.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It's a very good college for sincere students who want to excell in studies and academia. But for people looking for a fun place it's not so much fun.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It has good library facilities and has access to almost every required book. Has hostel for girls and boys. Also ground for conduction of fests. It also gives access to agnel gym and sports complex including basketball, swimming, athletics, football. Every department has different floor. Washrooms of new buildings are spacious and always well maintained. Wifi has now been implemented and works fair enough, classrooms are spacious and clean, laboratories have almost all required instruments.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College management is demanding for donations dor their new buildingIt is good but they should not demand for donations like this

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College is known for its strictness and attention to disciple even though we are 18+ students. The positive thing about the college is that the academics are very good and the teaching quality is good along with the infrastructure.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: College aims at studies only and not over all development of students. If you are good in studies then only go or else your life will be hell.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: The admission process was a bit hectic. I couldn't get through in the cap rounds especially if u r from Mumbai n in Open category. However I had filled the college form and got through in those rounds. But the effort was worth it. You get a lot of exposure to different technologies and so the admission process is difficult one.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Quality Education, sincerity, desipline, placement opportunities, higher studies opportunities, sports facilities, location from my home, proper timed system, overall reviews given on different websites, senior's experience in the college

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: It's quite strict including prayers and all activities and compulsory terms and all but it's best as it provides you with best facilities, faculties and placements. I am still experiencing make of things in college so I cannot tell much more about it.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure, Ranking, Quality of education, passion, style of teaching, approach of teaching, qualifications of teachers, the environment, the experience, to understand more about engineering, to lead my future in the field of engineering,

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: Management is the worst managing Director of the institute is ex Principal of school, who has no idea about engineering management tried their best to collect money from students but even after having such a bad management, u will get many friends here.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This college have good placement especially for IT and computer and I even like the infrastructure. And I always wanted to attend a reputed Christian college. This college is quite strict and attendance of 75%is compulsory.

College Name: Fr C Rodrigues Institute of Technology, Navi Mumbai
Reviews: This college will help u fulfill all your dreams ...it is ranked among the top ten in Mumbai ..Teaching faculty is very helpful. Placements are good. The students are also trained in latest software to meet the current need of the industry...there is very little for college life though...fests are boring

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This collg is overdiscipled. First year is controlled by Humanities and is good in every aspect. The next three years all u need to do is assignments...tests...retests..re re tests...u absolutely dont get any practical understanding in core subjects. Faculties in Mech dept have average teaching skills.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Recently NAAC has accredited A+. Coming to Infrastructure of college, it is quite good. The college is located in Central Mumbai. The campus is huge and beautiful as you will see greenery everywhere within campus.The main college building is quite old as it's founded in 1933. It has a big library where students also have their online portal where students can access books online as well. Coming to sports it owns in-campus basketball, football, badminton court. whole campus has free wifi facility. Referring about college life, we have so many events alongs with academics which helps student to develop in all sense. we have our own Technical (VORTEX), Cultural(MANZAR), Sports (SPORTSAGA) festival. along with it we also have departmental events, events for freshers which lasts for nearly a month and a special fest exclusively for Hostelites (YUVAM). These events are completely arranged by students itself, so we have great fun during this time. Placement Opportunities are good for Chemical Branch and for other branches too.Placements are done in well known MNCs and Indian companies. There are in total 5 hostels for accommodation of students out of which 2 are for girls and remaining for boys. Also we do have 2 canteens. as ICT is among one of the famous Chemical Engineering college you can expect good diversity of students. we have good number of Rich classy people along with poor and middle class students. and also boys to girls ratio is also good unlike other colleges. students here are equally dedicated to studies as well as extracurricular activities. Being an au

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Infrastructure is good. Placement for my degree isn't that good. Faculties are 75% good. Other curricular activities are many to develops extra skills in students. Crowd is good. Hostels are also convenient. Library facilities are also excellent. I would recommend this college for the best degree like chem eng and technology of polymer. Placement for Chem engineering and polymer tech are good, not for other courses.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The experience was great.Teaching was good.Need to focus on placement. Student interaction and interview career guidance are some areas where ICT doesn't hold good.the positive side is renowned professors whose recommendation would get you admit in any reputed foreign University. Half of the students opt to study abroad after completion of graduation programme.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Placements could be better with the participation of faculty.Although technical placements are relatively easy to snag, non-technical jobs like consulting are not encouraged as a part of the college culture. Excellent for further studies in the field of interest, research projects and internships are encouraged throughout the course of the course and notable colleges abroad are aware of the college and the courses offered. The campus is beautiful. College fests are small, contained and personal. Each department works in a very different manner; some are better than others. Hostel lacks space and is extremely crammed.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: 4 Years I spent in ICT were the most happening, beautiful years of my life. It has changed my whole life. College is established in 1933 what more to say about its legacy. The college has got the very beautiful campus in the heart of Mumbai with proximity to Dadar station. Alumni base of the college is so strong that it might surpass big Institutions in India. 16-acre campus fulfils all the requirements and there are no infrastructural constraints. Life there is so happening and peer group is very active which motivates you to do more with superior quality. Placements are quite decent but most of the students to pursue higher education from reputed institutes than just joining 9-5 job. Professors are the best asset of ICT, especially Pharmacy department professors are excellent.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college faculty is very experienced. The college gives a chance to learn a lot of things apart from studies. The culture and the spirit of all the festivities are very high. The mess food is also good. The campus is not that good but still in small space provides a lot of opportunities. Learn and grab the opportunities and look forward to the bright future.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: ICT has a Research driven culture. Students are found mostly in their aprons across the state of the art laboratories round the year. I am so proud of being alumni of this institute which is an emotion. Notable alumnus include Shri Mukesh Ambani, Dr. Reddys among others. India needs quality driven education culture like this 83 old institute.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL TECHNOLOGY, MUMBAI, (ICT) is the best college, in every aspect. All the faculty here is student oriented, they are always available for students. All faculty members are much educated (none has a degree less than Phd). Atmosphere and surrounding of the college is pleasant, silent. Infrastructure is adorable. College life is superb here with much supporting seniors and coordinating juniors. Along with academics, here you can excel in extra curricular activities too. Mantra, Vortex and Sports Saga are cultural, technical and sports event respectively which are India's biggest festivals. You enjoy participating and managing these events. Hostel life is too good. You have many industrial visits which give you extra knowledge and experience about the topic. In short, ICT gives all-round development for an individual to become future entrepreneurs and professionals.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: ICT has a huge campus and it is vast and beautiful. The college building is slightly old but is well maintained. No shortage of space with an in-campus football field and a basketball court to name a few facilities. Hostel facilities are available. There are 5 hostel buildings which cater to the students' need of accommodation.The teachers are very helpful but expect the student to study every subject in complete detail and set papers which tests an individuals' intelligence and not just rote learning skills.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This college is perhaps the best for chemical engineering in the world but have seen many of my friends have left the chemical engineer here and instead took admission in energy resources at IIT Powai instead! However I've also heard that Mukesh Ambani left IIT Powai and joined here in the third year. However good the college may be, the choice differs from one to another. I have observed a general trend of getting good college over good branch and according to my knowledge chemical is considered to be a core branch.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college is a host to some of the most brightest,unique and innovative students as well as faculty. The labs are highly equipped with quality machinery that one can possibly need for research. The cherry on the cake is that it is well known throughout the world as one of the finest institutes in chemical engineering technology. The students generated are of high potential and caliber to innovate and invent. There are some faults that almost every institute has like some of the teachers don't take required amount of lectures, or non support of teachers for some student activities etc. The hostel facilities are great and everything that a hosteler needs is provided on time. The staff is quite helping and dedicated. Academics, sports or culture everything is done with high spirits and great pomp. This institute leaves a mark anywhere it goes.Overall this institute is a hub to the young potential candidates of the country's youth who have "Chemical dreams"!

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: "Institute of Chemical Technology, more often known as UDCT too, is one of the best places in our country for pursuing an career in the field of chemical engineering. It enjoys an elite status and is state funded. Besides this, it also holds fourth position in world in chemical engineering which in itself is a feat for any college in India UDCT offers an extensive exposure to industry as well as provides platform for research. Moving towards the cocurriculum sphere, UDCT has 3 major fests in an year- the tech fest-vortex, the cultural fest- manzar and the sports fest- sportsaga, along with more small fests. Also, it is one of the few colleges in India to have an artifical turf. The library is extensive and has a plethora of books and journals. UDCT being located in the heart of the commercial capital of India-Mumbai, is very well connected to road, railways and airways. The campus, is serene calm and the infrastructure is remarkable. It is indeed a place to devote yourself to true love of science and technology."

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Well reputed Institute with nirf rank 4 for pharmacy. As well for other engineering fields it stand in top 20 university as well. I had completed my graduation in pharmaceutical & engineering background so for choosing the same field for my master is always an added advantage that's why I prefer to take admission in ICT, Mumbai. Average package offered by college is 5.0 LPA. For starting it is adjustable & we get lot to learn. As well as many extracurricular activities also helps to nourish our other skill set.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Had interest in chemistry and related processes and the college is well recognised for chemical engineering. Has good campus placement, competitive environment, brilliant minds gathering all at one place. Also faculties are good.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This college is a government college and tution fees is low around 5000 per year. This college staffs was teaching very well. This college campus is a natural way expect as trees, plants etc. And most important this college occurs many interviews for students in top companies.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Best remarks. Every problem noted to the management, they respond us and helps to solve all the queries. They also manage exams and events. They understand students very well.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Ranking of the college was one of the reason it always maintained it, recommendation by my friends and the focus on a particular field of engineering into depth, the alumni of the college are well known people in india like Mr. Ambani are the factors which drove me towards choosing this college.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The students have a very huge potential. However, lack of resources and parochial outlook towards technical education has depleted the quality of engineers produced from the college. The college is below par for a very active student. Hence I would recommend future students to try other options before choosing this college. I would specially like to mention people coming from metropolitan cities. Kindly, avoid taking admission in this college as it will surely hamper your outlook and would not challenge you at all. Instead it would frustrate you over its conventional way of functioning.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: College management is very appropriate and doing very good management in all the fields.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: As our course is unique and interesting thats feel us positive. We have good faculties. Regarding academic we are doing well but thier is need of improvement. We need to improve in extracurricular activities and need to anything for student body activities

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It is top college in India. Ranked 10th in NIRF ranking 2018. Ranked 73rd in world as per recent report. It is best college for chemical engineering & chemical technology in whole India. This college has best alumni power & great placements records. Indian Chemical industry is based on ICT Mumbai. 19 Padmshouri awardees & 1 PadmBhushan Award from ICT Mumbai college. There is so much positive energy to achieve your goals.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: There weree both postive and negative remarks positive is about the faculty. Negative is about the facility provided by the college. This is government undertaking college which means there shld be a lot of facilities

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Nothing much to say but the college life plus the hostel Life both are just awesome. Every night in the hostel is just occasion. Just they need to do is the improve hostel infrastructure with taking lot money from the students.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: As i am still studying. I dont have much idea. But hearing from the seniors, they companies that come to our college are the top companies and the placement is quite good. The seniors are happy with the placements they have got.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It's nice here, you just need to find a way to keep up with all the workload, the fests and everything. Rest all just works. Set your priorities right, and this college would be perfect for the science buff in you.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: There is nothing to say bad in institute.The everything experienced in an year seems that they have everything best in quality.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Everything is perfect, Overall I love my College. It helps us to improve our overall personality and many more things could we improve with the help of our college. So I will give positive remarks for the college.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: This is the best college. You will not see any drawbacks If you work hard here you will be most valuable person for society in your career. I recommend everyone to opt. For our college.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Good stress on academics however placement is only limited to Chemical engineering firms which limits the CTC.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: I gave departmental exam as a entrance examination. I had score enough to get the admission. This college is best college and ranked 2nd in world for chemical engineering field.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: My college is very good still some of are shortcomings, like infrastructure, well maintaince etc

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: The college was very good in terms of academic life, hostel life & career.

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: Great legacy helps ICT maintain its placement record. But multi disciplinary nature of bioprocess tech course puts some restrictions on exploiting the funds and labs to the fullest. Placement is augmented by ICTs reputation in the industry and not by plac

College Name: Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai
Reviews: It's actually a good institute with loads of fests activities. Faculties are helpful and well managed. The admission process is all online from the HSNCU website. I personally opted for this college because I have my office nearby soo I could learn about my business after college hours secondly this college offers lots of certificate course.
